 12090 00000AAA 7406                    		jz	short block_floppy
 12091 00000AAC E82800                  		call	Disk
 12092 00000AAF 31C0                    		xor	ax, ax
 12093 00000AB1 C3                      		retn
 12094                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 12095                                  
 12096                                  block_floppy:
 12097                                  
 12098                                  ; read at most 1 track worth. perform minimization at sector / track
 12099                                  				
 12100 00000AB2 268A4D13                		mov	cl, [es:di+19]	; [es:di+BDS.secpertrack]
 12101                                  		;inc	cl
 12102                                  		; 23/12/2023
 12103 00000AB6 41                      		inc	cx
 12104 00000AB7 2A0E[3101]              		sub	cl, [cursec]
 12105 00000ABB 30ED                    		xor	ch, ch
 12106 00000ABD 39C8                    		cmp	ax, cx
 12107 00000ABF 7302                    		jnb	short gotmin
 12108 00000AC1 89C1                    		mov	cx, ax
 12109                                  gotmin:
 12110                                  
 12111                                  ; ax is the requested number of sectors to read
 12112                                  ; cx is the number that we can do on this track
 12113                                  
 12114 00000AC3 50                      		push	ax
 12115 00000AC4 51                      		push	cx
 12116 00000AC5 89C8                    		mov	ax, cx
 12117 00000AC7 E80D00                  		call	Disk
 12118 00000ACA 59                      		pop	cx
 12119 00000ACB 58                      		pop	ax
 12120                                  
 12121                                  ; cx is the number of sectors just transferred
 12122                                  
 12123 00000ACC 29C8                    		sub	ax, cx		; reduce sectors-remaining by last i/o
 12124 00000ACE D0E1                    		shl	cl, 1
 12125 00000AD0 00CF                    		add	bh, cl		; adjust transfer address
 12126 00000AD2 EBC6                    		jmp	short block
 12127                                  dskerr_brdg:
 12128 00000AD4 E9EA00                  		jmp	dskerr
 12129                                  
 12130                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 12131                                  
 12132                                  ; 15/10/2022
 12133                                  
 12134                                  ;--------------------------------------------------------------
 12135                                  ;perform disk i/o with retries
 12136                                  ; al = number of sectors (1-8, all on one track)
 12137                                  ; es:di point to drive parameters
 12138                                  ; xfer_seg:bx = transfer address 
 12139                                  ;		(must not cross a 64k physical boundary)
 12140                                  ; [rflag] = 2 if read, 3 if write
 12141                                  ; [verify] = 0 for normal, 1 for verify after write
 12142                                  ;--------------------------------------------------------------
 12143                                  
 12144                                  		; 18/04/2024
 12145                                  		; 23/12/2023
 12146                                  		; 19/10/2022
 12147                                  Disk:
 12148                                  
 12149                                  ; Check for hard disk format and
 12150                                  ; if TRUE then set max error count to 2
 12151                                  
 12152 00000AD7 BD0500                  		mov	bp, 5		; MAXERR
 12153                                  					; set up retry count
 12154                                  		;; 23/12/2023
 12155                                  		;mov	cl, [es:di+23h]
 12156                                  		;and	cx, 1
 12157                                  		; 18/04/2024
 12158 00000ADA 26F6452301              		test	byte [es:di+23h], 1
 12159                                  					; [es:di+BDS.flags], fnon_removable
 12160 00000ADF 7408                    		jz	short GetRdWrInd
 12161 00000AE1 80FC04                  		cmp	ah, 4		; romverify ; Is this a	track verify?
 12162 00000AE4 7403                    		jz	short GetRdWrInd
 12163 00000AE6 BD0200                  		mov	bp, 2		; This is not verify so only 1 retry
 12164                                  GetRdWrInd:				
 12165 00000AE9 892E[2105]              		mov	[vretry_cnt], bp ; verify op. retry cnt for write-verify
 12166 00000AED 892E[2305]              		mov	[soft_ecc_cnt], bp ; soft ecc error retry count.
 12167 00000AF1 8A26[2001]              		mov	ah, [rflag]	; get read/write indicator
 12168                                  ;retry:
 12169                                  ; 09/12/2022
 12170                                  _retry:
 12171 00000AF5 50                      		push	ax
 12172 00000AF6 8B16[3301]              		mov	dx, [curtrk]
 12173                                  		
 12174                                  		;; 23/12/2023
 12175                                  		;jcxz	disk_not_mini
 12176                                  		; 18/04/2024
 12177 00000AFA 26F6452301              		test	byte [es:di+23h], 1
 12178 00000AFF 740B                    		jz	short disk_not_mini
 12179                                  		
 12180 00000B01 26837D4701              		cmp	word [es:di+47h], 1 ; [es:di+BDS.bdsm_ismini]
 12181                                  					; is this a mini disk? ((logical dos partition))
 12182 00000B06 7504                    		jnz	short disk_not_mini ; no. continue to next.
 12183 00000B08 26035549                		add	dx, [es:di+49h]	; [es:di+BDS.bdsm_hidden_trks]
 12184                                  					; add hidden trks.
 12185                                  disk_not_mini:
 12186 00000B0C D0CE                    		ror	dh, 1
 12187 00000B0E D0CE                    		ror	dh, 1
 12188 00000B10 0A36[3101]              		or	dh, [cursec]
 12189 00000B14 89D1                    		mov	cx, dx
 12190 00000B16 86E9                    		xchg	ch, cl		;  cl =	sector,	ch = cylinder
 12191 00000B18 8A36[3201]              		mov	dh, [curhd]	; load current head number and
 12192 00000B1C 268A5504                		mov	dl, [es:di+4]	; physical drive number
 12193                                  					; [es:di+BDS.drivenum]
 12194 00000B20 26807D2205              		cmp	byte [es:di+22h], 5 ; [es:di+BDS.formfactor], ffHardFile
 12195 00000B25 7411                    		jz	short do_fast	; hard files use fast speed
 12196                                  
 12197                                  ; if we have [step_drv] set to -1, we use the slow settle time.
 12198                                  ; this helps when we have just done a reset disk operation and the head has
 12199                                  ; been moved to another cylinder - the problem crops up with 3.5" drives.
 12200                                  
 12201 00000B27 803E[7600]FF            		cmp	byte [step_drv], 0FFh ; -1
 12202                                  		;jz	short do_writej
 12203                                  		; 23/12/2023
 12204 00000B2C 7460                    		jz	short do_write
 12205 00000B2E 80FC02                  		cmp	ah, 2		; romread
 12206 00000B31 7405                    		jz	short do_fast
 12207 00000B33 80FC04                  		cmp	ah, 4		; romverify
 12208                                  		;jz	short do_fast
 12209                                  		; 23/12/2023
 12210 00000B36 7556                    		jnz	short do_write
 12211                                  ;do_writej:
 12212                                  
 12213                                  ; reads always fast, unless we have just done a disk reset operation
 12214                                  			
 12215                                  		;jmp	short do_write	; reads	always fast
 12216                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 12217                                  
 12218                                  do_fast:
 12219 00000B38 E8FB00                  		call	fastspeed	; change settle	mode
 12220                                  testerr:
 12221 00000B3B 7297                    		jb	short dskerr_brdg
 12222                                  
 12223                                  ; set drive and track of last access
 12224                                  
 12225 00000B3D 8816[7600]              		mov	[step_drv], dl
 12226 00000B41 26886D46                		mov	[es:di+46h], ch	; [es:di+BDS.track]
 12227                                  no_set:
 12228                                  		;cmp	word [wrtverify], 103h
 12229 00000B45 813E[2001]0301          		cmp	word [rflag], 103h ; check for write and verify
 12230 00000B4B 7452                    		jz	short doverify
 12231                                  noverify:
 12232 00000B4D 58                      		pop	ax
 12233                                  
 12234                                  ; check the flags word in the bds to see if the drive is non removable
 12235                                  ; if not we needn't do anything special
 12236                                  ; if it is a hard disk then check to see if multi-track operation
 12237                                  ; is specified. if specified we don't have to calculate for the next
 12238                                  ; track since we are already done. so we can go to the exit of this routine.
 12239                                  
 12240 00000B4E 26F6452301              		test	byte [es:di+23h], 1 ; [es:di+BDS.flags]
 12241                                  					; fnon_removable
 12242 00000B53 7407                    		jz	short its_removable
 12243 00000B55 F606[1E05]80            		test	byte [multrk_flag], 80h ; multrk_on
 12244 00000B5A 7530                    		jnz	short disk_ret
 12245                                  its_removable:
 12246 00000B5C 80E13F                  		and	cl, 3Fh		; eliminate cylinder bits from sector
 12247 00000B5F 30E4                    		xor	ah, ah
 12248 00000B61 2906[2201]              		sub	[seccnt], ax	; reduce count of sectors to go	next sector
 12249 00000B65 00C1                    		add	cl, al
 12250 00000B67 880E[3101]              		mov	[cursec], cl
 12251 00000B6B 263A4D13                		cmp	cl, [es:di+13h]	; [es:di+BDS.secpertrack]
 12252                                  					; see if sector/track limit reached
 12253 00000B6F 761B                    		jbe	short disk_ret
 12254 00000B71 C606[3101]01            		mov	byte [cursec], 1 ; start with first sector of next track
 12255 00000B76 8A36[3201]              		mov	dh, [curhd]
 12256 00000B7A FEC6                    		inc	dh
 12257 00000B7C 263A7515                		cmp	dh, [es:di+15h]	; [es:di+BDS.heads]
 12258 00000B80 7206                    		jb	short noxor
 12259 00000B82 30F6                    		xor	dh, dh
 12260 00000B84 FF06[3301]              		inc	word [curtrk]
 12261                                  noxor:
 12262 00000B88 8836[3201]              		mov	[curhd], dh
 12263                                  disk_ret:
 12264 00000B8C F8                      		clc
 12265 00000B8D C3                      		retn
 12266                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 12267                                  
 12268                                  ; 15/10/2022
 12269                                  
 12270                                  ;--------------------------------------------------------------
 12271                                  ; the request is for write. determine if we are talking about
 12272                                  ; the same track and drive. if so, use the fast speed.
 12273                                  ;--------------------------------------------------------------
 12274                                  
 12275                                  do_write:
 12276 00000B8E 3A16[7600]              		cmp	dl, [step_drv]
 12277 00000B92 7506                    		jnz	short do_norm	; we have changed drives
 12278 00000B94 263A6D46                		cmp	ch, [es:di+46h]	; [es:di+BDS.track]
 12279 00000B98 749E                    		jz	short do_fast	; we are still on the same track
 12280                                  do_norm:
 12281 00000B9A E87500                  		call	normspeed
 12282 00000B9D EB9C                    		jmp	short testerr
 12283                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 12284                                  
 12285                                  ;--------------------------------------------------------------
 12286                                  ; we have a verify request also. get state info and go verify
 12287                                  ;--------------------------------------------------------------
 12288                                  
 12289                                  doverify:
 12290 00000B9F 58                      		pop	ax
 12291 00000BA0 50                      		push	ax
 12292 00000BA1 B404                    		mov	ah, 4
 12293 00000BA3 E89000                  		call	fastspeed
 12294 00000BA6 73A5                    		jnb	short noverify
 12295                                  
 12296                                  ; check the error returned in ah to see if it is a soft ecc error.
 12297                                  ; if it is not we needn't do anything special. if it is a soft
 12298                                  ; ecc error then decrement the soft_ecc_cnt error retry count. if
 12299                                  ; this retry count becomes 0 then we just ignore the error and go to
 12300                                  ; no_verify but if we can still try then we call the routine to reset
 12301                                  ; the disk and go to dskerr1 to retry the operation.
 12302                                  
 12303 00000BA8 80FC11                  		cmp	ah, 11h		; soft ecc error ?
 12304 00000BAB 750B                    		jnz	short not_softecc_err
 12305 00000BAD FF0E[2305]              		dec	word [soft_ecc_cnt]
 12306 00000BB1 749A                    		jz	short noverify	; no more retry
 12307 00000BB3 E83305                  		call	ResetDisk	; reset	disk
 12308 00000BB6 EB3E                    		jmp	short dskerr1	; retry
 12309                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 12310                                  
 12311                                  not_softecc_err:			; other error.
 12312 00000BB8 E82E05                  		call	ResetDisk
 12313 00000BBB FF0E[2105]              		dec	word [vretry_cnt]
 12314 00000BBF EB1C                    		jmp	short dskerr0
 12315                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 12316                                  
 12317                                  ;--------------------------------------------------------------
 12318                                  ; need to special case the change-line error ah=06h.
 12319                                  ; if we get this, we need to return it.
 12320                                  ;--------------------------------------------------------------
 12321                                  
 12322                                  dskerr:
 12323 00000BC1 803E[7700]00            		cmp	byte [fhave96], 0 ; do we have changeline support?
 12324 00000BC6 7403                    		jz	short dskerr_nochangeline ; brif not
 12325 00000BC8 E8F80C                  		call	checkio
 12326                                  dskerr_nochangeline:
 12327 00000BCB 803E[2505]01            		cmp	byte [multitrk_format_flag], 1 ; multi trk format request?
 12328 00000BD0 7508                    		jnz	short dochkagain ; no more retry.
 12329 00000BD2 BD0100                  		mov	bp, 1
 12330 00000BD5 C606[2505]00            		mov	byte [multitrk_format_flag], 0 ; clear the flag.
 12331                                  dochkagain:
 12332 00000BDA E8A900                  		call	again
 12333                                  dskerr0:
 12334 00000BDD 7420                    		jz	short harderr
 12335 00000BDF 26F6452301              		test	byte [es:di+23h], 1 ; [es:di+BDS.flags]
 12336                                  					; fnon_removable
 12337 00000BE4 7505                    		jnz	short skip_timeout_chk
 12338 00000BE6 80FC80                  		cmp	ah, 80h		; timeout?
 12339 00000BE9 7414                    		jz	short harderr
 12340                                  skip_timeout_chk:
 12341 00000BEB 80FCCC                  		cmp	ah, 0CCh	; write	fault error?
 12342 00000BEE 740A                    		jz	short write_fault_err ;	then, don't retry.
 12343 00000BF0 C706[2305]0500          		mov	word [soft_ecc_cnt], 5 ; MAXERR
 12344                                  					; set soft_ecc_cnt back	to maxerr
 12345                                  dskerr1:
 12346 00000BF6 58                      		pop	ax		; restore sector count
 12347                                  		;jmp	retry
 12348                                  		; 09/12/2022
 12349 00000BF7 E9FBFE                  		jmp	_retry
 12350                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 12351                                  
 12352                                  write_fault_err:
 12353 00000BFA BD0100                  		mov	bp, 1		; just retry only once
 12354                                  					; for write fault error.
 12355 00000BFD EBF7                    		jmp	short dskerr1
 12356                                  
 12357                                  		; fall into harderr
 12358                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 12359                                  
 12360                                  ; entry point for routines that call maperror themselves
 12361                                  
 12362                                  harderr:
 12363 00000BFF E84C00                  		call	maperror
 12364                                  harderr2:
 12365 00000C02 C606[1E01]FF            		mov	byte [tim_drv], 0FFh
 12366                                  					; force a media check through rom
 12367 00000C07 8B0E[2201]              		mov	cx, [seccnt]	; get count of sectors to go
 12368 00000C0B 8B26[3501]              		mov	sp, [spsav]	; recover entry	stack pointer
 12369                                  
 12370                                  ; since we are performing a non-local goto, restore the disk parameters
 12371                                  
 12372                                  		;jmp	diddleback
 12373                                  		; 09/12/2022
 12374 00000C0F E916FE                  		jmp	diddle_back
 12375                                  
 12376                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 12377                                  
 12378                                  ; change settle value from settlecurrent to whatever is appropriate
 12379                                  ; note that this routine is never called for a fixed disk.
 12380                                  
 12381                                  		; 19/10/2022
 12382                                  normspeed:
 12383 00000C12 803E[2706]00            		cmp	byte [media_set_for_format], 0
 12384 00000C17 751D                    		jnz	short fastspeed
 12385 00000C19 06                      		push	es
 12386 00000C1A 50                      		push	ax
 12387 00000C1B A0[2801]                		mov	al, [settleslow]
 12388 00000C1E C436[2D01]              		les	si, [dpt]	; current disk parm table
 12389 00000C22 26884409                		mov	[es:si+9], al	; [es:si+DISK_PARMS.DISK_HEAD_STTL]
 12390 00000C26 58                      		pop	ax
 12391 00000C27 07                      		pop	es
 12392 00000C28 E80B00                  		call	fastspeed
 12393                                  		; 24/12/2023
 12394                                  		;push	es
 12395                                  		;les	si, [dpt]
 12396                                  		;mov	byte [es:si+9], 1 ; [es:si+DISK_PARMS.DISK_HEAD_STTL]
 12397                                  		;			; 1 is fast settle value
 12398                                  		;pop	es
 12399 00000C2B 1E                      		push	ds
 12400 00000C2C C536[2D01]              		lds	si, [dpt]
 12401 00000C30 C6440901                		mov	byte [si+9], 1
 12402 00000C34 1F                      		pop	ds
 12403                                  
 12404 00000C35 C3                      		retn
 12405                                  
 12406                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 12407                                  
 12408                                  ; if the drive has been marked as too big (i.e. starting sector of the
 12409                                  ; partition is > 16 bits, then always return drive not ready.
 12410                                  
 12411                                  fastspeed:
 12412 00000C36 26F6451F80              		test	byte [es:di+1Fh], 80h ; [es:di+BDS.fatsiz]
 12413                                  					; ftoobig
 12414 00000C3B 750D                    		jnz	short notready
 12415 00000C3D 06                      		push	es
 12416 00000C3E 8E06[2605]              		mov	es, [xfer_seg]
 12417 00000C42 CD13                    		int	13h		; DISK -
 12418 00000C44 8C06[2605]              		mov	[xfer_seg], es
 12419 00000C48 07                      		pop	es
 12420 00000C49 C3                      		retn
 12421                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 12422                                  
 12423                                  notready:
 12424 00000C4A F9                      		stc
 12425 00000C4B B480                    		mov	ah, 80h
 12426 00000C4D C3                      		retn
 12427                                  
 12428                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 12429                                  
 12430                                  ; map error returned by rom in ah into corresponding code to be returned to
 12431                                  ; dos in al. trashes di. guaranteed to set carry.
 12432                                  
 12433                                  maperror:
 12434 00000C4E 51                      		push	cx
 12435 00000C4F 06                      		push	es
 12436 00000C50 1E                      		push	ds		; set es=Bios_Data
 12437 00000C51 07                      		pop	es
 12438 00000C52 88E0                    		mov	al, ah		; put error code in al
 12439 00000C54 A2[4401]                		mov	[lsterr], al	; terminate list with error code
 12440                                  		;mov	cx, 11 ; PCDOS 7.1 ; 02/09/2023
 12441 00000C57 B90900                  		mov	cx, 9		; numerr (= errout-errin)
 12442                                  					; number of possible error conditions
 12443 00000C5A BF[3C01]                		mov	di, errin	; point to error conditions
 12444 00000C5D F2AE                    		repne scasb
 12445                                  		; 02/09/2023
 12446                                  		;mov	al, [di+10] ; PCDOS 7.1
 12447                                  		; 10/12/2022
 12448 00000C5F 8A4508                  		mov	al, [di+8]	; [di+numerr-1]
 12449                                  					; get translation
 12450                                  		; 19/10/2022 - Temporary ! 
 12451                                  		;db	8Ah, 85h, 8, 0	; mov al, [di+8]
 12452 00000C62 07                      		pop	es
 12453 00000C63 59                      		pop	cx
 12454 00000C64 F9                      		stc			; flag error condition
 12455 00000C65 C3                      		retn
 12456                                  
 12457                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 12458                                  
 12459                                  ; set the time of last access for this drive.
 12460                                  ; this is done only for removable media. es:di -> bds
 12461                                  
 12462                                  set_tim:
 12463 00000C66 50                      		push	ax
 12464 00000C67 E8B1F8                  		call	GetTickCnt	; Does INT 1A ah=0 & updates daycnt
 12465                                  
 12466                                  ; we have the new time. if we see that the time has passed,
 12467                                  ; then we reset the threshold counter...
 12468                                  
 12469 00000C6A 263B5547                		cmp	dx, [es:di+47h]	; [es:di+BDS.tim_lo]
 12470 00000C6E 7506                    		jnz	short setaccess
 12471 00000C70 263B4D49                		cmp	cx, [es:di+49h]	; [es:di+BDS.tim_hi]
 12472                                  		;jz	short done_set
 12473                                  		; 12/12/2022
 12474 00000C74 740E                    		je	short done_set2
 12475                                  setaccess:
 12476 00000C76 C606[1D01]00            		mov	byte [accesscount], 0
 12477 00000C7B 26895547                		mov	[es:di+47h], dx	; [es:di+BDS.tim_lo]
 12478 00000C7F 26894D49                		mov	[es:di+49h], cx	; [es:di+BDS.tim_hi]
 12479                                  done_set:
 12480 00000C83 F8                      		clc
 12481                                  done_set2:		; 12/12/2022
 12482 00000C84 58                      		pop	ax
 12483 00000C85 C3                      		retn
 12484                                  
 12485                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 12486                                  
 12487                                  ; this routine is called if an error occurs while formatting or verifying.
 12488                                  ; it resets the drive,and decrements the retry count.
 12489                                  ; on entry - ds:di - points to bds for the drive
 12490                                  ;	     bp    - contains retry count
 12491                                  ; on exit    flags indicate result of decrementing retry count
 12492                                  
 12493                                  again:	
 12494 00000C86 E86004                  		call	ResetDisk
 12495 00000C89 80FC06                  		cmp	ah, 6
 12496 00000C8C 7402                    		jz	short dont_dec_retry_count ; If	it is a	media change error
 12497                                  					; do not decrement retry count.
 12498 00000C8E 4D                      		dec	bp		; decrement retry count
 12499 00000C8F C3                      		retn
 12500                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 12501                                  
 12502                                  dont_dec_retry_count:
 12503 00000C90 08E4                    		or	ah, ah
 12504 00000C92 C3                      		retn
 12505

 12517                                  ; NOTE: GetAccessFlag/SetAccessFlag is unpublished function.
 12518                                  ;
 12519                                  ;      This function is intended to give the user to control the
 12520                                  ;      bds table flags of unformatted_media bit.
 12521                                  ;      GetAccessFlag will show the status -
 12522                                  ;	 a_DiskAccess_Control.dac_access_flag = 0 disk i/o not allowed
 12523                                  ;						1 disk i/o allowed
 12524                                  ;      SetAccessFlag will set/reset the unformatted_media bit in flags -
 12525                                  ;	 a_DiskAccess_Control.dac_access_flag = 0 allow disk i/o
 12526                                  ;						1 disallow disk i/o

 12530                                  
 12531                                  ; BIOSCODE:0C3Ch (MSDOS 6.21, IO.SYS)
 12532                                  
 12533                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 12534 00000C93 00                      		db 0

 12537                                  %if 0
 12538                                  
 12539                                  IoReadJumpTable: db 8	; ((IoWriteJumpTable-IoReadJumpTable)-1)/2

 12610                                  ; ==========================================================================
 12611                                  ; Do_Generic_IOCtl: perform generic ioctl request
 12612                                  ;
 12613                                  ;    input: AL contains logical drive
 12614                                  ;
 12615                                  ;	functions are dispatched through a call. On return, carry indicates
 12616                                  ;	error code in al. Note::bES:b& ds undefined on return from
 12617                                  ;	subfunctions.
 12618                                  ;
 12619                                  ; ==========================================================================
 12620                                  
 12621                                  ; 11/03/2019
 12622                                  		; 19/10/2022
 12623                                  do_generic_ioctl:			; 2C7h:0C6Bh = 70h:31DBh
 12624 00000CC3 E8A4F8                  		call	SetDrive	; ES:DI	Points to bds for drive
 12625 00000CC6 06                      		push	es
 12626 00000CC7 C41E[1200]              		les	bx, [ptrsav]	; ES:BX	Points to request header
 12627 00000CCB 26807F0D08              		cmp	byte [es:bx+0Dh], 8 ; [es:bx+IOCTL_REQ.MAJORFUNCTION]
 12628                                  					; RAWIO
 12629 00000CD0 268A470E                		mov	al, [es:bx+0Eh]	; [es:bx+IOCTL_REQ.MINORFUNCTION]
 12630 00000CD4 07                      		pop	es
 12631 00000CD5 7525                    		jnz	short IoctlFuncErr
 12632                                  
 12633                                  		; cas note: Could do the above two blocks in reverse order.
 12634                                  		; Would have to preserve al for SetDrive
 12635                                  
 12636                                  		; 10/12/2022
 12637 00000CD7 BE[940C]                		mov	si, IoReadJumpTable
 12638                                  		;mov	si, 0C3Ch	; IoReadJumpTable
 12639                                  					; at 2C7h:0C3Ch	= 70h:31ACh
 12640 00000CDA A820                    		test	al, 20h		; GEN_IOCTL_FN_TST ; test of req. function
 12641 00000CDC 7503                    		jnz	short NotGenericWrite ; function is a read.
 12642                                  		; 10/12/2022
 12643 00000CDE BE[A70C]                		mov	si, IoWriteJumpTable
 12644                                  		;mov	si, 0C4Fh	; IoWriteJumpTable
 12645                                  					; at 2C7h:0C4Fh	= 70h:31BFh
 12646                                  NotGenericWrite:			
 12647 00000CE1 24DF                    		and	al, 0DFh	; ~GEN_IOCTL_FN_TST ; get rid of read/write bit
 12648 00000CE3 2C40                    		sub	al, 40h		; offset for base function
 12649 00000CE5 2E3A04                  		cmp	al, [cs:si]
 12650 00000CE8 7712                    		ja	short IoctlFuncErr
 12651 00000CEA 98                      		cbw
 12652 00000CEB D1E0                    		shl	ax, 1
 12653 00000CED 46                      		inc	si
 12654 00000CEE 01C6                    		add	si, ax
 12655 00000CF0 2EFF14                  		call	near [cs:si]
 12656                                  		;call	word ptr cs:[si]
 12657 00000CF3 2E8E1E[3000]            		mov	ds, [cs:BIOSDATAWORD]
 12658                                  		;mov	ds, word ptr cs:BIOSDATAWORD ; [cs:Bios_Data_Word]
 12659                                  					; 2C7h:30h = 70h:25A0h
 12660 00000CF8 B481                    		mov	ah, 81h		; Return this status in	case of	carry
 12661 00000CFA C3                      		retn			; Pass carry flag through to exit code
 12662                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 12663                                  
 12664                                  		; Cmd_Error_Proc is called as a procedure and also use
 12665                                  		; as a fall through from above
 12666                                  Cmd_Error_Proc:				; 2C7h:0CA3h = 70h:3213h
 12667 00000CFB 5A                      		pop	dx

 12679                                  ;	majorcode=RAWIO, minorcode=GetDeviceParameters (60h)
 12680                                  ;
 12681                                  ;	ENTRY	(ES:di) = BDS for drive

 12906                                  ; 16/10/2022
 12907                                  
 12908                                  ; ==========================================================================
 12909                                  ; FormatTrack:
 12910                                  ; if specialfunction byte is 1,then this is a status call to see if there is
 12911                                  ; rom support for the combination of sec/trk and # of cyln,and if the
 12912                                  ; combination is legal. if specialfunction byte is 0,then format the track.
 12913                                  ;
 12914                                  ; input: ES:di points to bds for drive
 12915                                  ;
 12916                                  ; output:
 12917                                  ;	for status call:
 12918                                  ;	specialfunction byte set to:
 12919                                  ;		0 - rom support + legal combination
 12920                                  ;		1 - no rom support
 12921                                  ;		2 - illegal combination
 12922                                  ;		3 - no media present
 12923                                  ;	carry cleared.
 12924                                  ;
 12925                                  ;	for format track:
 12926                                  ;		carry set if error
 12927                                  ;
 12928                                  ; ==========================================================================
 12929                                  
 12930                                  ; 16/03/2019
 12931                                  
 12932                                  		; 19/10/2022
 12933                                  FormatTrack:
 12934 00000E1D C51E[1200]              		lds	bx, [ptrsav]
 12935 00000E21 C55F13                  		lds	bx, [bx+19]	; [bx+IOCTL_REQ.GENERICIOCTL_PACKET
 12936 00000E24 F60701                  		test	byte [bx], 1	; [bx+A_DEVICEPARAMETERS.DP_SPECIALFUNCTIONS]
 12937                                  					; STATUS_FOR_FORMAT
 12938 00000E27 740E                    		jz	short DoFormatTrack

 13083                                  		; specified if not we should go to the normal track verification
 13084                                  		; routine. If fast format has been specified we should get the

 13086                                  		; > 255. If it is then it is an error and we should go to

 13197                                  ; 16/10/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)
 13198                                  
 13199                                  ; ==========================================================================
 13200                                  ;
 13201                                  ; TrackIo:
 13202                                  ;    performs track read/write/verify
 13203                                  ;
 13204                                  ;   input:
 13205                                  ;      rFlag	- 2 = read
 13206                                  ;		  3 = write
 13207                                  ;		  4 = verify
 13208                                  ;      AX	- Index into track table of first sector to io
 13209                                  ;      CX	- Number of sectors to io
 13210                                  ;      Xfer_Seg:BX - Transfer address
 13211                                  ;      ES:DI	- Pointer to bds
 13212                                  ;      CurTrk	- Current cylinder
 13213                                  ;      CurHd	- Current head
 13214                                  ;
 13215                                  ; ==========================================================================
 13216                                  
 13217                                  ; 16/03/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 13218                                  		
 13219                                  		; 19/10/2022
 13220                                  TrackIo:	
 13221                                  					; Procedure `disk' will pop stack to
 13222 00000F75 8926[3501]              		mov	[spsav], sp	; SpSav	and return if error
 13223 00000F79 E84DF9                  		call	checksingle	; Ensure correct disk is in drv
 13224 00000F7C 803E[2706]01            		cmp	byte [media_set_for_format], 1
 13225                                  					; See if we have already set	disk

 13227 00000F83 50                      		push	ax		; set up tables	and variables for i/o

 13229 00000F85 E8CDFA                  		call	iosetup
 13230 00000F88 59                      		pop	cx
 13231 00000F89 58                      		pop	ax
 13232                                  Dptalreadyset:				; Point si at the table entry of the			
 13233 00000F8A BE[2A05]                		mov	si, tracktable	; first sector to be io'd
 13234 00000F8D D1E0                    		shl	ax, 1
 13235 00000F8F D1E0                    		shl	ax, 1

 13237                                  
 13238                                  		; WE WANT:
 13239                                  		; CX to	be the number of times we have to loop
 13240                                  		; DX to	be the number of sectors we read on each iteration
 13241                                  		
 13242 00000F93 BA0100                  		mov	dx, 1
 13243                                  		; 12/12/2022
 13244 00000F96 26F6452308              		test	byte [es:di+23h], 8

 13246                                  					; good_tracklayout

 13248

 13250                                  ionextsector:

 13252 00000FA0 52                      		push	dx

 13254 00000FA2 46                      		inc	si		; Skip over the	cylinder and head in
 13255                                  					; the track table

 13257 00000FA4 A2[3101]                		mov	[cursec], al

 13259                                  		; assumptions for a fixed disk multi-track disk	i/o
 13260                                  		; 1). In the input CX (# of sectors to go) to TrackIo,
 13261                                  		;     only CL is valid.

 13263                                  		; 3). Good track layout

 13273                                  						; Allow multi-track operation?

 13276 00000FB9 89D0                    		mov	ax, dx
 13277 00000FBB E819FB                  		call	Disk
 13278 00000FBE 5A                      		pop	dx
 13279 00000FBF 59                      		pop	cx

 13281 00000FC1 C3                      		retn

 13331                                  ;
 13332                                  ; The sector size in bytes needs to be converted to an index value for the ibm
 13333                                  ; rom. (0=>128,1=>256,2=>512,3=>1024). It is assumed that only these values
 13334                                  ; are permissible.

 13454                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 13455                                  
 13456                                  ; 16/10/2022
 13457                                  
 13458                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 13459                                  ;
 13460                                  ; Set Media Type for Format
 13461                                  ; Performs the int 13 with ah = 18h to see if the medium described in the
 13462                                  ; BPB area in the BDS can be handled by the rom.
 13463                                  ; On Input, ES:DI -> current BDS.
 13464                                  ; The status of the operation is returned in AL
 13465                                  ;
 13466                                  ;	- 0 - if the support is available,and the combination is valid.
 13467                                  ;	- 1 - no rom support
 13468                                  ;	- 2 - illegal combination
 13469                                  ;	- 3 - no media present (rom support exists but cannot determine now)
 13470                                  ;
 13471                                  ; Flags also may be altered. All other registers preserved.
 13472                                  ; If the call to rom returns no error,then the current Dpt is "replaced" by
 13473                                  ; the one returned by the rom. This is Done by changing the pointer in [Dpt]
 13474                                  ; to the one returned. the original pointer to the disk base table is stored
 13475                                  ; in TempDpt, until it is restored.
 13476                                  ;
 13477                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 13478                                  
 13479                                  		; 19/10/2022
 13480                                  SetMediaForFormat:	
 13481 00001055 51                      		push	cx
 13482 00001056 52                      		push	dx
 13483                                  
 13484                                  		; If we have a format error, then do not change Dpt, TempDpt.
 13485                                  		; but we need to call int 13h, ah=18h again.
 13486                                  
 13487 00001057 803E[2806]01            		cmp	byte [had_format_error], 1
 13488 0000105C 7425                    		jz	short SkipSaveDskAdr
 13489 0000105E 30C0                    		xor	al, al		; If already done return 0
 13490 00001060 803E[2706]01            		cmp	byte [media_set_for_format], 1
 13491 00001065 7502                    		jnz	short DoSetMediaForFormat
 13492 00001067 EB7D                    		jmp	SetMediaRet	; Media	already	set
 13493                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 13494                                  
 13495                                  DoSetMediaForFormat:			
 13496 00001069 06                      		push	es
 13497 0000106A 56                      		push	si
 13498                                  
 13499                                  		; 02/09/2023
 13500                                  		;mov	es, [zeroseg]	; Point to interrupt vectors

 13502 0000106D 8EC6                    		mov	es, si
 13503                                  
 13504 0000106F 26C4367800              		les	si, [es:DSKADR]
 13505                                  		;les	si, es:78h	; [es:DSKADR]
 13506                                  					; Get pointer to disk base table
 13507 00001074 8936[2D01]              		mov	[dpt], si
 13508 00001078 8C06[2F01]              		mov	[dpt+2], es	; Save pointer to table
 13509                                  
 13510                                  		; Initialize the head settle time to 0Fh. See the offsets
 13511                                  		; given in dskprm.inc.
 13512

 13515 00001082 07                      		pop	es
 13516                                  SkipSaveDskAdr:
 13517 00001083 268B4D25                		mov	cx, [es:di+25h]	; [es:di+BDS.cylinders]
 13518 00001087 49                      		dec	cx
 13519 00001088 80E503                  		and	ch, 3

 13521 0000108D D0CD                    		ror	ch, 1
 13522 0000108F 86E9                    		xchg	ch, cl
 13523 00001091 260A4D13                		or	cl, [es:di+13h]	; [es:di+BDS.secpertrack]
 13524 00001095 268A5504                		mov	dl, [es:di+4]	; [es:di+BDS.drivenum]
 13525 00001099 06                      		push	es
 13526 0000109A 1E                      		push	ds
 13527 0000109B 56                      		push	si
 13528 0000109C 57                      		push	di
 13529 0000109D B418                    		mov	ah, 18h
 13530 0000109F CD13                    		int	13h		; DISK - SET MEDIA TYPE	FOR FORMAT (AT model 3x9,XT2,XT286,PS)
 13531                                  					; DL = drive number, CH	= lower	8 bits of number of tracks, CL = sectors per track
 13532 000010A1 7231                    		jb	short FormaStatErr
 13533 000010A3 803E[2806]01            		cmp	byte [had_format_error], 1
 13534 000010A8 7423                    		jz	short skip_disk_base_setting
 13535 000010AA 06                      		push	es		; Save segment returned	by the rom
 13536                                  
 13537                                  		; 02/09/2023
 13538                                  		;mov	es, [zeroseg]	; Point	to interrupt vector segment
 13539 000010AB 31F6                    		xor	si, si
 13540 000010AD 8EC6                    		mov	es, si ; 0
 13541 000010AF 06                      		push	es ; * ; 02/09/2023
 13542                                  
 13543 000010B0 26C4367800              		les	si, [es:DSKADR]
 13544                                  		;les	si, es:78h	; [es:DSKADR] (Int 1Eh)
 13545                                  					; Get current disk base	table
 13546 000010B5 8936[2906]              		mov	[tempdpt], si

 13548

 13551                                  		;xor	si, si ; 0
 13552                                  		;mov	es, si

 13616                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 13617                                  ;
 13618                                  ; RESET THE DRIVE
 13619                                  ;
 13620                                  ; we also set [Step_Drv] to -1 to force the main disk routine to use the
 13621                                  ; slow head settle time for the next operation. this is because the reset
 13622                                  ; operation moves the head to cylinder 0,so we need to do a seek the next
 13623                                  ; time around - there is a problem with 3.5" drives in that the head does
 13624                                  ; not settle down in time,even for read operations!!

 13626                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------

 13629 000010E9 50                      		push	ax

 13634                                  		;cmp	byte [media_set_for_format], 1
 13635                                  					; Reset while formatting?
 13636 000010F1 7503                    		jnz	short ResetDisk_cont
 13637                                  					; Then verify operation in "fmt & vrfy"
 13638                                  		;mov	byte [had_format_error], 1 ; Might have failed.
 13639 000010F3 A2[2806]                		mov	[had_format_error], al ; 1
 13640                                  ResetDisk_cont:

 13644                                  					; DL = drive (if bit 7 is set both hard	disks and floppy disks reset)

 13646                                  					; Zap up the speed

 13654                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 13655                                  ;
 13656                                  ; This routine sets up the drive parameter table with the values needed for
 13657                                  ; format,does an int 13. values in Dpt are restored after a verify is done.
 13658                                  ;
 13659                                  ; on entry  -	ES:DI - points to bds for the drive
 13660                                  ;		Xfer_Seg:BX - points to trkbuf
 13661                                  ;		AL    - number of sectors
 13662                                  ;		AH    - int 13 function code
 13663                                  ;		CL    - sector number for verify
 13664                                  ;		DS    - Bios_Data
 13665                                  ;
 13666                                  ; ON EXIT   -	DS,DI,ES,BX remain unchanged.
 13667                                  ;		AX and flags are the results of the int 13
 13668                                  ;
 13669                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 13670                                  
 13671                                  		; 24/12/2023
 13672                                  		; 19/10/2022
 13673                                  ToRom:	
 13674 000010FF 53                      		push	bx
 13675 00001100 56                      		push	si
 13676

 13678                                  		; functionality to set up format, not merely if it exists.

 13694                                  		;mov	word ptr ds:dpt+2, es ;	Save pointer to table

 13700 00001127 A0[3B01]                		mov	al, [gap_patch]

 13728                                  ; 16/10/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)
 13729                                  
 13730                                  ; BIOSCODE:1124h (MSDOS 6.21, IO.SYS)
 13731                                  
 13732                                  ; ==========================================================================
 13733                                  ;
 13734                                  ; get the owner of the physical drive represented by the logical drive in al.
 13735                                  ; the assumption is that we **always** keep track of the owner of a drive!!
 13736                                  ; if this is not the case, the system may hang, just following the linked list.
 13737                                  ;
 13738                                  ; ==========================================================================
 13739                                  
 13740                                  		; 19/10/2022
 13741                                  ioctl_getown:
 13742 00001155 E812F4                  		call	SetDrive
 13743 00001158 268A4504                		mov	al, [es:di+4]	; [es:di+BDS.drivenum]
 13744                                  					; Get physical drive number
 13745 0000115C C43E[1901]              		les	di, [start_bds] ; Get start of bds chain
 13746                                  ownloop:				
 13747 00001160 26384504                		cmp	[es:di+4], al	; [es:di+BDS.drivenum]
 13748 00001164 7507                    		jnz	short getnextBDS
 13749                                  		; 10/12/2022
 13750 00001166 26F6452320              		test	byte [es:di+23h], 20h
 13751                                  		;test	word [es:di+23h], 20h ; [es:di+BDS.flags]
 13752                                  					; fi_own_physical
 13753 0000116B 7514                    		jnz	short exitown
 13754                                  getnextBDS:				
 13755 0000116D 26C43D                  		les	di, [es:di]	; [es:di+BDS.link]
 13756 00001170 EBEE                    		jmp	short ownloop
 13757                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 13758                                  
 13759                                  ; ==========================================================================
 13760                                  ;
 13761                                  ; set the ownership of the physical drive represented by the logical drive
 13762                                  ; in al to al.
 13763                                  ;
 13764                                  ; ==========================================================================
 13765                                  
 13766                                  		; 19/10/2022
 13767                                  ioctl_setown:
 13768 00001172 E8F5F3                  		call	SetDrive
 13769 00001175 C606[7A00]01            		mov	byte [fsetowner], 1
 13770                                  					; set flag for CheckSingle to look at.
 13771 0000117A E84CF7                  		call	checksingle
 13772                                  		; 02/09/2023
 13773 0000117D FE0E[7A00]              		dec	byte [fsetowner] ; 0
 13774                                  		;mov	byte [fsetowner], 0
 13775                                  					; set ownership	of drive reset flag
 13776                                  		; Fall into ExitOwn
 13777                                  
 13778                                  ; ==========================================================================
 13779                                  ;
 13780                                  ; if there is only one logical drive assigned to this physical drive, return
 13781                                  ; 0 to user to indicate this. Enter with ES:di -> the owner's bds.
 13782                                  ;
 13783                                  ; ==========================================================================
 13784                                  
 13785                                  exitown:				
 13786 00001181 30C9                    		xor	cl, cl
 13787                                  		; 12/12/2022
 13788 00001183 26F6452310              		test	byte [es:di+23h], 10h
 13789                                  		;test	word [es:di+23h], 10h ; [es:di+BDS.flags]
 13790                                  					; fi_am_mult
 13791 00001188 7406                    		jz	short exitnomult

 13793                                  					; Get logical drive number
 13794                                  					; Get it 1-based
 13795 0000118E FEC1                    		inc	cl
 13796                                  exitnomult:				
 13797 00001190 C51E[1200]              		lds	bx, [ptrsav]
 13798 00001194 884F01                  		mov	[bx+1],	cl	; [bx+unit]
 13799                                  					; Exit normal termination
 13800                                  		; 12/12/2022
 13801                                  		; cf=0
 13802                                  		;clc
 13803 00001197 C3                      		retn

 13809                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 13810                                  ;
 13811                                  ; moves the old Dpt that had been saved in TempDpt back to Dpt. this is done
 13812                                  ; only if the first byte of TempDpt is not -1.
 13813                                  ; all registers (including flags) are preserved.
 13814                                  ;
 13815                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------

 13819                                  RestoreOldDpt:
 13820                                  		; if we have already restored the disk base table earlier,
 13821                                  		; do not do it again.
 13822                                  
 13823 00001198 50                      		push	ax
 13824 00001199 30C0                    		xor	al, al
 13825 0000119B A2[2806]                		mov	[had_format_error], al	; Reset flag and

 13829 000011A6 56                      		push	si
 13830 000011A7 1E                      		push	ds
 13831 000011A8 06                      		push	es

 13835                                  		;mov	es, [cs:BIOSDATAWORD]
 13836                                  		;;mov	es, word ptr cs:BIOSDATAWORD ; [cs:Bios_Data_Word]

 13862                                  ; ==========================================================================
 13863                                  ;	get media id
 13864                                  ; ==========================================================================
 13865                                  ;
 13866                                  ; FUNCTION: get the volume label,the system id and the serial number from
 13867                                  ;	    the media that has the extended boot record.
 13868                                  ;	    for the conventional media,this routine will return "unknown
 13869                                  ;	    media type" error to dos.
 13870                                  ;
 13871                                  ; INPUT :   ES:di -> bds table for this drive.
 13872                                  ;
 13873                                  ; OUTPUT:   the request packet filled with the information,if not carry.
 13874                                  ;	    if carry set,then al contains the device driver error number
 13875                                  ;	    that will be returned to dos.
 13876                                  ;	    register DS,DX,AX,CX,DI,SI destroyed.
 13877                                  ;
 13878                                  ; SUBROUTINES TO BE CALLED:
 13879                                  ;	BootIo:NEAR
 13880                                  ;
 13881                                  ; LOGIC:
 13882                                  ;	to recognize the extended boot record,this logic will actually
 13883                                  ;	access the boot sector even if it is a hard disk.
 13884                                  ;	note:the valid extended bpb is recognized by looking at the mediabyte
 13885                                  ;	field of bpb and the extended boot signature.
 13886                                  ;
 13887                                  ; {
 13888                                  ;	get logical drive number from bds table;
 13889                                  ;	rFlag = read operation;
 13890                                  ;	BootIo;		 /*get the media boot record into the buffer
 13891                                  ;	if (no error) then
 13892                                  ;	     if (extended boot record) then
 13893                                  ;		{ set volume label,volume serial number and system id
 13894                                  ;		  of the request packet to those of the boot record;
 13895                                  ;		};
 13896                                  ;	     else		  /*not an extended bpb */
 13897                                  ;		{ set register al to "unknown media.." error code;
 13898                                  ;		  set carry bit;
 13899                                  ;		};
 13900                                  ;	else
 13901                                  ;	     ret;	/*already error code is set in the register al
 13902                                  ;
 13903                                  ; ==========================================================================
 13904                                  
 13905                                  ;size_of_EXT_BOOT_SERIAL equ 4
 13906                                  ;;size_of_EXT_BOOT_VOL_LABEL equ 11
 13907                                  ;;size_of_EXT_SYSTEM_ID equ 8
 13908                                  
 13909                                  		; 24/12/2023
 13910                                  		; 19/10/2022
 13911                                  GetMediaId:
 13912 000011C0 E89900                  		call	ChangeLineChk
 13913 000011C3 268A4505                		mov	al, [es:di+5]	; [es:di+BDS.drivelet] ; Logical drive number
 13914 000011C7 C606[2001]02            		mov	byte [rflag], 2	; Read operation
 13915 000011CC E87500                  		call	BootIo		; Read boot sector into	DiskSector
 13916 000011CF 7224                    		jb	short IOCtl_If1
 13917                                  					; Valid? (0F0h-0FFh?)
 13918 000011D1 803E[6301]F0            		cmp	byte [disksector+15h], 0F0h
 13919                                  					; [disksector+EXT_BOOT.BPB+EBPB.MEDIADESCRIPTOR]
 13920                                  		;jb	short IOCtl_If2	; brif not valid (0F0h - 0FFh)
 13921                                  		; 24/12/2023
 13922 000011D6 721B                    		jb	short IOCtl_If7	
 13923                                  
 13924                                  		; 10/12/2022
 13925 000011D8 BE[7401]                		mov	si, disksector+26h
 13926 000011DB 803C29                  		cmp	byte [si], 29h
 13927                                  		;cmp	byte [disksector+26h], 29h ; [disksector+EXT_BOOT.SIG]
 13928                                  					; EXT_BOOT_SIGNATURE
 13929 000011DE 7512                    		jnz	short IOCtl_If2	; not extended boot record
 13930 000011E0 C43E[1200]              		les	di, [ptrsav]	; es:di	points to request header
 13931 000011E4 26C47F13                		les	di, [es:bx+19]	; [es:bx+IOCTL_REQ.GENERICIOCTL_PACKET]
 13932                                  		; 10/12/2022
 13933 000011E8 46                      		inc	si
 13934                                  		; si = disksector+27h 
 13935                                  		;mov	si, disksector+27h ; disksector+EXT_BOOT.SERIAL
 13936 000011E9 83C702                  		add	di, 2		; A_MEDIA_ID_INFO.MI_SERIAL
 13937                                  IOCtl_If4:		; 24/12/2023
 13938 000011EC B91700                  		mov	cx, 23		; size_of_EXT_BOOT_SERIAL
 13939                                  					; L+size_of_EXT_BOOT_VOL_LABEL
 13940                                  					; +size_of_EXT_SYSTEM_ID
 13941 000011EF F3A4                    		rep movsb		; Move from Bios_Data into request packet
 13942                                  	
 13943                                  		; 10/12/2022
 13944                                  		; cf = 0
 13945                                  		;clc
 13946                                  
 13947 000011F1 C3                      		retn
 13948                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 13949                                  
 13950                                  		; 24/12/2023
 13951                                  IOCtl_If2:
 13952 000011F2 F9                      		stc	
 13953                                  IOCtl_If7:
 13954 000011F3 B007                    		mov	al, 7		; error_unknown_media
 13955                                  		;stc
 13956                                  IOCtl_If6:
 13957                                  IOCtl_If1:
 13958 000011F5 C3                      		retn

 13963                                  ; ==========================================================================
 13964                                  ;  set media id
 13965                                  ; ==========================================================================
 13966                                  
 13967                                  ; function: set the volume label, the system id and the serial number of
 13968                                  ;	    the media that has the extended boot record.
 13969                                  ;	    for the conventional media, this routine will return "unknown
 13970                                  ;	    media.." error to dos.
 13971                                  ;	    this routine will also set the corresponding informations in
 13972                                  ;	    the bds table.
 13973                                  ;
 13974                                  ; input :   ES:di -> bds table for this drive.
 13975                                  ;
 13976                                  ; output:   the extended boot record in the media will be set according to
 13977                                  ;	    the request packet.
 13978                                  ;	    if carry set, then al contains the device driver error number
 13979                                  ;	    that will be returned to dos.
 13980                                  ;
 13981                                  ; subroutines to be called:
 13982                                  ;	BootIo:NEAR
 13983                                  ;
 13984                                  ; logic:
 13985                                  ;
 13986                                  ; {
 13987                                  ;	get drive_number from bds;
 13988                                  ;	rFlag = "read operation";
 13989                                  ;	BootIo;
 13990                                  ;	if (no error) then
 13991                                  ;	     if (extended boot record) then
 13992                                  ;		{ set volume label,volume serial number and system id
 13993                                  ;		  of the boot record to those of the request packet;
 13994                                  ;		  rFlag = "write operation";
 13995                                  ;		  get drive number from bds;
 13996                                  ;		  BootIo;	  /*write it back*/
 13997                                  ;		};
 13998                                  ;	     else		  /*not an extended bpb */
 13999                                  ;		{ set register al to "unknown media.." error code;
 14000                                  ;		  set carry bit;
 14001                                  ;		  ret;	 /*return back to caller */
 14002                                  ;		};
 14003                                  ;	else
 14004                                  ;	     ret;		 /*already error code is set */
 14005                                  ;
 14006                                  ; ==========================================================================
 14007                                  
 14008                                  		; 24/12/2023
 14009                                  		; 19/10/2022
 14010                                  SetMediaId:
 14011 000011F6 E86300                  		call	ChangeLineChk
 14012 000011F9 268A4505                		mov	al, [es:di+5]	; [es:di+BDS.drivelet]
 14013                                  					; Logical drive	number
 14014 000011FD 88C2                    		mov	dl, al
 14015 000011FF C606[2001]02            		mov	byte [rflag], 2	; romread
 14016 00001204 52                      		push	dx
 14017 00001205 E83C00                  		call	BootIo		; Read boot sec	to Bios_Data:DiskSector
 14018 00001208 5A                      		pop	dx
 14019 00001209 72EA                    		jb	short IOCtl_If6
 14020                                  					; Valid? (0F0h-0FFh?)
 14021 0000120B 803E[6301]F0            		cmp	byte [disksector+15h], 0F0h
 14022                                  					; [disksector+EXT_BOOT.BPB+EBPB.MEDIADESCRIPTOR]
 14023 00001210 72E1                    		jb	short IOCtl_If7	; Brif not
 14024                                  		
 14025 00001212 803E[7401]29            		cmp	byte [disksector+26h], 29h ; [disksector+EXT_BOOT.SIG]
 14026                                  					; EXT_BOOT_SIGNATURE
 14027                                  		;jnz	short IOCtl_If7	; not extended boot record
 14028                                  		; 24/12/2023
 14029 00001217 75D9                    		jnz	short IOCtl_If2
 14030                                  
 14031 00001219 06                      		push	es		; Save BDS pointer
 14032 0000121A 57                      		push	di
 14033 0000121B 1E                      		push	ds		; Point	ES To boot record
 14034 0000121C 07                      		pop	es
 14035 0000121D BF[7501]                		mov	di, disksector+27h ; disksector+EXT_BOOT.SERIAL
 14036 00001220 C536[1200]              		lds	si, [ptrsav]	; ds:si	points to request header.
 14037 00001224 C57413                  		lds	si, [si+19]	; [si+IOCTL_REQ.GENERICIOCTL_PACKET]
 14038 00001227 83C602                  		add	si, 2		; A_MEDIA_ID_INFO.MI_SERIAL
 14039                                  
 14040                                  		; 24/12/2023
 14041                                  		;mov	cx, 23		; size_of_EXT_BOOT_SERIAL
 14042                                  		;			; +size_of_EXT_BOOT_VOL_LABEL
 14043                                  		;			; +size_of_EXT_SYSTEM_ID
 14044                                  		;rep movsb
 14045 0000122A E8BFFF                  		call	IOCtl_If4       ; copy volume serial, label and system id
 14046                                  
 14047 0000122D 06                      		push	es		; point	ds back	to Bios_Data
 14048 0000122E 1F                      		pop	ds
 14049 0000122F 5F                      		pop	di		; restore bds pointer
 14050 00001230 07                      		pop	es
 14051 00001231 E891F5                  		call	mov_media_ids	; update the bds media id info.
 14052 00001234 88D0                    		mov	al, dl
 14053 00001236 C606[2001]03            		mov	byte [rflag], 3	; romwrite
 14054 0000123B E80600                  		call	BootIo		; write	it back.
 14055 0000123E C606[1E01]FF            		mov	byte [tim_drv], 0FFh
 14056                                  					; make sure chk_media check the driver
 14057                                  					; return with error code from BootIo
 14058 00001243 C3                      		retn
 14059                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14060

 14065                                  ;IOCtl_If6:
