 14068                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 14069                                  
 14070                                  ; 16/10/2022
 14071                                  
 14072                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14073                                  ;	BootIo
 14074                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14075                                  ;
 14076                                  ; function: read/write the boot record into boot sector.
 14077                                  ;
 14078                                  ; input :
 14079                                  ;	    al=logical drive number
 14080                                  ;	    rFlag = operation (read/write)
 14081                                  ;
 14082                                  ; output:   for read operation,the boot record of the drive specified in bds
 14083                                  ;	    be read into the DiskSector buffer.
 14084                                  ;	    for write operation,the DiskSector buffer image will be written
 14085                                  ;	    to the drive specified in bds.
 14086                                  ;	    if carry set,then al contains the device driver error number
 14087                                  ;	    that will be returned to dos.
 14088                                  ;	    AX,CX,DX register destroyed.
 14089                                  ;	    if carry set,then al will contain the error code from DiskIO.
 14090                                  ;
 14091                                  ; subroutines to be called:
 14092                                  ;	DiskIO:NEAR
 14093                                  ;
 14094                                  ; logic:
 14095                                  ;
 14096                                  ; {
 14097                                  ;	first_sector = 0;	 /*logical sector 0 is the boot sector */
 14098                                  ;	sectorcount = 1;	 /*read 1 sector only */
 14099                                  ;	buffer = DiskSector;	 /*read it into the DiskSector buffer */
 14100                                  ;	call DiskIO (rFlag,drive_number,first_sector,sectorcount,buffer);
 14101                                  ; }
 14102                                  ; ==========================================================================
 14103                                  
 14104                                  		; 19/10/2022
 14105                                  BootIo:	
 14106 00001244 06                      		push	es
 14107 00001245 57                      		push	di
 14108 00001246 53                      		push	bx
 14109 00001247 1E                      		push	ds
 14110 00001248 07                      		pop	es		; Point ES: to Bios_Data
 14111                                  
 14112                                  		; Call DiskIO to read/write the boot sec. The parameters which
 14113                                  		; need to be initialized for this subroutine out here are
 14114                                  		; - Transfer address to Bios_Data:DiskSector
 14115                                  		; - Low sector needs to be initalized to 0. this is a reg. param
 14116                                  		; - Hi sector in [Start_Sec_H] needs to be initialised to 0.
 14117                                  		; - Number of sectors <-- 1
 14118                                  
 14119 00001249 BF[4E01]                		mov	di, disksector	; es:di -> transfer address
 14120 0000124C 31D2                    		xor	dx, dx		; First	sector (h) -> 0
 14121 0000124E 8916[1C05]              		mov	[start_sec_h], dx ; Start sector (h) -> 0
 14122 00001252 B90100                  		mov	cx, 1
 14123 00001255 E8FBF6                  		call	diskio
 14124 00001258 5B                      		pop	bx
 14125 00001259 5F                      		pop	di
 14126 0000125A 07                      		pop	es
 14127 0000125B C3                      		retn
 14128                                  
 14129                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 14130                                  
 14131                                  ; 16/10/2022
 14132                                  
 14133                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14134                                  ;	ChangeLineChk
 14135                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14136                                  ;
 14137                                  ; when the user calls get/set media id call before dos establishes the media
 14138                                  ; by calling "media_chk",the change line activity of the drive is going to be
 14139                                  ; lost.	this routine will check the change line activity and will save the
 14140                                  ; history in the flags.
 14141                                  ;
 14142                                  ; FUNCTION: check the change line error activity
 14143                                  ;
 14144                                  ; INPUT :  ES:di -> bds table.
 14145                                  ;
 14146                                  ; OUTPUT:   flag in bds table will be updated if change line occurs.
 14147                                  ;
 14148                                  ; SUBROUTINES TO BE CALLED:
 14149                                  ;	Set_Changed_DL
 14150                                  ;
 14151                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14152                                  
 14153                                  ChangeLineChk:	
 14154 0000125C 268A5504                		mov	dl, [es:di+4]	; [es:di+BDS.drivenum]
 14155 00001260 08D2                    		or	dl, dl		; Fixed	disk?
 14156 00001262 7821                    		js	short ChangeLnChkRet ; Yes, skip it.
 14157                                  		; 12/12/2022
 14158 00001264 26F6452304              		test	byte [es:di+23h], 4
 14159                                  		;test	word [es:di+23h], 4 ; [es:di+BDS.flags]
 14160                                  					; return_fake_bpb
 14161 00001269 751A                    		jnz	short ChangeLnChkRet
 14162 0000126B 803E[7700]01            		cmp	byte [fhave96], 1	; This rom support change line?
 14163 00001270 7513                    		jnz	short ChangeLnChkRet
 14164 00001272 E8EA06                  		call	haschange	; This drive support change line?
 14165 00001275 740E                    		jz	short ChangeLnChkRet ; Do nothing
 14166                                  
 14167                                  		; Execute the rom disk interrupt to check changeline activity.
 14168                                  
 14169 00001277 B416                    		mov	ah, 16h
 14170 00001279 CD13                    		int	13h		; DISK - FLOPPY	DISK - CHANGE OF DISK STATUS (AT,XT2,XT286,CONV,PS)
 14171                                  					; DL = drive to	check
 14172                                  					; Return: AH = disk change status
 14173 0000127B 7308                    		jnb	short ChangeLnChkRet
 14174 0000127D 53                      		push	bx
 14175 0000127E BB4000                  		mov	bx, 40h		; fchanged
 14176                                  					; Update flag in BDS for this
 14177                                  					; physical drive
 14178 00001281 E8B406                  		call	set_changed_dl
 14179 00001284 5B                      		pop	bx
 14180                                  ChangeLnChkRet:				
 14181 00001285 C3                      		retn
 14182

 14187                                  ; ==========================================================================
 14188                                  ;	GetAccessFlag
 14189                                  ; ==========================================================================
 14190                                  ;
 14191                                  ; FUNCTION: get the status of UNFORMATTED_MEDIA bit of flags in bds table
 14192                                  ;

 14204                                  		;mov	al, 0		; Assume result	is unformatted
 14205                                  		; 10/12/2022

 14210                                  					; unformatted_media
 14211 00001294 7501                    		jnz	short GafDone	; Done if unformatted

 14213                                  		; 24/12/2023
 14214 00001296 40                      		inc	ax
 14215                                  GafDone:
 14216 00001297 884701                  		mov	[bx+1],	al	; [bx+A_DISKACCESS_CONTROL.DAC_ACCESS_FLAG]
 14217 0000129A C3                      		retn

 14254                                  ; ==========================================================================
 14255                                  ; Ioctl_Support_Query
 14256                                  ; ==========================================================================
 14257                                  ;
 14258                                  ; New device command which was added in DOS 5.00 to allow a query of a 
 14259                                  ; specific GENERIC IOCtl to see if it is supported. Bit 7 in the
 14260                                  ; device attributes specifies if this function is supported.
 14261                                  ;
 14262                                  ; ==========================================================================
 14263                                  
 14264                                  		; 19/10/2022
 14265                                  ioctl_support_query:
 14266 000012B3 06                      		push	es
 14267 000012B4 C41E[1200]              		les	bx, [ptrsav]	; ES:BX Points to request header.
 14268 000012B8 268B470D                		mov	ax, [es:bx+13]	; [es:bx+IOCTL_REQ.MAJORFUNCTION]
 14269                                  					; AL ==	Major, AH == Minor
 14270                                  
 14271                                  		; 02/09/2023 (PCDOS 7.1)
 14272                                  		;cmp	al, 48h		; IOC_NEW_DC (PCDOS 7.1)
 14273                                  		;			; new generic ioctl function (FAT32)
 14274                                  		;jz	short ioctl_support
 14275                                  
 14276 000012BC 3C08                    		cmp	al, 8		; IOC_DC
 14277                                  					; See if major code is 8
 14278 000012BE 7513                    		jnz	short nosupport
 14279                                  ioctl_support:
 14280 000012C0 0E                      		push	cs
 14281 000012C1 07                      		pop	es
 14282                                  		; 02/09/2023
 14283                                  		;mov	cx, 14          ; (PCDOS 7.1) IOC_DC_TABLE_LEN
 14284 000012C2 B90B00                  		mov	cx, 11		; IOC_DC_TABLE_LEN
 14285                                  		; 10/12/2022
 14286 000012C5 BF[B80C]                		mov	di, IOC_DC_Table
 14287                                  		;mov	di, 0C60h	; IOC_DC_Table
 14288                                  					; at 2C7h:0C60h	= 70h:31D0h
 14289 000012C8 86C4                    		xchg	al, ah		; Put minor code in AL
 14290 000012CA F2AE                    		repne scasb		; Scan for minor code in AL
 14291 000012CC 7505                    		jnz	short nosupport	; it was not found
 14292 000012CE B80001                  		mov	ax, 100h
 14293                                  		; 10/12/2022
 14294                                  		; (jump to ioctlsupexit is not required)
 14295                                  		;jmp	short $+2	; ioctlsupexit
 14296                                  					; Signal ioctl is supported
 14297                                  		;;jmp	short ioctlsupexit
 14298                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14299                                  ioctlsupexit:
 14300 000012D1 07                      		pop	es
 14301                                  		; 10/12/2022
 14302                                  		; cf = 0
 14303                                  		;clc
 14304 000012D2 C3                      		retn
 14305                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14306                                  nosupport:
 14307 000012D3 07                      		pop	es
 14308 000012D4 E9FEED                  		jmp	bc_cmderr

 14313                                  ; ==========================================================================
 14314                                  ;	GetMediaSenseStatus
 14315                                  ; ==========================================================================
 14316                                  ;
 14317                                  ; FUNCTION: Will return the type of diskette media in the specified DOS
 14318                                  ;	    diskette drive and whether the media is the default type
 14319                                  ;	    for that drive. (default type means the max size for that
 14320                                  ;	    drive)
 14321                                  ;
 14322                                  ; INPUT :   ES:DI -> BDS table
 14323                                  ; OUTPUT:   If carry clear
 14324                                  ;	    DS:BX -> Updated IOCtlPacket
 14325                                  ;
 14326                                  ;			 Special Function at offset 0:
 14327                                  ;				0	- Media detected is not default type
 14328                                  ;				1	- Media detected is default type
 14329                                  ;
 14330                                  ;			 Device Type at offset 1:
 14331                                  ;				2       - 720K 3.5" 80 tracks
 14332                                  ;				7	- 1.44M 3.5" 80 tracks
 14333                                  ;				9	- 2.88M 3.5" 80 tracks
 14334                                  ;
 14335                                  ; Error Codes returned in AX if carry set:
 14336                                  ;
 14337                                  ; 8102 - Drive not ready	- No disk is in the drive.
 14338                                  ; 8107 - Unknown media type	- Drive doesn't support this function or
 14339                                  ;				  the media is really unkown, any error
 14340                                  ;				  other than "media not present"
 14341                                  ; 
 14342                                  ; ==========================================================================
 14343                                  
 14344                                  		; 19/10/2022
 14345                                  SenseMediaType:				
 14346 000012D7 C51E[1200]              		lds	bx, [ptrsav]	; DS:BX	points to request header.
 14347 000012DB C55F13                  		lds	bx, [bx+19]	; bx+IOCTL_REQ.GENERICIOCTL_PACKET]
 14348                                  		; 10/10/2022
 14349                                  		;mov	word [bx], 0	; Initialize the 2 packet bytes
 14350 000012DE 31D2                    		xor	dx, dx
 14351 000012E0 8917                    		mov	[bx], dx ; 0
 14352                                  		;
 14353 000012E2 268A5504                		mov	dl, [es:di+4]	; [es:di+BDS.drivenum]
 14354                                  					; Get int 13h drive number from	BDS
 14355                                  		; 10/12/2022
 14356                                  		;xor	dh, dh		; DX = physical	drive number
 14357 000012E6 B420                    		mov	ah, 20h		; Get Media Type function
 14358                                  					; If no	carry media type in AL
 14359 000012E8 CD13                    		int	13h		; DISK - QCACHE	- DISMOUNT
 14360 000012EA 7216                    		jb	short MediaSenseEr ; error code	in AH
 14361 000012EC FE07                    		inc	byte [bx]	; Signal media type is default (bit 1)
 14362                                  DetermineMediaType:			
 14363 000012EE FEC8                    		dec	al
 14364 000012F0 3C02                    		cmp	al, 2		; Chk for 720K ie: (3-1) = 2
 14365 000012F2 740A                    		jz	short GotMediaType
 14366 000012F4 0404                    		add	al, 4
 14367 000012F6 3C07                    		cmp	al, 7		; Chk for 1.44M ie: (4-1+4) = 7
 14368 000012F8 7404                    		jz	short GotMediaType
 14369 000012FA 3C09                    		cmp	al, 9		; Chk for 2.88M	ie: (6-1+4) = 9
 14370 000012FC 7510                    		jnz	short UnknownMediaType ; Just didn't recognize media type
 14371                                  GotMediaType:				
 14372 000012FE 884701                  		mov	[bx+1],	al	; Save the return value
 14373                                  		; 10/12/2022
 14374                                  		; cf = 0
 14375                                  		;clc			; Signal success
 14376 00001301 C3                      		retn
 14377                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14378                                  
 14379                                  MediaSenseEr:				
 14380 00001302 80FC32                  		cmp	ah, 32h		; See if not default media error
 14381 00001305 74E7                    		jz	short DetermineMediaType ; Not really an error
 14382 00001307 B002                    		mov	al, 2		; Now assume drive not ready
 14383 00001309 80FC31                  		cmp	ah, 31h		; See if media was present
 14384 0000130C 7402                    		jz	short SenseErrExit ; Return drive not ready
 14385                                  UnknownMediaType:			
 14386 0000130E B007                    		mov	al, 7		; Just don't know the media type
 14387                                  SenseErrExit:				
 14388 00001310 B481                    		mov	ah, 81h		; Signal error return
 14389 00001312 F9                      		stc
 14390 00001313 C3                      		retn
 14391                                  
 14392                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14393                                  		; 10/12/2022
 14394                                  		;db    0
 14395                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14396                                  
 14397                                  ; 16/10/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)
 14398                                  
 14399                                  ;-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14400                                  ; MSINT13.ASM - MSDOS 6.0 - 1991
 14401                                  ;-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14402                                  ; 16/03/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 14403                                  
 14404                                  ;	int 2f function 13h allows the user to change the orig13 int_13 vector
 14405                                  ;	after booting. this allows testing and implementation of custom int_13
 14406                                  ;	handlers, without giving up ms-dos error recovery
 14407                                  ;	entry:	ds:dx	== addr. of new int_13 handler
 14408                                  ;		es:bx	== addr. of new int_13 vector used by warm boot (int19)
 14409                                  ;	exit:	orig13	== address of new int_13 handler
 14410                                  ;		ds:dx	== old orig13 value
 14411                                  ;		es:bx	== old old13  value
 14412                                  ;
 14413                                  ; int 2f handler for external block drivers to communicate with the internal
 14414                                  ; block driver in msdisk. the multiplex number chosen is 8. the handler
 14415                                  ; sets up the pointer to the request packet in [ptrsav] and then jumps to
 14416                                  ; dsk_entry, the entry point for all disk requests.
 14417                                  ;
 14418                                  ; on exit from this driver, we will return to the external driver
 14419                                  ; that issued this int 2f, and can then remove the flags from the stack.
 14420                                  ; this scheme allows us to have a small external device driver, and makes
 14421                                  ; the maintainance of the various drivers (driver and msbio) much easier,
 14422                                  ; since we only need to make changes in one place (most of the time).
 14423                                  ;
 14424                                  ;   ax=800h - check for installed handler - reserved
 14425                                  ;   ax=801h - install the bds into the linked list
 14426                                  ;   ax=802h - dos request
 14427                                  ;   ax=803h - return bds table starting pointer in ds:di
 14428                                  ;	   (ems device driver hooks int 13h to handle 16kb dma overrun
 14429                                  ;	    problem. bds table is going to be used to get head/sector
 14430                                  ;	    informations without calling generic ioctl get device parm call.)
 14431                                  
 14432                                  ;BIOSSEGMENT equ 70h
 14433                                  DOSBIOSSEG equ 0070h ; 17/10/2022	
 14434                                  
 14435                                  ;;BIOSCODE:1302h (MSDOS 6.21, IO.SYS)
 14436                                  
 14437                                  i2f_handler:				; here is 02C7h:1302h =	0070h:3872h
 14438 00001314 80FC13                  		cmp	ah, 13h
 14439 00001317 7413                    		jz	short int2f_replace_int13
 14440 00001319 80FC08                  		cmp	ah, 8
 14441 0000131C 7431                    		jz	short mine
 14442                                  
 14443                                  ; Check for WIN386 startup and return the BIOS instance data
 14444                                  
 14445 0000131E 80FC16                  		cmp	ah, 16h		; MultWin386
 14446 00001321 746C                    		jz	short win386call
 14447 00001323 80FC4A                  		cmp	ah, 4Ah		; multMULT
 14448 00001326 7503                    		jnz	short i2f_handler_iret
 14449 00001328 E99700                  		jmp	handle_multmult
 14450                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14451                                  
 14452                                  i2f_handler_iret:			
 14453 0000132B CF                      		iret
 14454                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14455

 14461                                  					; = [02C7h:0030h] = [0070h:25A0h]
 14462 0000132F 2E8E1E[3000]            		mov	ds, [cs:BIOSDATAWORD] ; 17/10/2022
 14463                                  		; 19/10/2022
 14464                                  		;push	word ptr ds:Orig13	; save old value of old13 and
 14465                                  		;push	word ptr ds:Orig13+2	; orig13 so that we can
 14466                                  		;push	word ptr ds:Old13	; return them to caller
 14467                                  		;push	word ptr ds:Old13+2
 14468                                  		
 14469                                  		; 02/09/2023 (PCDOS 7.1)
 14470                                  		;push	word [Orig13]
 14471 00001334 FF36[B600]              		push	word [Orig13+2]
 14472                                  		;push	word [Old13]
 14473 00001338 FF36[0801]              		push	word [Old13+2]
 14474                                  
 14475                                  		;mov	word ptr ds:Orig13, dx	; orig13 := addr. of new int_13
 14476                                  		;mov	word ptr ds:Orig13+2, ax
 14477                                  		;mov	word ptr ds:Old13, bx	; old13 := addr. of new boot_13
 14478                                  		;mov	word ptr ds:Old13+2, es
 14479                                  		
 14480                                  		;mov	[Orig13], dx
 14481                                  		; 02/09/2023
 14482 0000133C 8716[B400]              		xchg	dx, [Orig13]
 14483 00001340 A3[B600]                		mov	[Orig13+2], ax

 14485                                  		; 02/09/2023
 14486 00001343 871E[0601]              		xchg	bx, [Old13]
 14487 00001347 8C06[0801]              		mov	[Old13+2], es

 14490                                  		; 02/09/2023

 14493                                  		;pop	dx ; 02/09/2023
 14494 0000134D 58                      		pop	ax
 14495                                  i2f_iret:

 14539                                  					;  to be careful to do a popf

 14574                                  
 14575                                  ; WIN386 startup stuff is done here. If starting up we set our WIN386 present
 14576                                  ; flag and return instance data. If exiting, we reset the WIN386 present flag
 14577                                  ; NOTE: We assume that the BIOS int 2fh is at the bottom of the chain.
 14578                                  
 14579                                  win386call:				
 14580 0000138F 1E                      		push	ds
 14581 00001390 2E8E1E[3000]            		mov	ds, [cs:BIOSDATAWORD]
 14582                                  		;mov	ds, word ptr cs:BIOSDATAWORD ; [cs:Bios_Data_Word]
 14583                                  					; at 2C7h:30h =	70h:25A0h

 14585                                  					; is it	win386 initializing?

 14587 00001399 3C06                    		cmp	al, 6		; Win386_Exit
 14588                                  					; is it	win386 exiting?
 14589 0000139B 7523                    		jnz	short win_iret	; if not, continue int2f chain
 14590                                  		; 12/12/2022
 14591 0000139D F6C201                  		test	dl, 1
 14592                                  		;test	dx, 1		; is it	win386 or win286 dos extender?
 14593 000013A0 751E                    		jnz	short win_iret	; if not win386, then continue
 14594                                  		;and	ds:IsWin386, 0	; indicate that	win386 is not present  
 14595 000013A2 8026[6608]00            		and	byte [IsWin386], 0

 14617                                  		;jmp	short i2f_iret	; return back up the chain

 14622                                  handle_multmult:

 14626 000013C7 E84500                  		call	HMAPtr		; get offset of free HMA
 14627                                  		; 10/12/2022
 14628                                  		;xor	bx, bx
 14629                                  		;dec	bx
 14630 000013CA BBFFFF                  		mov	bx, 0FFFFh
 14631 000013CD 8EC3                    		mov	es, bx		; seg of HMA
 14632 000013CF 89FB                    		mov	bx, di
 14633 000013D1 F7D3                    		not	bx
 14634 000013D3 09DB                    		or	bx, bx
 14635 000013D5 7401                    		jz	short try_1
 14636 000013D7 43                      		inc	bx
 14637                                  try_1:

 14639                                  		;jmp	short ii2f_iret

 14641 000013D9 CF                      		iret

 14643                                  
 14644                                  try_2:

 14646 000013DC 7530                    		jnz	short try_3

 14648                                  		; 10/12/2022
 14649                                  		;xor	di, di
