 15739                                  
 15740                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 15741                                  
 15742                                  ; 16/10/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)
 15743                                  
 15744                                  ;--------------------------------------------------------
 15745                                  ; include msbio.cl2 (MSDOS 6.0, 1991)
 15746                                  ;--------------------------------------------------------
 15747                                  ; (MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS BIOSCODE:17D5h)
 15748                                  ;--------------------------------------------------------
 15749                                  ; 17/03/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 15750                                  
 15751                                  		; MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS offset 0070h:3D38h or 02C7h:17C8h
 15752 000017C5 0D0A                    sngmsg:		db 0Dh,0Ah
 15753 000017C7 496E73657274206469-     		db 'Insert diskette for drive '
 15753 000017D0 736B6574746520666F-
 15753 000017D9 7220647269766520   
 15754                                  
 15755                                  		; MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS offset 0070h:3D54h or 02C7h:17E4h
 15756 000017E1 413A20616E64207072-     drvlet:		db 'A: and press any key when ready',0Dh,0Ah
 15756 000017EA 65737320616E79206B-
 15756 000017F3 6579207768656E2072-
 15756 000017FC 656164790D0A       
 15757 00001802 0A00                    		db 0Ah,0
 15758                                  
 15759                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 15760                                  
 15761                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 15762                                  ; input : es:di points to current bds for drive.
 15763                                  ; return : zero set if no open files
 15764                                  ;	   zero reset if open files
 15765                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 15766                                  
 15767                                  chkopcnt:		
 15768 00001804 26837D2000              		cmp	word [es:di+20h], 0 ; [es:di+BDS.opcnt]
 15769 00001809 C3                      		retn
 15770                                  
 15771                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 15772                                  
 15773                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 15774                                  ; at media check time, we need to really get down and check what the change is.
 15775                                  ; this is guaranteed to be expensive.
 15776                                  ;
 15777                                  ;	es:di -> bds, ds -> Bios_Data
 15778                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 15779                                  
 15780                                  mediacheck:	
 15781 0000180A E8BCF0                  		call	checksingle	; make sure correct disk is in place
 15782 0000180D 31F6                    		xor	si, si
 15783 0000180F E84D01                  		call	haschange
 15784 00001812 742F                    		jz	short mediaret
 15785 00001814 E83C01                  		call	checkromchange
 15786 00001817 752B                    		jnz	short mediadovolid
 15787 00001819 50                      		push	ax
 15788 0000181A 52                      		push	dx
 15789 0000181B 268A5504                		mov	dl, [es:di+4]	; [es:di+BDS.drivenum]
 15790                                  					; set logical drive number
 15791 0000181F B416                    		mov	ah, 16h
 15792 00001821 CD13                    		int	13h		; DISK - FLOPPY	DISK - CHANGE OF DISK STATUS (AT,XT2,XT286,CONV,PS)
 15793                                  					; DL = drive to	check
 15794                                  					; Return: AH = disk change status
 15795 00001823 5A                      		pop	dx
 15796 00001824 58                      		pop	ax
 15797 00001825 721D                    		jb	short mediadovolid
 15798 00001827 BE0100                  		mov	si, 1		; signal no change
 15799                                  
 15800                                  ; there are some drives with changeline that "lose" the changeline indication
 15801                                  ; if a different drive is accessed after the current one. in order to avoid
 15802                                  ; missing a media change, we return an "i don't know" to dos if the changeline
 15803                                  ; is not active and we are accessing a different drive from the last one.
 15804                                  ; if we are accessing the same drive, then we can safely rely on the changeline
 15805                                  ; status.
 15806                                  		; 19/10/2022
 15807 0000182A 8A1E[1E01]              		mov	bl, [tim_drv]	; get last drive accessed
 15808 0000182E 26385D04                		cmp	[es:di+4], bl	; [es:di+BDS.drivenum]
 15809                                  					; (If the last drive accessed is not current drive
 15810                                  					; media	change status may be incorrect.	So,
 15811                                  					; "I don't now" will be returned even if it is indicated
 15812                                  					; as media is not changed.)
 15813 00001832 740F                    		jz	short mediaret	; (same	drive,
 15814                                  					; media	changeline indication is reliable)
 15815                                  
 15816                                  ; do the 2 second twiddle. if time >= 2 seconds, do a volid check.
 15817                                  ; otherwise return "i don't know" (strictly speaking, we should return a
 15818                                  ; "not changed" here since the 2 second test said no change.)
 15819                                  
 15820 00001834 50                      		push	ax
 15821 00001835 51                      		push	cx
 15822 00001836 52                      		push	dx
 15823 00001837 E8B6ED                  		call	Check_Time_Of_Access
 15824 0000183A 5A                      		pop	dx
 15825 0000183B 59                      		pop	cx
 15826 0000183C 58                      		pop	ax
 15827 0000183D 09F6                    		or	si, si
 15828 0000183F 7403                    		jz	short mediadovolid ; check_time	says ">= 2 secs	passed"
 15829                                  					; (volume id will be checked)
 15830 00001841 31F6                    		xor	si, si		; return "i don't know"
 15831                                  mediaret:				
 15832 00001843 C3                      		retn
 15833                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 15834                                  
 15835                                  ; somehow the media was changed. look at vid to see. we do not look at fat
 15836                                  ; because this may be different since we only set medbyt when doing a read
 15837                                  ; or write.
 15838                                  
 15839                                  mediadovolid:				
 15840 00001844 E849EE                  		call	GetBp		; build	a new bpb in current bds
 15841 00001847 72FA                    		jb	short mediaret
 15842 00001849 E82D00                  		call	check_vid
 15843 0000184C 73F5                    		jnb	short mediaret
 15844 0000184E E9FDF3                  		jmp	maperror	; fix up al for	return to dos
 15845                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 15846                                  
 15847                                  ; simple, quick check of latched change. if no indication, then return
 15848                                  ; otherwise do expensive check. if the expensive test fails, pop off the
 15849                                  ; return and set al = 15 (for invalid media change) which will be returned to
 15850                                  ; dos.
 15851                                  ;
 15852                                  ; for dos 3.3, this will work only for the drive that has changeline.
 15853                                  
 15854                                  ;	call with es:di -> bds, ds -> Bios_Data
 15855                                  ;	***** warning:  this routine will return one level up on the stack
 15856                                  ;			if an error occurs!
 15857                                  
 15858                                  checklatchio:	
 15859                                  
 15860                                  ; if returning fake bpb then assume the disk has not changed
 15861                                  			
 15862 00001851 E8B0FF                  		call	chkopcnt
 15863 00001854 741B                    		jz	short checkret	; done if zero
 15864                                  
 15865                                  ; check for past rom indications. if no rom change indicated, then return ok.
 15866                                  
 15867 00001856 E8FA00                  		call	checkromchange
 15868 00001859 7416                    		jz	short checkret
 15869                                  
 15870                                  ; we now see that a change line has been seen in the past. let's do the
 15871                                  ; expensive verification.
 15872                                  
 15873 0000185B E832EE                  		call	GetBp		; build	bpb in current bds
 15874 0000185E 720F                    		jb	short ret_no_error_map ; getbp has already called maperror
 15875 00001860 E81600                  		call	check_vid
 15876 00001863 7207                    		jb	short checklatchret ; disk error trying	to read	in.
 15877 00001865 09F6                    		or	si, si		; is changed for sure?
 15878 00001867 7908                    		jns	short checkret
 15879 00001869 E87B00                  		call	returnvid
 15880                                  checklatchret:				
 15881 0000186C E8DFF3                  		call	maperror	; fix up al for	return to dos
 15882                                  ret_no_error_map:			
 15883 0000186F F9                      		stc
 15884 00001870 5E                      		pop	si		; pop off return address
 15885                                  checkret:				
 15886 00001871 C3                      		retn
 15887                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 15888                                  
 15889                                  ; check the fat and the vid. return in di -1 or 0. return with carry set
 15890                                  ; only if there was a disk error. return that error code in ax.
 15891                                  ;
 15892                                  ;	called with es:di -> bds, ds -> Bios_Data
 15893                                  
 15894                                  checkfatvid:				
 15895 00001872 E8BC01                  		call	fat_check	; check	the fat	and the	vid
 15896 00001875 09F6                    		or	si, si
 15897 00001877 7827                    		js	short changed_drv ;
 15898                                  
 15899                                  ; the fat was the same. fall into check_vid and check volume id.
 15900                                  
 15901                                  		; fall into check_vid
 15902                                  
 15903                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 15904                                  
 15905                                  ; now with the extended boot record, the logic should be enhanced.
 15906                                  ;
 15907                                  ; if it is the extended boot record, then we check the volume serial
 15908                                  ; number instead of volume id. if it is different, then set si to -1.
 15909                                  ;
 15910                                  ; if it is same, then si= 1 (no change).
 15911                                  ;
 15912                                  ; if it is not the extended boot record, then just follows the old
 15913                                  ; logic. dos 4.00 will check if the # of fat in the boot record bpb
 15914                                  ; is not 0.  if it is 0 then it must be non_fat based system and
 15915                                  ; should have already covered by extended boot structure checking.
 15916                                  ; so, we will return "i don't know" by setting si to 0.
 15917                                  ;
 15918                                  ; this routine assume the newest valid boot record is in cs:[disksector].
 15919                                  ; (this will be gauranteed by a successful getbp call right before this
 15920                                  ; routine.)
 15921                                  ;
 15922                                  ;	called with es:di -> bds, ds -> bds
 15923                                  
 15924                                  		; 19/10/2022
 15925                                  check_vid:
 15926                                  
 15927                                  ; check the disksector.EXT_BOOT_SIG variable for the extended
 15928                                  ; boot signature. if it is set then go to do the extended
 15929                                  ; id check otherwise continue with code below
 15930                                  
 15931 00001879 803E[7401]29            		cmp	byte [disksector+26h], 29h
 15932                                  					; [disksector+EXT_BOOT.SIG],
 15933                                  					; EXT_BOOT_SIGNATURE
 15934 0000187E 7427                    		jz	short do_ext_check_id
 15935 00001880 E8DC00                  		call	haschange
 15936 00001883 74EC                    		jz	short checkret
 15937 00001885 31F6                    		xor	si, si
 15938 00001887 803E[5E01]00            		cmp	byte [disksector+10h], 0 
 15939                                  					; [disksector+EXT_BOOT.BPB+EBPB.NUMBEROFFATS]
 15940 0000188C 7411                    		jz	short checkfatret ; don't read vol id
 15941                                  					; if not fat system
 15942 0000188E E8EE00                  		call	read_volume_id
 15943 00001891 720C                    		jb	short checkfatret
 15944 00001893 E89201                  		call	check_volume_id
 15945 00001896 BEFFFF                  		mov	si, 0FFFFh	; -1
 15946                                  					; definitely changed
 15947 00001899 7505                    		jnz	short changed_drv
 15948                                  
 15949 0000189B 46                      		inc	si		; not changed
 15950                                  vid_no_changed:				
 15951 0000189C E8BA00                  		call	resetchanged
 15952                                  		; 12/12/2022
 15953                                  		; cf=0 ('and' instruction in 'resetchanged' clears cf) 
 15954                                  		;clc
 15955                                  checkfatret:				
 15956 0000189F C3                      		retn
 15957                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 15958                                  
 15959                                  		; 12/12/2022
 15960                                  changed_drv:
 15961 000018A0 F8                      		clc			; cas -- return	no error
 15962 000018A1 C606[1E01]FF            		mov	byte  [tim_drv], 0FFh 
 15963                                  					; ensure that we ask rom for media
 15964 000018A6 C3                      		retn			; check	next time round
 15965                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 15966                                  
 15967                                  ; extended id check
 15968                                  
 15969                                  ; 16/10/2022
 15970                                  
 15971                                  ; the code to check extended id is basically a check to see if the
 15972                                  ; volume serial number is still the same. the volume serial number
 15973                                  ; previously read is in cs:disksector.EXT_BOOT_SERIAL
 15974                                  ; ds:di points to the bds of the drive under consideration.
 15975                                  ; the bds has fields containing the high and low words 
 15976                                  ; of the volume serial number of the media in the drive.
 15977                                  ; compare these fields to the fields mentioned above. if these fields
 15978                                  ; do not match the media has changed and so we should jump to the code
 15979                                  ; starting at ext_changed else return "i don't know" status
 15980                                  ; in the register used for the changeline status and continue executing
 15981                                  ; the code given below. for temporary storage use the register which
 15982                                  ; has been saved and restored around this block.
 15983                                  ;
 15984                                  ; bds fields in inc\msbds.inc
 15985                                  
 15986                                  		; 19/10/2022
 15987                                  do_ext_check_id:
 15988 000018A7 50                      		push	ax
 15989                                  		;mov	ax, word ptr ds:disksector+27h
 15990                                  					; [DiskSector+EXT_BOOT.SERIAL]
 15991 000018A8 A1[7501]                		mov	ax, [disksector+27h]
 15992                                  		; 02/09/2023
 15993 000018AB 31F6                    		xor	si, si ; 0
 15994 000018AD 263B4557                		cmp	ax, [es:di+57h]	; [di+BDS.vol_serial]
 15995 000018B1 750C                    		jnz	short ext_changed
 15996 000018B3 A1[7701]                		mov	ax, [disksector+29h] ; [DiskSector+EXT_BOOT.SERIAL+2]
 15997 000018B6 263B4559                		cmp	ax, [es:di+59h]	; [di+BDS.vol_serial+2]
 15998 000018BA 7503                    		jnz	short ext_changed
 15999                                  		;xor	si, si		; 0
 16000                                  					; don't know
 16001 000018BC 58                      		pop	ax
 16002 000018BD EBDD                    		jmp	short vid_no_changed
 16003                                  					; reset the flag
 16004                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 16005                                  
 16006                                  ext_changed:
 16007 000018BF 58                      		pop	ax
 16008                                  		; 02/09/2023
 16009 000018C0 4E                      		dec	si ; mov si, 0FFFFh ; -1
 16010                                  		;mov	si, 0FFFFh	; -1
 16011                                  					; disk changed!
 16012                                  		; 12/12/2022
 16013                                  		; ('changed_drv' clears cf)
 16014                                  		;clc
 16015 000018C1 EBDD                    		jmp	short changed_drv
 16016                                  
 16017                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 16018                                  
 16019                                  ; at i/o time, we detected the error. now we need to determine whether the
 16020                                  ; media was truly changed or not. we return normally if media change unknown.
 16021                                  ; and we pop off the call and jmp to harderr if we see an error.
 16022                                  ;
 16023                                  ; es:di -> bds
 16024                                  
 16025                                  checkio:				
 16026 000018C3 80FC06                  		cmp	ah, 6
 16027 000018C6 75D7                    		jnz	short checkfatret
 16028 000018C8 E839FF                  		call	chkopcnt
 16029 000018CB 74D2                    		jz	short checkfatret
 16030 000018CD E8C0ED                  		call	GetBp
 16031 000018D0 7212                    		jb	short no_error_map
 16032 000018D2 E89DFF                  		call	checkfatvid
 16033 000018D5 7209                    		jb	short checkioret ; disk	error trying to	read in.
 16034 000018D7 09F6                    		or	si, si		; is changed for sure?
 16035 000018D9 7802                    		js	short checkioerr ; yes changed
 16036 000018DB 45                      		inc	bp		; allow	a retry
 16037 000018DC C3                      		retn
 16038                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 16039                                  
 16040                                  checkioerr:				
 16041 000018DD E80700                  		call	returnvid
 16042                                  
 16043                                  checkioret:				
 16044 000018E0 F9                      		stc			; make sure carry gets passed through
 16045 000018E1 E91BF3                  		jmp	harderr
 16046                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 16047                                  
 16048                                  no_error_map:				
 16049 000018E4 E91BF3                  		jmp	harderr2
 16050                                  
 16051                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 16052                                  
 16053                                  ; return vid sets up the vid for a return to dos.
 16054                                  ;  es:di -> bds, returns pointer in packet to bds_volid
 16055                                  ;  **** trashes si! ****
 16056                                  
 16057                                  returnvid:		
 16058 000018E7 BE1600                  		mov	si, 22		; extra
 16059                                  					; offset into pointer to return	value
 16060 000018EA E80700                  		call	vid_into_packet
 16061 000018ED B406                    		mov	ah, 6
 16062 000018EF F9                      		stc
 16063 000018F0 C3                      		retn
 16064                                  
 16065                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 16066                                  
 16067                                  ; moves the pointer to the volid for the drive into the original request packet
 16068                                  ; no attempt is made to preserve registers.
 16069                                  ;
 16070                                  ; assumes es:di -> bds
 16071                                  ; **trashes si**
 16072                                  
 16073                                  media_set_vid:				
 16074 000018F1 BE0F00                  		mov	si, 15		; trans+1
 16075                                  					; return the value here	in packet
 16076                                  
 16077                                  		; fall into vid_into_packet
 16078                                  
 16079                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 16080                                  
 16081                                  ; return pointer to vid in bds at es:di in packet[si]
 16082                                  
 16083                                  		; 19/10/2022
 16084                                  vid_into_packet:
 16085 000018F4 1E                      		push	ds		; return pointer to vid	in bds at es:di	in packet[si]
 16086 000018F5 C51E[1200]              		lds	bx, [ptrsav]
 16087 000018F9 83C74B                  		add	di, 75		; BDS.volid
 16088 000018FC 8938                    		mov	[bx+si], di
 16089 000018FE 83EF4B                  		sub	di, 75		; BDS.volid
 16090 00001901 8C4002                  		mov	[bx+si+2], es
 16091 00001904 1F                      		pop	ds
 16092                                  dofloppy:	; 18/12/2022
 16093 00001905 C3                      		retn
 16094                                  
 16095                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 16096                                  
 16097                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 16098                                  ;   hidensity - examine a drive/media descriptor to set the media type. if
 16099                                  ;   the media descriptor is not f9 (not 96tpi or 3 1/2), we return and let the
 16100                                  ;   caller do the rest. otherwise, we pop off the return and jump to the tail
 16101                                  ;   of getbp. for 3.5" media, we just return.
 16102                                  ;
 16103                                  ;   inputs:	es:di point to correct bds for this drive
 16104                                  ;		ah has media byte
 16105                                  ;
 16106                                  ;   outputs:	carry clear
 16107                                  ;		    no registers modified
 16108                                  ;		carry set
 16109                                  ;		    al = sectors/fat
 16110                                  ;		    bh = number of root directory entries
 16111                                  ;		    bl = sectors per track
 16112                                  ;		    cx = number of sectors
 16113                                  ;		    dh = sectors per allocation unit
 16114                                  ;		    dl = number of heads
 16115                                  ;
 16116                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 16117                                  
 16118                                  hidensity:
 16119                                  
 16120                                  ; check for correct drive
 16121                                  		
 16122                                  		; 12/12/2022
 16123 00001906 26F6452302              		test	byte [es:di+23h], 2		
 16124                                  		;test	word [es:di+23h], 2 ; is it special?	
 16125                                  					; [es:di+BDS.flags], fchangeline
 16126 0000190B 74F8                    		jz	short dofloppy	; no, do normal floppy test
 16127                                  
 16128                                  ; we have a media byte that is pretty complex. examine drive information
 16129                                  ; table to see what kind it is.
 16130                                  
 16131 0000190D 26807D2202              		cmp	byte [es:di+22h], 2 ; is it single-media?
 16132 00001912 74F1                    		jz	short dofloppy	; [es:di+BDS.formfactor], ffSmall
 16133                                  					; yes, use fatid...
 16134                                  ; 96 tpi drive?
 16135 00001914 80FCF9                  		cmp	ah, 0F9h
 16136 00001917 75EC                    		jnz	short dofloppy
 16137                                  
 16138                                  ;------ If formfactor of drive = ffother or ff288 it has to be
 16139                                  ;------ a 720K diskette
 16140                                  
 16141                                  		; 02/09/2023 (PCDOS 7.1)
 16142 00001919 268A4522                		mov	al, [es:di+22h]	; [es:di+BDS.formfactor]
 16143 0000191D 3C07                    		cmp	al, 7
 16144                                  		;cmp	byte [es:di+22h], 7 ; [es:di+BDS.formfactor]
 16145                                  					; ffOther
 16146 0000191F 7413                    		jz	short Is720K
 16147 00001921 3C09                    		cmp	al, 9
 16148                                  		;cmp	byte [es:di+22h], 9 ; [es:di+BDS.formfactor]
 16149                                  					; ff288
 16150 00001923 740F                    		jz	short Is720K
 16151 00001925 B007                    		mov	al, 7		; seven	sectors	/ fat
 16152 00001927 BB0FE0                  		mov	bx, 57359	; 224*256+0Fh
 16153                                  					; 224 root dir entries
 16154                                  					; & 0Fh sector max
 16155 0000192A B96009                  		mov	cx, 2400	; 80*15*2
 16156                                  					; 80 tracks, 15 sectors/track,
 16157                                  					; 2 sides
 16158                                  		; 02/09/2023
 16159 0000192D 5A                      		pop	dx		; pop off return address
 16160 0000192E BA0201                  		mov	dx, 258		; 1*256+2
 16161                                  					; sectors/allocation unit
 16162                                  					; & head max
 16163                                  		;add	sp, 2		; pop off return address
 16164 00001931 E9C5ED                  		jmp	Has1		; return to tail of getbp
 16165                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 16166                                  
 16167                                  Is720K:
 16168                                  		; 02/09/2023
 16169 00001934 5B                      		pop	bx		; pop off return address	
 16170                                  		;add	sp, 2		; pop off return address
 16171 00001935 E98EED                  		jmp	Has720K		; return to 720K code
 16172                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 16173                                  
 16174                                  		; 18/12/2022
 16175                                  ;dofloppy:
 16176                                  		;retn
 16177                                  
 16178                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 16179                                  
 16180                                  ; 16/10/2022
 16181                                  
 16182                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 16183                                  ; set_changed_dl - sets flag bits according to bits set in bx.
 16184                                  ;		   essentially used to indicate changeline, or format.
 16185                                  ;
 16186                                  ;   inputs:	dl contains physical drive number
 16187                                  ;		bx contains bits to set in the flag field in the bdss
 16188                                  ;   outputs:	none
 16189                                  ;   registers modified: flags
 16190                                  ;
 16191                                  ;	called from int13 hooker.  Must preserve ALL registers!!!
 16192                                  ;
 16193                                  ; in the virtual drive system we *must* flag the other drives as being changed
 16194                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 16195                                  
 16196                                  set_changed_dl:	
 16197 00001938 06                      		push	es
 16198 00001939 57                      		push	di
 16199                                  		;les	di, ds:start_bds
 16200                                  		; 19/10/2022
 16201 0000193A C43E[1901]              		les	di, [start_bds]
 16202                                  
 16203                                  ; note: we assume that the list is non-empty
 16204                                  
 16205                                  scan_bds:				
 16206 0000193E 26385504                		cmp	[es:di+4], dl	; [es:di+BDS.drivenum]
 16207 00001942 7504                    		jnz	short get_next_bds
 16208                                  
 16209                                  ; someone may complain, but this *always* must be done when a disk change is
 16210                                  ; noted. there are *no* other compromising circumstances.
 16211                                  
 16212 00001944 26095D23                		or	[es:di+23h], bx	; [es:di+BDS.flags]
 16213                                  					; signal change	on other drive
 16214                                  get_next_bds:				
 16215 00001948 26C43D                  		les	di, [es:di]	; [es:di+BDS.link]
 16216                                  					; go to	next bds
 16217 0000194B 83FFFF                  		cmp	di, 0FFFFh
 16218 0000194E 75EE                    		jnz	short scan_bds	; loop unless we hit end of chain
 16219 00001950 5F                      		pop	di
 16220 00001951 07                      		pop	es
 16221 00001952 C3                      		retn
 16222                                  
 16223                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 16224                                  
 16225                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 16226                                  ; checkromchange - see if external program has diddled rom change line.
 16227                                  ;
 16228                                  ;   inputs:	es:di points to current bds.
 16229                                  ;   outputs:	zero set - no change
 16230                                  ;		zero reset - change
 16231                                  ;   registers modified: none
 16232                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 16233                                  
 16234                                  checkromchange:	
 16235                                  		;test	word [es:di+BDS.flags], fchanged ; 40h
 16236                                  		; 10/12/2022
 16237 00001953 26F6452340              		test	byte [es:di+23h], 40h
 16238                                  		;test	word [es:di+23h], 40h ; [es:di+BDS.flags]
 16239                                  					; fchanged
 16240 00001958 C3                      		retn
 16241                                  
 16242                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 16243                                  
 16244                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 16245                                  ; resetchanged - restore value of change line
 16246                                  ;
 16247                                  ;   inputs:	es:di points to current bds
 16248                                  ;   outputs:	none
 16249                                  ;   registers modified: none
 16250                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 16251                                  
 16252                                  resetchanged:	
 16253                                  		;and	word [es:di+BDS.flags], ~fchanged ; 0FFBFh	
 16254                                  		; 10/12/2022
 16255 00001959 26806523BF              		and	byte [es:di+23h], 0BFh
 16256                                  		;and	word [es:di+23h], 0FFBFh ; [es:di+BDS.flags]
 16257                                  					; ~fchanged
 16258 0000195E C3                      		retn
 16259                                  
 16260                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 16261                                  
 16262                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 16263                                  ; haschange - see if drive can supply change line
 16264                                  ;
 16265                                  ;   inputs:	es:di points to current bds
 16266                                  ;   outputs:	zero set - no change line available
 16267                                  ;		zero reset - change line available
 16268                                  ;   registers modified: none
 16269                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 16270                                  
 16271                                  haschange:
 16272                                  		;test	word [es:di+BDS.flags], fchangeline ; 2
 16273                                  		; 10/12/2022
 16274 0000195F 26F6452302              		test	byte [es:di+23h], 2		
 16275                                  		;test	word [es:di+23h], 2 ; [es:di+BDS.flags]
 16276                                  					; fchangeline
 16277 00001964 C3                      		retn
 16278                                  
 16279                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 16280                                  
 16281                                  ; 16/10/2022
 16282                                  
 16283                                  ;-------------------------------------------------------------------------
 16284                                  ; set_volume_id      -	main routine, calls other routines.
 16285                                  ; read_volume_id     -	read the volume id and tells if it has been changed.
 16286                                  ; transfer_volume_id -	copy the volume id from tmp to special drive.
 16287                                  ; check_volume_id    -	compare volume id in tmp area with one expected for drive.
 16288                                  ; fat_check          -	see of the fatid has changed in the specified drive.
 16289                                  ;-------------------------------------------------------------------------
 16290                                  
 16291                                  ; set_volume_id
 16292                                  ;   if drive has changeline support, read in and set the volume_id
 16293                                  ; and the last fat_id byte. if no change line support then do nothing.
 16294                                  ;
 16295                                  ;   on entry:
 16296                                  ;	es:di points to the bds for this disk.
 16297                                  ;	ah contains media byte
 16298                                  ;
 16299                                  ;   on exit:
 16300                                  ;	carry clear:
 16301                                  ;	   successful call
 16302                                  ;	carry set
 16303                                  ;	   error and ax has error code
 16304                                  
 16305                                  set_volume_id:				
 16306 00001965 52                      		push	dx		; save registers
 16307 00001966 50                      		push	ax
 16308 00001967 E8F5FF                  		call	haschange	; does drive have changeline support?
 16309 0000196A 740B                    		jz	short setvret	; no, get out
 16310 0000196C E81000                  		call	read_volume_id
 16311 0000196F 7209                    		jb	short seterr
 16312 00001971 E8A800                  		call	transfer_volume_id ; copy the volume id	to special drive
 16313 00001974 E8E2FF                  		call	resetchanged	; restore value	of change line
 16314                                  setvret:				
 16315                                  		; 10/12/2022
 16316                                  		; cf = 0
 16317                                  		;clc			; no error, clear carry flag
 16318 00001977 58                      		pop	ax		; restore registers
 16319 00001978 5A                      		pop	dx
 16320 00001979 C3                      		retn
 16321                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 16322                                  
 16323                                  seterr:					
 16324 0000197A 5A                      		pop	dx		; pop stack but don't overwrite ax
 16325 0000197B 5A                      		pop	dx		; restore dx
 16326 0000197C C3                      		retn
 16327                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 16328 0000197D 0000                    root_sec:	dw 0			; root sector #
 16329                                  
 16330                                  ; 16/10/2022
 16331                                  ;ROOTSEC equ root_sec - DOSBIOSEG_2C7h		
 16332                                  ; 09/12/2022
 16333                                  ROOTSEC equ root_sec
 16334                                  
 16335                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 16336                                  
 16337                                  ; 16/10/2022
 16338                                  
 16339                                  ; read_volume_id read the volume id and tells if it has been changed.
 16340                                  ;
 16341                                  ;   on entry:
 16342                                  ;	es:di points to current bds for drive.
 16343                                  ;
 16344                                  ;   on exit:
 16345                                  ;	carry clear
 16346                                  ;	    si = 1  no change
 16347                                  ;	    si = 0  ?
 16348                                  ;	    si = -1 change
 16349                                  ;
 16350                                  ;	carry set:
 16351                                  ;	    error and ax has error code.
 16352                                  
 16353                                  read_volume_id:
 16354 0000197F 52                      		push	dx		; preserve registers
 16355 00001980 51                      		push	cx
 16356 00001981 53                      		push	bx
 16357 00001982 50                      		push	ax
 16358 00001983 06                      		push	es		; stack the bds last
 16359 00001984 57                      		push	di
 16360 00001985 1E                      		push	ds		; point es to Bios_Data
 16361 00001986 07                      		pop	es
 16362 00001987 BF[A108]                		mov	di, tmp_vid	; "NO NAME	 "
 16363 0000198A BE[9508]                		mov	si, nul_vid	; "NO NAME	 "
 16364                                  		;mov	cx, 11		; PCDOS 7.1 - 02/09/2023
 16365 0000198D B90C00                  		mov	cx, 12		; initialize tmp_vid to	null vi_id
 16366 00001990 F3A4                    		rep movsb
 16367 00001992 5F                      		pop	di
 16368 00001993 07                      		pop	es
 16369 00001994 268A450B                		mov	al, [es:di+11]	; [es:di+BDS.fats]
 16370                                  					; # of fats
 16371 00001998 268B4D11                		mov	cx, [es:di+17]	; [es:di+BDS.fatsecs]
 16372                                  					; sectors / fat
 16373 0000199C F6E1                    		mul	cl		; size taken by	fats
 16374 0000199E 26034509                		add	ax, [es:di+9]	; [es:di+BDS.resectors]
 16375                                  					; add on reserved sectors
 16376                                  					;
 16377                                  					; ax is	now sector # (0	based)
 16378                                  		; 17/10/2022
 16379 000019A2 2EA3[7D19]              		mov	[cs:ROOTSEC], ax
 16380                                  		;mov	word ptr cs:198Fh, ax ; [cs:root_sec]
 16381                                  					; 0070h:3EFFh =	2C7h:198Fh
 16382 000019A6 268B450C                		mov	ax, [es:di+12]	; [es:di+BDS.direntries]
 16383                                  					; # root dir entries
 16384 000019AA B104                    		mov	cl, 4		; 16 entries/sector
 16385 000019AC D3E8                    		shr	ax, cl		; divide by 16
 16386                                  		;mov	cx, ax		; cx is	# of sectors to	scan
 16387                                  		; 02/09/2023 (PCDOS 7.1, one byte opcode)
 16388 000019AE 91                      		xchg	ax, cx		; cx is	# of sectors to	scan
 16389                                  next_sec:
 16390 000019AF 51                      		push	cx		; save outer loop counter
 16391 000019B0 2EA1[7D19]              		mov	ax, [cs:ROOTSEC]
 16392                                  		;mov	ax, word ptr cs:198Fh ; [cs:root_sec]
 16393                                  					; get sector #
 16394 000019B4 268B4D13                		mov	cx, [es:di+19]	; [es:di+BDS.secpertrack]
 16395                                  					; sectors / track
 16396 000019B8 31D2                    		xor	dx, dx
 16397 000019BA F7F1                    		div	cx
 16398                                  
 16399                                  ; set up registers for call to read_sector
 16400                                  
 16401 000019BC 42                      		inc	dx		; dx= sectors into track
 16402                                  					; ax= track count from 0
 16403 000019BD 88D1                    		mov	cl, dl		; sector to read
 16404 000019BF 31D2                    		xor	dx, dx
 16405 000019C1 26F77515                		div	word [es:di+21] ; [es:di+BDS.heads]
 16406                                  					; # heads on this disc
 16407 000019C5 88D6                    		mov	dh, dl		; head number
 16408 000019C7 88C5                    		mov	ch, al		; track	#
 16409 000019C9 E83BEE                  		call	read_sector	; get first sector of the root directory,
 16410                                  					; ds:bx	-> directory sector
 16411 000019CC 723F                    		jb	short readviderr
 16412 000019CE B91000                  		mov	cx, 16		; # of dir entries in a	block of root
 16413 000019D1 B008                    		mov	al, 8		; volume label bit
 16414                                  fvid_loop:
 16415                                  		; 02/09/2023 (PCDOS 7.1)
 16416 000019D3 382F                    		cmp	[bx], ch ; 0				
 16417                                  		;cmp	byte [bx], 0 ; end of dir?
 16418 000019D5 7433                    		jz	short no_vid	; yes, no vol id
 16419 000019D7 803FE5                  		cmp	byte [bx], 0E5h ; empty entry?
 16420 000019DA 7405                    		jz	short ent_loop	; yes, skip
 16421 000019DC 84470B                  		test	[bx+11], al	; is volume label bit set in fcb?
 16422 000019DF 750F                    		jnz	short found_vid	; jmp yes
 16423                                  ent_loop:
 16424 000019E1 83C320                  		add	bx, 32		; add length of	directory entry
 16425 000019E4 E2ED                    		loop	fvid_loop
 16426 000019E6 59                      		pop	cx		; outer loop
 16427 000019E7 2EFF06[7D19]            		inc	word [cs:ROOTSEC]
 16428                                  		;inc	word ptr cs:198Fh ; inc word [root_sec]
 16429                                  					; next sector
 16430 000019EC E2C1                    		loop	next_sec	; continue
 16431                                  notfound:
 16432                                  		; 02/09/2023
 16433                                  		;xor	si, si
 16434 000019EE EB13                    		jmp	short fvid_ret
 16435                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 16436                                  
 16437                                  found_vid:
 16438                                  		; 02/09/2023
 16439                                  		; cf = 0  ('test' instruction clears cf)  			
 16440 000019F0 59                      		pop	cx		; clean stack of outer loop counter
 16441 000019F1 89DE                    		mov	si, bx		; point	to volume_id
 16442 000019F3 06                      		push	es		; preserve current bds
 16443 000019F4 57                      		push	di
 16444 000019F5 1E                      		push	ds
 16445 000019F6 07                      		pop	es		; point es to Bios_Data
 16446 000019F7 BF[A108]                		mov	di, tmp_vid	; "NO NAME	 "
 16447 000019FA B90B00                  		mov	cx, 11		; VOLID_SIZ-1
 16448                                  					; length of string minus nul
 16449 000019FD F3A4                    		rep movsb		; mov volume label to tmp_vid
 16450                                  		;xor	al, al
 16451                                  		; 02/09/2023
 16452 000019FF 91                      		xchg	ax, cx		; ax = 0
 16453 00001A00 AA                      		stosb			; null terminate
 16454                                  		;;xor	si, si
 16455                                  		; 02/09/2023
 16456                                  		;xchg	ax, si		; si = 0
 16457 00001A01 5F                      		pop	di		; restore current bds
 16458 00001A02 07                      		pop	es
 16459                                  fvid_ret:
 16460                                  		; 02/09/2023
 16461 00001A03 31F6                    		xor	si, si ; 0
 16462                                  				
 16463 00001A05 58                      		pop	ax
 16464                                  		; 10/12/2022
 16465                                  		; cf = 0
 16466                                  		;clc
 16467                                  rvidret:
 16468 00001A06 5B                      		pop	bx		; restore registers
 16469 00001A07 59                      		pop	cx
 16470 00001A08 5A                      		pop	dx
 16471 00001A09 C3                      		retn
 16472                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 16473                                  
 16474                                  no_vid:
 16475 00001A0A 59                      		pop	cx		; clean stack of outer loop counter
 16476                                  		;jmp	short notfound	; not found
 16477                                  		; 02/09/2023
 16478 00001A0B EBF6                    		jmp	short fvid_ret
 16479                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 16480                                  
 16481                                  readviderr:
 16482 00001A0D 5E                      		pop	si		; trash the outer loop counter
 16483 00001A0E 5E                      		pop	si		; caller's ax, return error code instead 
 16484 00001A0F EBF5                    		jmp	short rvidret
 16485                                  
 16486                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 16487                                  		; 02/09/2023 - Retro DOS v4.2 (IO.SYS optimization)
 16488                                  		; PCDOS 7.1 - IBMBIO.COM - BIOSCODE:1DCFh 
 16489                                  preset_volid_addr:
 16490 00001A11 BE[A108]                		mov	si, tmp_vid	; "NO NAME    "
 16491                                  		;
 16492                                  		; PCDOS 7.1
 16493                                  		;add	di, 125		; BDS.volid
 16494                                  		;mov	cx, 11		; VOLID_SIZ (12 for MSDOS 5.0-6.22 versions)
 16495                                  		; MSDOS 6.21 (MSDOS 5.0 & 6.?)
 16496 00001A14 83C74B                  		add	di, 75		; BDS.volid
 16497 00001A17 B90C00                  		mov	cx, 12		; VOLID_SIZ
 16498                                  		;
 16499 00001A1A FC                      		cld
 16500 00001A1B C3                      		retn
 16501                                  
 16502                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 16503                                  
 16504                                  ; transfer_volume_id - copy the volume id from tmp to special drive
 16505                                  ;
 16506                                  ; inputs:	es:di has current bds
 16507                                  ; outputs:	bds for drive has volume id from tmp
 16508                                  
 16509                                  transfer_volume_id:
 16510 00001A1C 57                      		push	di		; copy the volume id from tmp to special drive
 16511                                  		;push	si
 16512 00001A1D 51                      		push	cx
 16513                                  		; 27/12/2023
 16514 00001A1E 56                      		push	si
 16515                                  
 16516                                  		;mov	si, tmp_vid	; "NO NAME	 "
 16517                                  		;;add	di, BDS.volid
 16518                                  		;add	di, 75		; BDS.volid
 16519                                  		;;mov	cx, VOLID_SIZ
 16520                                  		;mov	cx, 12		; VOLID_SIZ
 16521                                  		;cld
 16522                                  		; 02/09/2023 (PCDOS 7.1)
 16523 00001A1F E8EFFF                  		call	preset_volid_addr
 16524                                  
 16525 00001A22 F3A4                    		rep movsb
 16526                                  		
 16527                                  		; 27/12/2023
 16528 00001A24 5E                      		pop	si
 16529                                  chk_volid_ok:
 16530 00001A25 59                      		pop	cx
 16531                                  		;pop	si
 16532 00001A26 5F                      		pop	di
 16533 00001A27 C3                      		retn
 16534                                  
 16535                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 16536                                  
 16537                                  ;  check_volume_id - compare volume id in tmp area with
 16538                                  ;		     one expected for drive
 16539                                  ;
 16540                                  ;   inputs:	es:di has current bds for drive
 16541                                  ;   outputs:	zero true means it matched
 16542                                  
 16543                                  check_volume_id:
 16544 00001A28 57                      		push	di
 16545 00001A29 51                      		push	cx
 16546                                  		
 16547                                  		;mov	si, tmp_vid	; "NO NAME	 "
 16548                                  		;;add	di, BDS.volid
 16549                                  		;add	di, 75		; BDS.volid
 16550                                  		;;mov	cx, VOLID_SIZ
 16551                                  		;mov	cx, 12		; VOLID_SIZ
 16552                                  		;cld
 16553                                  		; 02/09/2023 (PCDOS 7.1)
 16554 00001A2A E8E4FF                  		call	preset_volid_addr
 16555                                  
 16556 00001A2D F3A6                    		repe cmpsb		; are the 2 volume_ids the same?
 16557                                  		
 16558                                  		; 27/12/2023
 16559                                  		;pop	cx
 16560                                  		;pop	di
 16561                                  		;retn
 16562 00001A2F EBF4                    		jmp	short chk_volid_ok
 16563                                  
 16564                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 16565                                  
 16566                                  ;   fat_check - see of the fatid has changed in the specified drive.
 16567                                  ;	      - uses the fat id obtained from the boot sector.
 16568                                  ;
 16569                                  ;   inputs:	medbyt is expected fat id
 16570                                  ;		es:di points to current bds
 16571                                  ;
 16572                                  ;   output:	si = -1 if fat id different,
 16573                                  ;		si = 0 otherwise
 16574                                  ;
 16575                                  ;   no other registers changed.
 16576                                  
 16577                                  fat_check:
 16578 00001A31 50                      		push	ax
 16579 00001A32 31F6                    		xor	si, si		; say fat id's are same.
 16580 00001A34 A0[1F01]                		mov	al, [medbyt]	; 19/10/2022
 16581 00001A37 263A4510                		cmp	al, [es:di+10h]	; [es:di+BDS.media]
 16582                                  					; compare it with the bds medbyte
 16583 00001A3B 7401                    		jz	short okret1	; carry	clear
 16584 00001A3D 4E                      		dec	si
 16585                                  okret1:
 16586 00001A3E 58                      		pop	ax
 16587 00001A3F C3                      		retn
 16588

 16606                                  number2mod	equ (number2div % 16)
 16607                                  
 16608                                  %if (number2mod>0) & (number2mod<16) ; 17/09/2023
 16609                                  		times (16-number2mod) db 0
 16610                                  %endif

 16614                                  ; 09/12/2022
 16615                                  BCODE_END	equ $ - BCode_start
 16616                                  ; 29/09/2023
 16617                                  BCODEEND:
 16618                                  ;SYSINITSEG	equ IOSYSCODESEG+(BCODE_END>>4)
 16619                                  ; 13/12/2022
 16620                                  SYSINITOFFSET	equ BCODE_END
 16621                                  SYSINITSEG	equ IOSYSCODESEG+(SYSINITOFFSET>>4)
 16622                                  
 16623                                  ; 30/12/2022 - Retro DOS v4.2
 16624                                  ; (SYSINITSEG is 473h for MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS)
 16625                                  
 16626                                  ;--- End of DOSBIOS code segment ---------------------------------------------

 16645                                  ; ****************************************************************************
 16646                                  ; SYSINIT.BIN (MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS) - RETRO DOS v4.0 by ERDOGAN TAN - 21/10/2022
 16647                                  ; ----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 16648                                  ; Last Update: 04/01/2023 (Modified IO.SYS)  ((Previous: 30/12/2022))
 16649                                  ; ----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 16650                                  ; Beginning: 03/06/2018 (Retro DOS 3.0), 21/03/2019 (Retro DOS 4.0)
 16651                                  ; ----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 16652                                  ; Assembler: NASM version 2.15
 16653                                  ; ----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 16654                                  ;	   ((nasm sysinit6.s -l sysinit6.lst -o SYSINIT6.BIN -Z error.txt)) 	
 16655                                  ; ----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 16656                                  ; Modified from 'sysinit2.s' (SYSINIT2.BIN) file of Retro DOS v3.0 (6/7/2018)
 16657                                  ; ----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 16658                                  ; Derived from 'SYSINIT1.ASM' and 'SYSINIT2.ASM' files of MSDOS 6.0
 16659                                  ; source code by Microsoft, 1991 
 16660                                  ; ----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 16661                                  ; Derived from 'SYSINIT.ASM' file of MSDOS 2.0 (IBM PCDOS v2.0) source code
 16662                                  ; by Microsoft, 12/10/1983
 16663                                  ; ****************************************************************************
 16664                                  ; main file: 'retrodos4.s'
 16665                                  ; incbin 'SYSINIT3.BIN' ; (SYINITSEG)
 16666                                  
 16667                                  ; 30/12/2022 - Retro DOS v4.2 
 16668                                  ; Retro DOS v4.0 - 2019
 16669                                  ; SYSINIT (MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS) draft: 'sysinit3.s' (01/07/2019)
 16670                                   
 16671                                  ; 21/10/2022
 16672                                  ; ----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 16673                                  ; This source code (version) is based on SYSINIT source code of disassembled
 16674                                  ; MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS file (SYSINIT.BIN) 
 16675                                  ; Dissassembler: Hex-Rays Interactive Disassembler (IDA)
 16676                                  ; ----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 16677                                  ; Binary file splitter & joiner: FFSJ v3.3
 16678                                  
 16679                                  ;--------------------------------------------------------------
 16680                                  ; SYSINIT.TXT (27/01/1983)
 16681                                  ;--------------------------------------------------------------
 16682                                  ;    SYSINIT is  a module linked behind the OEM bios.  It takes
 16683                                  ;over  the  system  initialization  after  the  OEM  bios   has
 16684                                  ;performed any  initialization  it  needs  to  do.   Control is
 16685                                  ;transfered with a long jump to the external  variable  SYSINIT
 16686                                  ;
 16687                                  ;
 16688                                  ;   The OEM  has  the  following  variables declared external:
 16689                                  ;
 16690                                  ;   CURRENT_DOS_LOCATION    WORD
 16691                                  ;
 16692                                  ;This word  contains  the  segment  number of the DOS before it
 16693                                  ;is relocated.  The OEM bios must set this value.
 16694                                  ;
 16695                                  ;   FINAL_DOS_LOCATION      WORD
 16696                                  ;
 16697                                  ;This word contains the segment number of the DOS after SYSINIT
 16698                                  ;moves it.  The OEM bios must set this value.
 16699                                  ;
 16700                                  ;   DEVICE_LIST             DWORD
 16701                                  ;
 16702                                  ;This  double  word  pointer  points  to  the  linked  list  of
 16703                                  ;character and block device drivers.  The  OEM  must  set  this
 16704                                  ;value.
 16705                                  ;
 16706                                  ;   MEMORY_SIZE             WORD
 16707                                  ;
 16708                                  ;This word  contains  the  number  of  RAM  paragraphs.  If the
 16709                                  ;bios doesn't set  this  variable  SYSINIT  will  automatically
 16710                                  ;calculate it.   NOTE:  systems with PARITY checked memory must
 16711                                  ;size memory in the BIOS.  SYSINITs method is to  write  memory
 16712                                  ;and read it back until it gets a mismatch.
 16713                                  ;
 16714                                  ;   DEFAULT_DRIVE           BYTE
 16715                                  ;
 16716                                  ;This is  the initial default drive when the system first comes
 16717                                  ;up.  drive a=0, drive b=1,  etc.   If  the  bios  doesn't  set
 16718                                  ;it then drive a is assumed.
 16719                                  ;
 16720                                  ;   BUFFERS                 BYTE
 16721                                  ;
 16722                                  ;This is  the  default  number of buffers for the system.  This
 16723                                  ;value may be overridden by the user in  the  CONFIG.SYS  file.
 16724                                  ;It is DBed to 2 in SYSINIT it should be greater than 1.
 16725                                  ;
 16726                                  ;   FILES                   BYTE
 16727                                  ;
 16728                                  ;This is  the  default  number  of  files for the system.  This
 16729                                  ;value may be overridden by the user in  the  CONFIG.SYS  file.
 16730                                  ;It is  DBed  to  8 in SYSINIT, values less than 5 are ignored.
 16731                                  ;
 16732                                  ;   SYSINIT                 FAR
 16733                                  ;
 16734                                  ;The entry  point  of  the  SYSINIT  module.  OEM BIOS jumps to
 16735                                  ;this label at the end of its INIT code.
 16736                                  ;
 16737                                  ;   The OEM  has  the  following  variables declared public:
 16738                                  ;
 16739                                  ;   RE_INIT                 FAR
 16740                                  ;
 16741                                  ;This is an entry point which allows the BIOS to do some INIT
 16742                                  ;work  after  the  DOS is initialized.  ALL REGISTERS MUST BE
 16743                                  ;PRESERVED.  On entry DS points to the first available memory
 16744                                  ;(after  the DOS).  DS:0 points to a 100H byte program header
 16745                                  ;prefix which represents  the  "program"  currently  running.
 16746                                  ;This  program  should  be  thought  of  as  the OEM BIOS and
 16747                                  ;SYSINIT taken together.  This is not  a  normal  program  in
 16748                                  ;that  no  memory  is  allocated to it, it is running in free
 16749                                  ;memory.
 16750                                  ;NOTES:
 16751                                  ;     At the time this routine is called SYSINIT occupies the
 16752                                  ;highest 10K of memory ("highest" is determined by the  value
 16753                                  ;of the MEMORY_SIZE variable), DO NOT DO WRITES THERE.
 16754                                  ;     Since this is called AFTER DOS is initialized, you can
 16755                                  ;make system calls.  This also implies that the code for this
 16756                                  ;routine    CANNOT   be   thrown   away   by   use   of   the
 16757                                  ;FINAL_DOS_LOCATION since the DOS has already been moved.
 16758                                  ;     If you don't want  anything done just set this to point
 16759                                  ;at a FAR RET instruction.
 16760                                  
 16761                                  ; ----------------------------------------------------------------------
 16762                                  ; TITLE   BIOS SYSTEM INITIALIZATION
 16763                                  ; ----------------------------------------------------------------------
 16764                                  
 16765                                  ;include version.inc
 16766                                  ; ----------------------------------------------------------------------
 16767                                  
 16768                                  ;FALSE   EQU     0
 16769                                  ;TRUE    EQU     0FFFFh
 16770                                  
 16771                                  ;IBMVER	    EQU     TRUE
 16772                                  ;IBMCOPYRIGHT EQU   FALSE
 16773                                  ;STACKSW    EQU	    TRUE		;Include Switchable Hardware Stacks
 16774                                  ;IBMJAPVER  EQU     FALSE		; If TRUE set KANJI true also
 16775                                  ;MSVER      EQU     FALSE
 16776                                  ;ALTVECT    EQU     FALSE		; Switch to build ALTVECT version
 16777                                  ;KANJI      EQU     FALSE
 16778                                  
 16779                                  ;(MSDOS 6.0, versiona.inc, 1991)
 16780                                  ; ----------------------------------------------------------------------
 16781                                  ;MAJOR_VERSION  EQU	6
 16782                                  ;;MINOR_VERSION	EQU	0	;6.00
 16783                                  ;MINOR_VERSION  EQU	21	;6.21  ; 21/03/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 16784                                  
 16785                                  ; 22/10/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0)
 16786                                  ; ----------------------------------------------------------------------
 16787                                  ;MAJOR_VERSION   EQU	5
 16788                                  ;MINOR_VERSION   EQU	0
 16789                                  
 16790                                  ; 01/01/2023 - Retro DOS v4.2 (Modified MSDOS 6.21)
 16791                                  MAJOR_VERSION   EQU	6
 16792                                  MINOR_VERSION   EQU	22
 16793                                  
 16794                                  expected_version equ	(MINOR_VERSION<<8)+MAJOR_VERSION
 16795                                  
 16796                                  ;DOSREVNM equ	00000000b       ; m037 - bits 0-2 = revision number of DOS
 16797                                  				; currently 0.
 16798                                  DOSREVNM equ	00000111b	; [[[ 7 for Retro DOS v4.0 ]]] (21/03/2019)	
 16799                                  DOSINROM equ	00001000B       ; bit 3 of ver flags returned in BH
 16800                                  DOSINHMA equ	00010000B       ; bit 4 of ver flags 
 16801                                  
 16802                                  ;      if1
 16803                                  ;      %OUT  ... for DOS Version 5.00 ...
 16804                                  ;      endif
 16805                                  
 16806                                         ;******************************
 16807                                         ;Each assembler program should:
 16808                                         ;  mov ah,030h                   ;DOS Get Version function
 16809                                         ;  int 021h                      ;Version ret. in AX,minor version first
 16810                                         ;  cmp ax,expected_version       ;ALL utilities should check for an
 16811                                         ;  jne error_handler             ; EXACT version match.
 16812                                         ;******************************
 16813

 16818                                  DEVTYP  EQU     8000h           ;Bit 15 - 1  if Char, 0 if block
 16819                                  DEVIOCTL EQU    4000h           ;Bit 14 - CONTROL mode bit
 16820                                  ISFATBYDEV EQU  2000h           ;Bit 13 - Device uses FAT ID bytes, comp media.
 16821                                  ISCIN   EQU     0001h           ;Bit 0 - This device is the console input.
 16822                                  ISCOUT  EQU     0002h           ;Bit 1 - This device is the console output.
 16823                                  ISNULL  EQU     0004h           ;Bit 2 - This device is the null device.
 16824                                  ISCLOCK EQU     0008h           ;Bit 3 - This device is the clock device.
 16825                                  ISIBM   EQU     0010h           ;Bit 4 - This device is special

 16841 00000002 ??                      .REQFUNC:	resb 1		;Type of request
 16842 00000003 ????                    .REQSTAT:	resw 1		;Status Word
 16843 00000005 ????????????????                	resb 8		;Reserved for queue links
 16844                                  .size:
 16845                                  endstruc
 16846                                  
 16847                                  ;Status word masks
 16848                                  STERR   EQU     8000H           ;Bit 15 - Error
 16849                                  STBUI   EQU     0200H           ;Bit 9 - Buisy

 16851                                  STECODE EQU     00FFH           ;Error code

 16856                                  DINITHL EQU     26              ;Size of init header
 16857                                  DEVMDCH EQU     1               ;Media check
 16858                                  DMEDHL  EQU     15              ;Size of media check header
 16859                                  DEVBPB  EQU     2               ;Get BPB
 16860                                  DEVRDIOCTL EQU  3               ;IOCTL read
 16861                                  DBPBHL  EQU     22              ;Size of Get BPB header
 16862                                  DEVRD   EQU     4               ;Read
 16863                                  DRDWRHL EQU     22              ;Size of RD/WR header
 16864                                  DEVRDND EQU     5               ;Non destructive read no wait (character devs)
 16865                                  DRDNDHL EQU     14              ;Size of non destructive read header
 16866                                  DEVIST  EQU     6               ;Input status
 16867                                  DSTATHL EQU     13              ;Size of status header

 16872                                  DEVOST  EQU     10              ;Output status
 16873                                  DEVOFL  EQU     11              ;Output flush

 16877                                  struc	SYS_FCB
 16878 00000000 ??                      .fcb_drive:	resb 1
 16879 00000001 ????????????????        .fcb_name:	resb 8
 16880 00000009 ??????                  .fcb_ext:	resb 3
 16881 0000000C ????                    .fcb_EXTENT:	resw 1
 16882 0000000E ????                    .fcb_RECSIZ:	resw 1	; Size of record (user settable)
 16883 00000010 ????                    .fcb_FILSIZ:	resw 1	; Size of file in bytes; used with the following
 16884                                                          ; word
 16885 00000012 ????                    .fcb_DRVBP:	resw 1	; BP for SEARCH FIRST and SEARCH NEXT
 16886 00000014 ????                    .fcb_FDATE:	resw 1	; Date of last writing
 16887 00000016 ????                    .fcb_FTIME:	resw 1	; Time of last writing
 16888 00000018 ??                      .fcb_DEVID:	resb 1	; Device ID number, bits 0-5 if file.
 16889                                                          ; bit 7=0 for file, bit 7=1 for I/O device
 16890                                                          ; If file, bit 6=0 if dirty
 16891                                                          ; If I/O device, bit 6=0 if EOF (input)
 16892                                                          ;               Bit 5=1 if Raw mode
 16893                                                          ;               Bit 0=1 if console input device
 16894                                                          ;               Bit 1=1 if console output device
 16895                                                          ;               Bit 2=1 if null device
 16896                                                          ;               Bit 3=1 if clock device
 16897 00000019 ????                    .fcb_FIRCLUS:	resw 1	; First cluster of file
 16898 0000001B ????                    .fcb_CLUSPOS:	resw 1	; Position of last cluster accessed
 16899 0000001D ????                    .fcb_LSTCLUS:	resw 1	; Last cluster accessed and directory
 16900 0000001F ??                                   	resb 1	; pack 2 12 bit numbers into 24 bits...
 16901 00000020 ??                      .fcb_NR:	resb 1	; Next record
 16902 00000021 ????????                .fcb_RR:	resb 4	; Random record
 16903                                  .size:
 16904                                  endstruc
