 33104                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 33105                                  ;*** findUMB - makes ES:0 point to the first MCB in UMB given as AL
 33106                                  ;            -- returns UmbHEAD pointer (0x9FFF) if passed AL==0
 33107                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 33108                                  ; ENTRY:    AL should be to a valid UMB number
 33109                                  ; EXIT:     ES:0 points to first MCB in UMB (_not_ the 8+SC MCB that heads it)
 33110                                  ; ERROR:    Carry set if couldn't reach UMB (too high)
 33111                                  ; USES:     Flags, ES
 33112                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 33113                                  
 33114                                  	; 01/01/2023 - Retro DOS v4.2 (Modified MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS)
 33115                                  	; (SYSINIT:3344h)
 33116                                  findUMB:
 33117                                  	; 01/01/2023
 33118                                  	;push	ax
 33119                                  	; 02/01/2023
 33120 00002D2D 51                      	push	cx ; *
 33121                                  	;push	dx
 33122                                  
 33123 00002D2E 30E4                    	xor	ah,ah		; Zap ah, so al==ax
 33124                                  
 33125 00002D30 89C2                    	mov	dx,ax		; Store the to-be-found UMB number in DX
 33126                                  
 33127 00002D32 E8D2FE                  	call	UmbHead		; Returns first UMB segment in AX
 33128                                  	; 22/07/2023
 33129                                  	;mov	es,ax ; *
 33130 00002D35 31C9                    	xor	cx,cx		; Pretend we're on UMB 0 for now...
 33131                                  
 33132                                  	; 22/07/2023
 33133                                  fu10:
 33134 00002D37 8EC0                    	mov	es,ax ; * ; **
 33135                                  ; ---------------------------------------------
 33136                                  ; FU10--CX - This UMB number; 0 == conventional
 33137                                  ;       DX - The UMB number they're looking for
 33138                                  ;       ES - The current MCB address
 33139                                  ; ---------------------------------------------
 33140                                  
 33141                                  ;fu10:	
 33142 00002D39 39D1                    	cmp	cx,dx		; If CX==DX, we've found the UMB we're
 33143 00002D3B 7417                    	je	short fuX	; searching for--so exit.
 33144                                  
 33145 00002D3D E8D4FE                  	call	isSysMCB	; Returns with ZF set if owner is SYSTEM
 33146 00002D40 7501                    	jnz	short fu20
 33147                                  
 33148 00002D42 41                      	inc	cx		; If it _was_ SYSTEM, we're in a new UMB.
 33149                                  fu20:	
 33150                                  	;mov	al,[es:ARENA.SIGNATURE]
 33151                                  	;cmp	al,arena_signature_end ; 'Z'
 33152                                  	; 19/07/2023
 33153 00002D43 26803E00005A            	cmp	byte [es:ARENA.SIGNATURE],arena_signature_end 
 33154 00002D49 7408                    	je	short fuE	; 'Z' means this was the last MCB... that's it.
 33155                                  
 33156                                  	;NextMCB es,ax		; Go on forward.
 33157                                  	; 22/07/2023
 33158                                  	; ax = es
 33159                                  	;mov	ax,es ; * ; 22/07/2023
 33160                                  	;add	ax,[es:3]
 33161 00002D4B 2603060300              	add	ax,[es:ARENA.SIZE]
 33162 00002D50 40                      	inc	ax
 33163                                  	; 22/07/2023
 33164                                  	;mov	es,ax ; **
 33165 00002D51 EBE4                    	jmp	short fu10
 33166                                  fuE:	
 33167 00002D53 F9                      	stc
 33168                                  fuX:
 33169                                  	; 01/01/2023
 33170                                  	;pop	dx
 33171                                  	; 02/01/2023
 33172 00002D54 59                      	pop	cx ; *
 33173                                  	;pop	ax		; The address is already in ES.
 33174 00002D55 C3                      	retn
 33175                                  
 33176                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 33177                                  ;*** BigFree - makes ES:0 point to the largest free MCB in UMB given as AL
 33178                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 33179                                  ; ENTRY:    AL should be to a valid UMB number
 33180                                  ; EXIT:     ES:0 points to largest free MCB in UMB, AX returns its size
 33181                                  ; ERROR:    Carry set if couldn't reach UMB (0 or too high)
 33182                                  ; USES:     Flags, ES
 33183                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 33184                                  
 33185                                  	; 01/01/2023 - Retro DOS v4.2
 33186                                  BigFree:
 33187                                  	; 01/01/2023
 33188                                  	;push	bx
 33189 00002D56 51                      	push	cx
 33190                                  
 33191 00002D57 E8D3FF                  	call	findUMB			; Returns with CF if err, else ES==MCB
 33192 00002D5A 723A                    	jc	short bfX		; (would be "jc bfE"; it just does stc)
 33193                                  
 33194 00002D5C 31DB                    	xor	bx,bx			; Segment address of largest free MCB
 33195 00002D5E 31C9                    	xor	cx,cx			; Size of largest free MCB
 33196                                  
 33197                                  ; ---------------------------------------------
 33198                                  ; BF10--ES - Current MCB address
 33199                                  ;       BX - Address of largest free MCB so far
 33200                                  ;       CX - Size of largest free MCB so far
 33201                                  ; ---------------------------------------------
 33202                                  
 33203                                  bf10:	
 33204 00002D60 E8B1FE                  	call	isSysMCB		; If we've left the MCB, we're done.
 33205 00002D63 7428                    	jz	short bf30
 33206                                  
 33207                                  	;call	isFreeMCB		; Returns with ZF set if owner is 0
 33208 00002D65 26830E010000            	or	word [es:ARENA.OWNER],0
 33209 00002D6B 750C                    	jnz	short bf20
 33210                                  
 33211 00002D6D 26A10300                	mov	ax,[es:ARENA.SIZE]
 33212                                  	;cmp	cx,[es:ARENA.SIZE]	; Compare sizes...
 33213 00002D71 39C1                    	cmp	cx,ax
 33214                                  	;jg	short bf20		; Unless we're bigger,
 33215                                  	; 19/07/2023
 33216 00002D73 7D04                    	jge	short bf20
 33217

 33290                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 33291                                  ;*** shrinkMCB - breaks an MCB into two pieces, the lowest one's size==AX
 33292                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 33293                                  ; ENTRY:    AX == new size, ES:0 == current MCB
 33294                                  ; EXIT:     None; MCB broken if carry clear
 33295                                  ; ERROR:    Carry set if MCB isn't as large as AX+0x20 (not a useful split)
 33296                                  ; USES:     Flags
 33297                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 33298                                  ; If the size of the to-be-split MCB isn't at least 0x20 bytes greater than
 33299                                  ; the specified new size, the split is useless; if it's only 0x10 bytes, that
 33300                                  ; 0x10 will be used to make a header that mentions a 0-byte free space, and
 33301                                  ; that just sucks up 0x10 bytes for nothing. So we make 0x20 bytes the
 33302                                  ; minimum for performing a split.
 33303                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 33304                                  
 33305                                  MIN_SPLIT_SIZE	equ	20h
 33306                                  
 33307                                  	; 02/01/2023 - Retro DOS v4.2 (Modified MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS)
 33308                                  
 33309                                  shrinkMCB:
 33310                                  	;pushreg <bx,cx,es>
 33311                                  	; 02/01/2023
 33312                                  	;push	bx
 33313 00002DA3 51                      	push	cx
 33314 00002DA4 06                      	push	es
 33315                                  
 33316 00002DA5 89C3                    	mov	bx,ax			; Move things around... and
 33317                                  	; 02/01/2023
 33318                                  	;mov	ax,es			; save this one for later.
 33319                                  
 33320 00002DA7 268B0E0300              	mov	cx,[es:ARENA.SIZE]
 33321                                  	; 02/01/2023
 33322 00002DAC 89C8                    	mov	ax,cx 
 33323                                  
 33324 00002DAE 83E820                  	sub	ax,MIN_SPLIT_SIZE ; 32
 33325                                  	;sub	cx,MIN_SPLIT_SIZE ; 32
 33326                                  	;;cmp	bx,cx			; {New size} vs {Current Size-20h}
 33327                                  	;ja	short smE		; if wanted_size > cur-20h, abort.
 33328                                  	; 18/12/2022
 33329                                  	;cmp	cx,bx
 33330                                  	; 02/01/2023
 33331 00002DB1 39D8                    	cmp	ax,bx
 33332 00002DB3 7228                    	jb	short smE ; (*)
 33333                                  
 33334 00002DB5 268A160000              	mov	dl,[es:ARENA.SIGNATURE]
 33335                                  	
 33336                                  	;mov	cx,[es:ARENA.SIZE]
 33337                                  	; 02/01/2023
 33338 00002DBA 8CC0                    	mov	ax,es
 33339                                  
 33340 00002DBC 26891E0300              	mov	[es:ARENA.SIZE],bx
 33341 00002DC1 26C60600004D            	mov	byte [es:ARENA.SIGNATURE],'M'
 33342                                  
 33343 00002DC7 01D8                    	add	ax,bx
 33344 00002DC9 40                      	inc	ax
 33345 00002DCA 8EC0                    	mov	es,ax			; Move to new arena area
 33346                                  
 33347 00002DCC 89C8                    	mov	ax,cx
 33348 00002DCE 29D8                    	sub	ax,bx
 33349                                  	; 12/12/2022
 33350                                  	; ax > 0
 33351 00002DD0 48                      	dec	ax			; And prepare the new size
 33352                                  
 33353                                  	; 18/12/2022
 33354 00002DD1 2688160000              	mov	[es:ARENA.SIGNATURE],dl
 33355                                  	;mov	word [es:ARENA.OWNER],0 ; (**)
 33356 00002DD6 26A30300                	mov	[es:ARENA.SIZE],ax
 33357                                  	;mov	ax,'  ' ; 2020h
 33358                                  	;mov	[es:ARENA.NAME+0],ax ; (**)
 33359                                  	;mov	[es:ARENA.NAME+2],ax ; (**)
 33360                                  	;mov	[es:ARENA.NAME+4],ax ; (**)
 33361                                  	;mov	[es:ARENA.NAME+6],ax ; (**)
 33362                                  
 33363                                  	; 18/12/2022
 33364 00002DDA E8A801                  	call	freeMCB	; (**)
 33365                                  
 33366                                  	; 12/12/2022
 33367                                  	; cf=0
 33368                                  	;clc
 33369                                  	; 18/12/2022
 33370                                  	;jmp	short smX
 33371                                  smE:	
 33372                                  	; 18/12/2022
 33373                                  	; cf=1 (*)
 33374                                  	;stc
 33375                                  smX:	
 33376                                  	;popreg	<es,cx,bx>
 33377 00002DDD 07                      	pop	es
 33378 00002DDE 59                      	pop	cx
 33379                                  	; 02/01/2023
 33380                                  	;pop	bx
 33381 00002DDF C3                      	retn
 33382                                  
 33383                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 33384                                  ;*** hideUMB? - hides as appropriate the UMB in CL
 33385                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 33386                                  ; ENTRY:    CL should be to a valid UMB number, and AX to its address (findUMB)
 33387                                  ; EXIT:     None; UMB is hidden as necessary
 33388                                  ; ERROR:    None
 33389                                  ; USES:     Flags, AX, CX
 33390                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 33391                                  ; PRIMARY LOGIC:
 33392                                  ;
 33393                                  ; If the UMB is specified in the DH/LH statement, then:
 33394                                  ;    If the largest free segment is too small (check specified size), then:
 33395                                  ;       Pretend it wasn't ever specified, and fall out of this IF.
 33396                                  ;    Else, if largest free segment is LARGER than specified size, then:
 33397                                  ;       If /S was given on the command-line, then:
 33398                                  ;          Break that element into two pieces
 33399                                  ;          Set a flag that we're shrinking
 33400                                  ;       Endif
 33401                                  ;    Endif
 33402                                  ; Endif
 33403                                  ; If the UMB is NOT specified (or was removed by the above):
 33404                                  ;    Hide all free elements in the UMB
 33405                                  ;    If the flag that we're shrinking was set, then:
 33406                                  ;       UN-hide the lower portion of the shrunken UMB
 33407                                  ;    ENDIF
 33408                                  ; ENDIF
 33409                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 33410                                  
 33411                                  	; 01/01/2023 - Retro DOS v4.2 (Modified MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS)
 33412                                  	; (SYSINIT:3426h)
 33413                                  _hideUMB_:
 33414                                  	; 02/01/2023
 33415                                  	; ds = cs
 33416                                  
 33417                                  	; 01/01/2023
 33418                                  	;push	bx
 33419                                  	;push	dx
 33420 00002DE0 06                      	push	es
 33421                                  
 33422 00002DE1 88C8                    	mov	al,cl
 33423 00002DE3 E8B2FF                  	call	isSpecified	; Returns ZF set if al's umb was NOT specified
 33424 00002DE6 742D                    	jz	short hu_20
 33425                                  
 33426 00002DE8 88C8                    	mov	al,cl		; Retrieve the size of the largest
 33427 00002DEA E869FF                  	call	BigFree		; free element in AX; put its address in ES
 33428 00002DED 7226                    	jc	short hu_20	; Oops. Errors mean skip this part.
 33429                                  
 33430 00002DEF 50                      	push	ax		; TOS==size of BigFree in UMB (popped as BX)
 33431 00002DF0 88C8                    	mov	al,cl		; Retrieve the user's specified
 33432 00002DF2 E8AAFE                  	call	GetSize		; minimum size for this umb (into AX)
 33433 00002DF5 5B                      	pop	bx		; Now BX==BigFree, AX==Specified Size
 33434                                  
 33435 00002DF6 09C0                    	or	ax,ax		; If they didn't specify one,
 33436 00002DF8 741B                    	jz	short hu_20	; Skip over all this.
 33437                                  
 33438 00002DFA 39D8                    	cmp	ax,bx		; Ah... if (specified > max free)
 33439 00002DFC 7607                    	jbe	short hu_10
 33440                                  
 33441 00002DFE 88C8                    	mov	al,cl		;  Then mark that UMB as unused. Nya nya.
 33442 00002E00 E81DFD                  	call	unMarkUMB
 33443 00002E03 EB10                    	jmp	short hu_20
 33444                                  hu_10:	
 33445                                  	;call	isTiny		; Returns ZF clear if user specified /S
 33446                                  	;jz	short hu_20
 33447                                  	; 02/01/2023
 33448                                  ;isTiny:
 33449                                  	;mov	al,[fUmbTiny] ; ds = cs
 33450                                  	;or	al,al
 33451 00002E05 800E[031F]00            	or	byte [fUmbTiny],0
 33452 00002E0A 7409                    	jz	short hu_20
 33453                                  
 33454 00002E0C E894FF                  	call	shrinkMCB	; They specified /S, so shrink the MCB to AX
 33455 00002E0F 7204                    	jc	short hu_20	; Ah... if didn't shrink after all, skip this:
 33456                                  
 33457 00002E11 8CC2                    	mov	dx,es
 33458 00002E13 EB09                    	jmp	short hu_30	; Skip the spec check.. we wanna hide this one.
 33459                                  
 33460 00002E15 89C8                    hu_20:	mov	ax,cx
 33461 00002E17 E87EFF                  	call	isSpecified	; If they specified this UMB, we're done...
 33462 00002E1A 7510                    	jnz	short hu_X	; so leave.
 33463                                  
 33464 00002E1C 31D2                    	xor	dx,dx
 33465                                  hu_30:	
 33466 00002E1E 88C8                    	mov	al,cl
 33467                                  
 33468 00002E20 E89DFE                  	call	hideUMB		; Hides everything in UMB #al
 33469                                  
 33470 00002E23 09D2                    	or	dx,dx		; Did we shrink a UMB? If not, DX==0,
 33471 00002E25 7405                    	jz	short hu_X	; So we should leave.
 33472                                  
 33473 00002E27 8EC2                    	mov	es,dx		; Ah, but if it isn't, DX==the MCB's address;
 33474 00002E29 E8E6FE                  	call	unHideMCB	; Un-hides the lower portion of that MCB.
 33475                                  hu_X:	
 33476 00002E2C 07                      	pop	es
 33477                                  	; 01/01/2023
 33478                                  	;pop	dx
 33479                                  	;pop	bx
 33480 00002E2D C3                      	retn
 33481                                  
 33482                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 33483                                  ;*** UnFreeze - Marks FROZEN elements as FREE
 33484                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 33485                                  ; Entry:  None
 33486                                  ; Exit:   None; all 8+FROZEN elements are marked as FREE, from any UMB.
 33487                                  ; Error:  None

 33501                                  uf10:

 33704                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 33705                                  ;*** WalkMem - travels memory chain and returns carry clear iff UMBs are linked
 33706                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 33707                                  ; ENTRY:    None
 33708                                  ; EXIT:     Carry SET if MCB chain stops before 9FFF, CLEAR if stops >= 9FFF.

 34083                                  ; ----------------------------------------------------------------------
 34084                                  ; SYSCONF.ASM (MSDOS 6.0 - 1991) 	
 34085                                  ; ----------------------------------------------------------------------
 34086                                  ; 09/04/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 34087                                  
 34088                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 34089                                  ;
 34090                                  ; procedure : InitDevLoad
 34091                                  ;
 34092                                  ;	Input : DeviceHi = 0 indicates load DD in low memory
 34093                                  ;			 = 1 indicates load in UMB:
 34094                                  ;		           ConvLoad = 0 indicates a new-style load (see below)
 34095                                  ;		                    = 1 indicates a DOS 5-style load
 34096                                  ;		DevSize  = Size of the device driver file in paras
 34097                                  ;
 34098                                  ;	Output : none
 34099                                  ;
 34100                                  ;	Initializes DevLoadAddr, DevLoadEnd & DevEntry.
 34101                                  ;	Also sets up a header for the Device driver entry for mem utility
 34102                                  ;
 34103                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 34104                                  ; For a "new-style load", we break off the current DevEntry and link the umbs
 34105                                  ; as we see fit, using HideUMBs (and UnHideUMBs at exit, though _it_ decides
 34106                                  ; whether it's entitled to do anything). HideUMBs uses the chart built by
 34107                                  ; ParseVar to determine which UMBs to leave FREE, and which not.
 34108                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 34109                                  
 34110                                  	; 01/11/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)
 34111                                  	; 01/01/2023 - Retro DOS v4.2 (Modified MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS)
 34112                                  	; (SYSINIT:364Ah)
 34113                                  InitDevLoad:
 34114                                  	; 01/01/2023
 34115                                  	;push	es ; *
 34116                                  
 34117                                  	; 11/12/2022
 34118                                  	; ds = cs
 34119 00002FBF 803E[581F]00            	cmp	byte [DeviceHi],0
 34120                                  	;cmp	byte [cs:DeviceHi],0	; Are we loading in UMB ?
 34121                                  	;je	short InitForLo		; no, init for lo mem
 34122 00002FC4 7439                    	je	short initforlo_x ; 09/04/2019
 34123                                  
 34124                                  ; 01/01/2023 - Retro DOS v4.2 (Modified MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS)
 34125                                  ; 01/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT compatibility)
 34126                                  ; %if 0
 34127                                  	; 01/01/2023
 34128 00002FC6 803E[481F]01            	cmp	byte [ConvLoad],1	; Are we loading as per DOS 5?
 34129                                  	;cmp	byte [cs:ConvLoad],1	; Are we loading as per DOS 5?
 34130 00002FCB 7413                    	je	short InitForConv
 34131                                  
 34132                                  ; There are two stages to preparing upper-memory; first, we mark as 8+HIDDEN
 34133                                  ; any areas not specified on the /L:... chain. Second, we mark as 8+FROZEN
 34134                                  ; any areas left in upper-memory, except for elements in the load UMB...
 34135                                  ; we then malloc space as per Dos-5 style, and mark as free any spaces which
 34136                                  ; are 8+FROZEN (but leave 8+HIDDEN still hidden). The load is performed,
 34137                                  ; and UnHideUMBs later on marks all 8+HIDDEN as free.
 34138                                  
 34139 00002FCD E85704                  	call	ShrinkUMB		; Stop using the old device arena
 34140                                  
 34141 00002FD0 E892FC                  	call	HideUMBs		; Mark up the UM area as we see fit
 34142 00002FD3 E8CBFE                  	call	FreezeUM		; Hide everything BUT the load area
 34143 00002FD6 E85700                  	call	GetUMBForDev		; And grab that load area as needed
 34144 00002FD9 9C                      	pushf
 34145 00002FDA E851FE                  	call	UnFreeze		; Then unhide everything frozen
 34146 00002FDD 9D                      	popf
 34147                                  	;jc	short InitForLo		; (if carry, it's loading low)
 34148                                  	;jmp	short InitForHi
 34149                                  	; 06/07/2023 - Retro DOS v4.2 IO.SYS (optimization)
 34150 00002FDE EB0B                    	jmp	short idl0
 34151                                  
 34152                                  ;%endif ; 01/11/2022
 34153                                  
 34154                                  	; 01/11/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)
 34155                                  	; (SYSINIT:2B67h)
 34156                                  InitForConv:
 34157                                  	; 11/12/2022
 34158                                  	; ds = cs
 34159 00002FE0 E83700                  	call	SpaceInUMB		; Do we have space left in the
 34160                                  					;  current UMB ?
 34161 00002FE3 7308                    	jnc	short InitForHi		; yes, we have
 34162 00002FE5 E83F04                  	call	ShrinkUMB		; shrink the current UMB in use
 34163 00002FE8 E84500                  	call	GetUMBForDev		; else try to allocate new UMB
 34164                                  idl0: ; 06/07/2023
 34165 00002FEB 720D                    	jc	short InitForLo		; we didn't succeed, so load
 34166                                  					;  in low memory
 34167                                  InitForHi:
 34168                                  	; 11/12/2022
 34169                                  	; ds = cs
 34170                                  	;mov	ax,[cs:DevUMBFree]	; get Para addr of free mem
 34171                                  	;mov	dx,[cs:DevUMBAddr]	; UMB start addr
 34172                                  	;add	dx,[cs:DevUMBSize]	; DX = UMB End addr
 34173 00002FED A1[4E1F]                	mov	ax,[DevUMBFree]
 34174 00002FF0 8B16[4A1F]              	mov	dx,[DevUMBAddr]
 34175 00002FF4 0316[4C1F]              	add	dx,[DevUMBSize]
 34176 00002FF8 EB0C                    	jmp	short idl1
 34177                                  
 34178                                  InitForLo:
 34179                                  	; 11/12/2022
 34180                                  	; ds = cs
 34181                                  	;mov	byte [cs:DeviceHi],0	; in case we failed to load
 34182 00002FFA C606[581F]00            	mov	byte [DeviceHi],0
 34183                                  initforlo_x:
 34184                                  	; 11/12/2022
 34185                                  	; ds = cs
 34186                                  					;  into UMB indicate that
 34187                                  					;  we are loading low
 34188                                  	;mov	ax,[cs:memhi]		; AX = start of Low memory
 34189                                  	;mov	dx,[cs:ALLOCLIM]	; DX = End of Low memory
 34190 00002FFF A1[6403]                	mov	ax,[memhi]
 34191 00003002 8B16[A502]              	mov	dx,[ALLOCLIM]
 34192                                  idl1:
 34193 00003006 E86600                  	call	DevSetMark		; setup a sub-arena for DD
 34194                                  	; 11/12/2022
 34195                                  	; ds = cs
 34196                                  	;mov	[cs:DevLoadAddr],ax	; init the Device load address
 34197                                  	;mov	[cs:DevLoadEnd],dx	; init the limit of the block
 34198                                  	;mov	word [cs:DevEntry],0	; init Entry point to DD
 34199                                  	;mov	[cs:DevEntry+2],ax
 34200 00003009 A3[3C1F]                	mov	[DevLoadAddr],ax
 34201 0000300C 8916[3E1F]              	mov	[DevLoadEnd],dx

 34270                                  ;
 34271                                  ; procedure : GetUMBForDev
 34272                                  ;
 34273                                  ;	Input : DevSize

 34279                                  ;	DevUMBSize, DevUMBAddr & DevUMBFree if it succeeded in allocating

 34281                                  ;
 34282                                  ;	This routine relies on the fact that all of the low memory
 34283                                  ;	is allocated, and any DOS alloc calls should return memory
 34284                                  ;	from the UMB pool.
 34285                                  ;
 34286                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------

 34297                                  		; BX = number of 16-byte paragraphs desired

 34312

 34314 00003047 CD21                    	int	21h
 34315 00003049 721D                    	jc	short gufd_err
 34316                                  
 34317                                  	; 01/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT compatibility)
 34318                                  	;dec	ax
 34319                                  	;call	PrepareMark
 34320                                  	;

 34322 0000304B 1E                      	push	ds
 34323 0000304C 48                      	dec	ax
 34324 0000304D 8ED8                    	mov	ds,ax
 34325 0000304F C70601000800            	mov	word [ARENA.OWNER],8
 34326 00003055 C70608005344            	mov	word [ARENA.NAME],'SD' ; 4453h

 34345                                  %if 1

 34352                                  %endif

 34372                                  ; procedure : DevSetMark
 34373                                  ;
 34374                                  ;	Input : AX - Free segment were device is going to be loaded
 34375                                  ;	Output : AX - Segment at which device can be loaded (AX=AX+1)
 34376                                  ;
 34377                                  ;	Creates a sub-arena for the device driver
 34378                                  ;	puts 'D' marker in the sub-arena

 34444 000030B7 5E                      	pop	si

 34448 000030B9 07                      	pop	es
 34449 000030BA C3                      	retn

 34515                                  	; 12/12/2022

 34517                                  	;clc

 34904                                  ;
 34905                                  ; procedure : GetHexNum
 34906                                  ;
 34907                                  ;	Converts an ascii string terminated by a delimiter into binary.
 34908                                  ;	Assumes that the ES:SI points to a Hexadecimal string
 34909                                  ;
 34910                                  ;	Returns in AX the number number of paras equivalent to the
 34911                                  ;	hex number of bytes specified by the hexadecimal string.
 34912                                  ;
 34913                                  ;	Returns carry in case it encountered a non-hex character or
 34914                                  ;	if it encountered crlf
 34915                                  ;
 34916                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 34917                                  
 34918                                  ; 13/05/2019
 34919                                  
 34920                                  	; 03/01/2023 - Retro DOS v4.2 (Modified MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS)
 34921                                  	; (SYSINIT:38C5h)
 34922                                  
 34923                                  	; 01/11/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)
 34924                                  	; (SYSINIT:2DA5h)
 34925                                  GetHexNum:
 34926 000031F3 31C0                    	xor	ax,ax
 34927 000031F5 31D2                    	xor	dx,dx
 34928                                  ghn_next:
 34929 000031F7 268A1C                  	mov	bl,[es:si]
 34930 000031FA 80FB0D                  	cmp	bl,cr  ; 0Dh
 34931 000031FD 7436                    	je	short ghn_err
 34932 000031FF 80FB0A                  	cmp	bl,lf  ; 0Ah
 34933 00003202 7431                    	je	short ghn_err
 34934 00003204 50                      	push	ax
 34935 00003205 88D8                    	mov	al,bl
 34936 00003207 E8D80F                  	call	delim
 34937 0000320A 58                      	pop	ax
 34938                                  	; 03/01/2023
 34939 0000320B B90400                  	mov	cx,4
 34940 0000320E 7410                    	jz	short ghn_into_paras
 34941 00003210 E82400                  	call	GetNibble
 34942                                  	;jc	short ghn_err
 34943                                  	; 11/12/2022
 34944 00003213 7221                    	jc	short ghn_ret ; cf=1
 34945                                  	; 03/01/2023
 34946                                  	;mov	cx,4
 34947                                  ghn_shift1:
 34948 00003215 D1E0                    	shl	ax,1
 34949 00003217 D1D2                    	rcl	dx,1
 34950 00003219 E2FA                    	loop	ghn_shift1
 34951 0000321B 08D8                    	or	al,bl
 34952 0000321D 46                      	inc	si
 34953 0000321E EBD7                    	jmp	short ghn_next
 34954                                  ghn_into_paras:
 34955 00003220 83C00F                  	add	ax,15
 34956 00003223 83D200                  	adc	dx,0
 34957 00003226 F7C2F0FF                	test	dx,0FFF0h
 34958 0000322A 7509                    	jnz	short ghn_err
 34959                                  	; 03/01/2023
 34960                                  	;mov	cx,4
 34961                                  ghn_shift2:
 34962 0000322C F8                      	clc
 34963 0000322D D1DA                    	rcr	dx,1
 34964 0000322F D1D8                    	rcr	ax,1
 34965 00003231 E2F9                    	loop	ghn_shift2
 34966 00003233 F8                      	clc
 34967 00003234 C3                      	retn
 34968                                  	; 11/12/2022
 34969                                  ghn_err:
 34970                                  gnib_err:
 34971 00003235 F9                      	stc
 34972                                  ghn_ret:
 34973                                  gnib_ret:
 34974 00003236 C3                      	retn

 34978                                  ; procedure : GetNibble
 34979                                  ;
 34980                                  ;	Convert one nibble (hex digit) in BL into binary
 34981                                  ;
 34982                                  ;	Returns binary value in BL
 34983                                  ;
 34984                                  ;	Returns carry if BL contains non-hex digit
 34985                                  ;
 34986                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 34987                                  
 34988                                  GetNibble:

 34990                                  	;jb	short gnib_err

 34993 0000323C 80FB39                  	cmp	bl,'9'
 34994 0000323F 7704                    	ja	short is_it_hex
 34995 00003241 80EB30                  	sub	bl,'0'		; clc
 34996 00003244 C3                      	retn
 34997                                  is_it_hex:

 35002 0000324A 80FB46                  	cmp	bl,'F'
 35003 0000324D 77E6                    	ja	short gnib_err ; 11/12/2022
 35004 0000324F 80EB37                  	sub	bl,'A'- 10	; clc
 35005 00003252 C3                      	retn

 35026                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 35027                                  ;
 35028                                  ; Procedure Name	: umb_insert
 35029                                  ;
 35030                                  ; Inputs		: DOSDATA:UMB_HEAD = start of umb chain
 35031                                  ;			: BX = seg address of UMB to be linked in
 35032                                  ;			: DX = size of UMB to be linked in paras
 35033                                  ;			; DS = data
 35034                                  ;
 35035                                  ; Outputs		: links the UMB into the arena chain
 35036                                  ;
 35037                                  ; Uses			: AX, CX, ES, DX, BX
 35038                                  ;
 35039                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 35040                                  
 35041                                  umb_insert:
 35042 00003253 1E                      	push	ds
 35043                                  
 35044                                  	; 31/12/2022
 35045                                  	; ds = cs
 35046                                  
 35047                                  	;mov	ds,[cs:DevDOSData]
 35048 00003254 8E1E[671F]              	mov	ds,[DevDOSData] ; 31/12/2022 
 35049                                  	;mov	ds,[8Ch]
 35050 00003258 8E1E8C00                	mov	ds,[UMB_ARENA]		; es = UMB_HEAD
 35051 0000325C 8CD8                    	mov	ax,ds
 35052 0000325E 8EC0                    	mov	es,ax
 35053                                  ui_next:
 35054 00003260 39D8                    	cmp	ax,bx			; Q: is current block above
 35055                                  					;    new block
 35056 00003262 770F                    	ja	short ui_insert		; Y: insert it
 35057                                  					; Q: is current block the
 35058                                  					;    last
 35059 00003264 26803E00005A            	cmp	byte [es:ARENA.SIGNATURE],arena_signature_end ; 'Z'
 35060 0000326A 745C                    	je	short ui_append		; Y: append new block to chain
 35061                                  					; N: get next block
 35062 0000326C 8ED8                    	mov	ds,ax			; M005
 35063                                  	;call	get_next		; ax = es = next block
 35064 0000326E E83B01                  	call	_get_next_ ; 13/04/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 35065 00003271 EBED                    	jmp	short ui_next
 35066                                  
 35067                                  ui_insert:
 35068 00003273 8CD9                    	mov	cx,ds			; ds = previous arena
 35069 00003275 41                      	inc	cx			; top of previous block
 35070                                  
 35071 00003276 29D9                    	sub	cx,bx
 35072 00003278 F7D9                    	neg	cx			; cx = size of used block
 35073                                  	;mov	byte [0],'M'
 35074 0000327A C60600004D              	mov	byte [ARENA.SIGNATURE],arena_signature_normal ; 'M'
 35075                                  	;mov	word [1],8
 35076 0000327F C70601000800            	mov	word [ARENA.OWNER],8	; mark as system owned
 35077                                  	;mov	[3],cx
 35078 00003285 890E0300                	mov	[ARENA.SIZE],cx	
 35079                                  	;mov	word [8],4353h ; 'SC'
 35080 00003289 C70608005343            	mov	word [ARENA.NAME],'SC' ; 4353h
 35081                                  
 35082                                  ; prepare the arena at start of new block
 35083                                  
 35084 0000328F 8EC3                    	mov	es,bx
 35085 00003291 26C60600004D            	mov	byte [es:ARENA.SIGNATURE],arena_signature_normal ; 'M'
 35086 00003297 26C70601000000          	mov	word [es:ARENA.OWNER],arena_owner_system ; 0
 35087                                  					; mark as free
 35088 0000329E 83EA02                  	sub	dx,2			; make room for arena at
 35089                                  					; start & end of new block
 35090 000032A1 2689160300              	mov	[es:ARENA.SIZE],dx
 35091                                  
 35092                                  ; prepare arena at end of new block
 35093                                  	
 35094 000032A6 01D3                    	add	bx,dx
 35095 000032A8 43                      	inc	bx
 35096 000032A9 8EC3                    	mov	es,bx			; es=arena at top of new block
 35097 000032AB 43                      	inc	bx			; bx=top of new block
 35098                                  
 35099                                  					; ax contains arena just above
 35100                                  					; this block
 35101 000032AC 29D8                    	sub	ax,bx			; ax = size of used block
 35102                                  	
 35103 000032AE 26C60600004D            	mov	byte [es:ARENA.SIGNATURE],arena_signature_normal
 35104 000032B4 26C70601000800          	mov	word [es:ARENA.OWNER],8	; mark as system owned
 35105 000032BB 26A30300                	mov	[es:ARENA.SIZE],ax	
 35106 000032BF 26C70608005343          	mov	word [es:ARENA.NAME],'SC' ; 4353h
 35107                                  
 35108 000032C6 EB47                    	jmp	short ui_done
 35109                                  
 35110                                  ui_append:
 35111                                  					; es = arena of last block	
 35112 000032C8 2603060300              	add	ax,[es:ARENA.SIZE]	; ax=top of last block-1 para
 35113 000032CD 26832E030001            	sub	word [es:ARENA.SIZE],1	; reflect the space we are
 35114                                  					; going to rsrv on top of this 
 35115                                  					; block for the next arena.

 35117 000032D3 26C60600004D            	mov	byte [es:ARENA.SIGNATURE],arena_signature_normal
 35118                                  
 35119 000032D9 89C1                    	mov	cx,ax			; cx=top of prev block-1
 35120 000032DB 40                      	inc	ax
 35121 000032DC 29D8                    	sub	ax,bx			; ax=top of prev block - 
 35122                                  					;    seg. address of new block
 35123 000032DE F7D8                    	neg	ax
 35124                                  
 35125 000032E0 8EC1                    	mov	es,cx			; ds = arena of unused block
 35126                                  
 35127 000032E2 26C60600004D            	mov	byte [es:ARENA.SIGNATURE],arena_signature_normal
 35128 000032E8 26C70601000800          	mov	word [es:ARENA.OWNER],8	; mark as system owned
 35129 000032EF 26A30300                	mov	[es:ARENA.SIZE],ax	
 35130 000032F3 26C70608005343          	mov	word [es:ARENA.NAME],'SC'
 35131                                  
 35132                                  ; prepare the arena at start of new block
 35133 000032FA 8EC3                    	mov	es,bx
 35134 000032FC 26C60600005A            	mov	byte [es:ARENA.SIGNATURE],arena_signature_end
 35135 00003302 26C70601000000          	mov	word [es:ARENA.OWNER],arena_owner_system
 35136                                  					; mark as free
 35137 00003309 4A                      	dec	dx			; make room for arena
 35138 0000330A 2689160300              	mov	[es:ARENA.SIZE],dx	
 35139                                  ui_done:
 35140                                  uc_done: ; 31/12/2022 ; *!
 35141 0000330F 1F                      	pop	ds
 35142                                  	; ds = cs ; 31/12/2022
 35143                                  ;uc_done:	; 18/12/2022
 35144                                  au_exit:	; 09/09/2023
 35145 00003310 C3                      	retn

 35149                                  ; procedure : AllocUMB
 35150                                  ;
 35151                                  ;	Allocate all UMBs and link it to DOS arena chain
 35152                                  ;
 35153                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 35154                                  
 35155                                  AllocUMB:
 35156                                  	; 31/12/2022
 35157                                  	; ds = cs
 35158 00003311 E84700                  	call	InitAllocUMB		; link in the first UMB
 35159 00003314 72FA                    	jc	short au_exit		; quit on error
 35160                                  au_next:
 35161 00003316 E87000                  	call	umb_allocate		; allocate
 35162 00003319 7205                    	jc	short au_coalesce
 35163 0000331B E835FF                  	call	umb_insert		; & insert till no UMBs
 35164 0000331E EBF6                    	jmp	short au_next
 35165                                  au_coalesce:
 35166                                  	; 09/09/2023
 35167                                  ;	call	umb_coalesce		; coalesce all UMBs
 35168                                  ;au_exit:
 35169                                  ;	; 31/12/2022
 35170                                  ;	; ds = cs
 35171                                  ;	retn
 35172                                  
 35173                                  	; 09/09/2023
 35174                                  	;jmp	short umb_coalesce
 35175                                  
 35176                                  ; 09/09/2023 - Retro DOS v4.2 IO.SYS (Optimization)
 35177                                  
 35178                                  ; 13/04/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 35179                                  
 35180                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 35181                                  ;
 35182                                  ;**	umb_coalesce - Combine free blocks ahead with current block
 35183                                  ;
 35184                                  ;	Coalesce adds the block following the argument to the argument block,
 35185                                  ;	if it's free. Coalesce is usually used to join free blocks, but
 35186                                  ;	some callers (such as $setblock) use it to join a free block to it's
 35187                                  ;	preceeding allocated block.
 35188                                  ;
 35189                                  ;	EXIT	'C' clear if OK
 35190                                  ;		  (ds) unchanged, this block updated
 35191                                  ;		  (ax) = address of next block, IF not at end
 35192                                  ;		'C' set if arena trashed
 35193                                  ;	USES	cx, di, ds, es
 35194                                  ;
 35195                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 35196                                  
 35197                                  umb_coalesce:
 35198                                  	; 31/12/2022
 35199                                  	; ds = cs
 35200 00003320 1E                      	push	ds ; *!
 35201                                  
 35202 00003321 31FF                    	xor	di, di
 35203                                  
 35204                                  	;mov	es,[cs:DevDOSData]
 35205                                  	; 31/12/2022
 35206 00003323 8E06[671F]              	mov	es,[DevDOSData]
 35207 00003327 268E068C00              	mov	es,[es:UMB_ARENA]	; es = UMB_HEAD
 35208                                  uc_nextfree:
 35209 0000332C 8CC0                    	mov	ax,es
 35210 0000332E 8ED8                    	mov	ds,ax
 35211                                  	;cmp	[es:1],di
 35212 00003330 26393E0100              	cmp	[es:ARENA.OWNER],di	; Q: is current arena free
 35213 00003335 7407                    	je	short uc_again		; Y: try to coalesce with next block
 35214                                  					; N: get next arena
 35215 00003337 E86B00                  	call	get_next		; es, ax = next arena
 35216 0000333A 72D3                    	jc	short uc_done	; *!
 35217 0000333C EBEE                    	jmp	short uc_nextfree
 35218                                  uc_again:
 35219 0000333E E86400                  	call	get_next		; es, ax = next arena
 35220 00003341 72CC                    	jc	short uc_done	; *!
 35221                                  uc_check:
 35222 00003343 26393E0100              	cmp     [es:ARENA.OWNER],di	; Q: is arena free
 35223 00003348 75E2                    	jne	short uc_nextfree	; N: get next free arena
 35224                                  					; Y: coalesce
 35225 0000334A 268B0E0300              	mov     cx,[es:ARENA.SIZE]      ; cx <- next block size
 35226 0000334F 41                      	inc     cx                      ; cx <- cx + 1 (for header size)
 35227                                  	;add	[3],cx
 35228 00003350 010E0300                	add     [ARENA.SIZE],cx		; current size <- current size + cx
 35229 00003354 268A0D                  	mov     cl,[es:di]              ; move up signature
 35230 00003357 880D                    	mov     [di],cl
 35231 00003359 EBE3                    	jmp     short uc_again		; try again

 35285                                  ;
 35286                                  ; Procedure Name	: umb_allocate
 35287                                  ;
 35288                                  ; Inputs		: DS = data
 35289                                  ;
 35290                                  ; Outputs		: if UMB available
 35291                                  ;				Allocates the largest available UMB and 
 35292                                  ;			  	BX = segment of allocated block
 35293                                  ;				DX = size of allocated block
 35294                                  ;				NC
 35295                                  ;			  else 
 35296                                  ;				CY
 35297                                  ;
 35298                                  ; Uses			: BX, DX
 35299                                  ;

 35303                                  	; 31/12/2022
 35304                                  	; ds = cs

 35308                                  					;   possible
 35309                                  	; 31/12/2022

 35311                                  	;call	far [cs:DevXMSAddr]
 35312                                  					; dx now contains the size of
 35313                                  					; the largest UMB
 35314 00003393 09D2                    	or	dx,dx
 35315 00003395 740B                    	jz	short ua_err
 35316                                  	
 35317 00003397 B410                    	mov	ah,XMM_REQUEST_UMB ; 16
 35318                                  
 35319                                  	; 31/12/2022

 35322

 35324                                  	;jne	short ua_err		; N: error
 35325                                  	; 27/07/2023 - Retro DOS v4.2 IO.SYS (optimization)
 35326 000033A0 7601                    	jna	short ua_done ; if ax=1 then cf=0, else cf=1 (ax=0)
 35327                                  ua_err:
 35328 000033A2 F9                      	stc	
 35329                                  
 35330                                  	;clc
 35331                                  	; 02/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT compatibility)
 35332                                  	; 12/12/2022
 35333                                  	; cf=0
 35334                                  	;clc

 35336 000033A3 58                      	pop	ax

 35392                                  	; ds = cs

 35395 000033BF B106                    	mov	cl,6

 35397

 35400                                  
 35401 000033C7 F7D8                    	neg	ax
 35402

 35404                                  	; 09/09/2023

 35406 000033CA 8EC1                    	mov	es,cx			; es = first umb_arena
 35407

 35409 000033D2 26C70601000800          	mov	word [es:ARENA.OWNER],8	; mark as system owned
 35410                                  					
 35411 000033D9 26A30300                	mov	[es:ARENA.SIZE],ax	
 35412 000033DD 26C70608005343          	mov	word [es:ARENA.NAME],'SC' ; 4353h
 35413

 35419                                  					; mark as free

 35421 000033F4 2689160300              	mov	[es:ARENA.SIZE],dx

 35424                                  	; 31/12/2022

 35430                                  					;  data segment with the arena

 35439 00003407 31FF                    	xor	di,di
 35440                                  ;scan_next
 35441                                  ; 09/12/2022

 35449 00003417 8EC0                    	mov	es,ax
 35450                                  	;jmp	short scan_next
 35451                                  	; 09/12/2022
 35452 00003419 EBEE                    	jmp	short scannext
 35453                                  got_last:
 35454                                  	;sub	word [es:ARENA.SIZE],1
 35455                                  	; 09/09/2023
 35456 0000341B 26FF0E0300              	dec	word [es:ARENA.SIZE]
 35457                                  
 35458 00003420 26C60600004D            	mov	byte [es:ARENA.SIGNATURE],arena_signature_normal ; 'M'
 35459                                  	;clc
 35460                                  	; 01/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT compatibility)
 35461                                  	; 11/12/2022
 35462                                  	; cf=0
 35463                                  	;clc

 35477                                  ; procedure : ShrinkUMB
 35478                                  ;
 35479                                  ;	Shrinks the current UMB in use, so that the unused portions
 35480                                  ;	of the UMB is given back to the DOS free mem pool
 35481                                  ;
 35482                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 35483                                  
 35484                                  ShrinkUMB:
 35485                                  	; 12/12/2022
 35486                                  	; ds = cs
 35487 00003427 833E[4A1F]00            	cmp	word [DevUMBAddr],0
 35488                                  	;cmp	word [cs:DevUMBAddr],0
 35489 0000342C 741F                    	je	short su_exit
 35490 0000342E 06                      	push	es
 35491                                  	; 01/01/2023
 35492                                  	;push	bx
 35493                                  	; 12/12/2022
 35494                                  	;mov	bx,[cs:DevUMBFree]
 35495                                  	;sub	bx,[cs:DevUMBAddr]
 35496                                  	;mov	es,[cs:DevUMBAddr]
 35497 0000342F 8B1E[4E1F]              	mov	bx,[DevUMBFree]
 35498 00003433 2B1E[4A1F]              	sub	bx,[DevUMBAddr]
 35499 00003437 8E06[4A1F]              	mov	es,[DevUMBAddr]
 35500                                  	
 35501 0000343B B8004A                  	mov	ax,4A00h
 35502 0000343E CD21                    	int	21h
 35503                                  		; DOS - 2+ - ADJUST MEMORY BLOCK SIZE (SETBLOCK)
 35504                                  		; ES = segment address of block to change
 35505                                  		; BX = new size in paragraphs
 35506 00003440 8CC0                    	mov	ax,es
 35507 00003442 48                      	dec	ax
 35508 00003443 8EC0                    	mov	es,ax
 35509 00003445 26C70601000800          	mov	word [es:ARENA.OWNER],8
 35510                                  	; 01/01/2023
 35511                                  	;pop	bx
 35512 0000344C 07                      	pop	es
 35513                                  su_exit:
 35514 0000344D C3                      	retn

 35533                                  	; 12/12/2022
 35534 00003457 8E06[671F]              	mov	es,[DevDOSData]
 35535                                  	;mov	es,[cs:DevDOSData]	; get DOS data seg
 35536 0000345B 268E1E2400              	mov	ds,[es:DOS_ARENA]
 35537 00003460 268B3E8C00              	mov	di,[es:UMB_ARENA]
 35538                                  ulu_next:
 35539 00003465 E83DFF                  	call	get_next
 35540 00003468 720D                    	jc	short ulu_x
 35541 0000346A 39C7                    	cmp	di,ax			; is the next one UMB ?
 35542 0000346C 7404                    	je	short ulu_found
 35543 0000346E 8ED8                    	mov	ds,ax
 35544 00003470 EBF3                    	jmp	short ulu_next
 35545                                  ulu_found:

 35547 00003472 C60600005A              	mov     byte [ARENA.SIGNATURE],arena_signature_end ; 'Z'
 35548                                  ulu_x:

 35550 00003478 1F                      	pop	ds
 35551 00003479 C3                      	retn

 35553                                  ; ----------------------------------------------------------------------
 35554                                  ; SYSINIT2.ASM - MSDOS 6.0 - 1991
 35555                                  ; ----------------------------------------------------------------------
 35556                                  ; 14/04/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 35557                                  
 35558                                  ; Multiple configuration block support  Created 16-Mar-1992 by JeffPar
 35559                                  ;
 35560                                  ; Summary:
 35561                                  ;
 35562                                  ;   The procedure "organize" crunches the in-memory copy of config.sys
 35563                                  ;   into lines delimited by CR/LF (sometimes no CR, but *always* an LF)
 35564                                  ;   with the leading "keyword=" replaced by single character codes (eg, B
 35565                                  ;   for BUFFERS, D for DEVICE, Z for any unrecognized keyword); see comtab
 35566                                  ;   and/or config.inc for the full list.
 35567                                  ;
 35568                                  ;   [blockname] and INCLUDE are the major syntactical additions for multi-
 35569                                  ;   configuration support. blockname is either MENU, which contains one
 35570                                  ;   or more MENUITEM lines, an optional MENUDEFAULT (which includes optional
 35571                                  ;   time-out), or any user-defined keyword, such as NETWORK, CD-ROM, etc.
 35572                                  ;   INCLUDE allows the current block to name another block for inclusion
 35573                                  ;   during the processing phase of CONFIG.SYS. An INCLUDE is only honored
 35574                                  ;   once, precluding nasty infinite-loop scenarios. If blocks are present
 35575                                  ;   without a MENU block, then only lines inside COMMON blocks are processed.
 35576                                  ;
 35577                                  ; Example:
 35578                                  ;
 35579                                  ;   [menu]
 35580                                  ;   menuitem=misc,Miscellaneous
 35581                                  ;   menuitem=network,Network Configuration
 35582                                  ;   menudefault=network,15
 35583                                  ;
 35584                                  ;   [network]
 35585                                  ;   include misc
 35586                                  ;   device=foo
 35587                                  ;
 35588                                  ;   [misc]
 35589                                  ;   device=bar
 35590                                  ;   include alternate
 35591                                  ;
 35592                                  ;   [alternate]
 35593                                  ;   device=tar
 35594                                  ;
 35595                                  ;
 35596                                  ;   When the menu is displayed
 35597                                  ;
 35598                                  ;    1. Miscellaneous
 35599                                  ;    2. Network Configuration
 35600                                  ;
 35601                                  ;   #2 is highlighted as the default option, and will be automatically
 35602                                  ;   selected after 15 seconds. It will invoke the following lines in the
 35603                                  ;   following order:
 35604                                  ;
 35605                                  ;       DEVICE=BAR
 35606                                  ;       DEVICE=TAR
 35607                                  ;       DEVICE=FOO
 35608                                  ;
 35609                                  
 35610                                  ;MULTI_CONFIG equ 1
 35611                                  
 35612                                  ; the following depend on the positions of the various letters in switchlist
 35613                                  
 35614                                  switchnum	equ 11111000b ; 0F8h	; which switches require number
 35615                                  
 35616                                  flagec35	equ 00000100b ; 4	; electrically compatible 3.5 inch disk drive
 35617                                  flagdrive	equ 00001000b ; 8 
 35618                                  flagcyln	equ 00010000b ; 16
 35619                                  flagseclim	equ 00100000b ; 32
 35620                                  flagheads	equ 01000000b ; 64
 35621                                  flagff		equ 10000000b ; 128
 35622                                  
 35623                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 35624                                  ; 19/04/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 35625                                  
 35626                                  ; MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS - SYSINIT:3E78h
 35627                                  
 35628                                  ; 01/11/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)
 35629                                  ; MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS - SYSINIT:3054h
 35630                                  
 35631 0000347A 00                      insert_blank:	db 	0
 35632

 35641

 35647 0000347F 52                      	push	dx
 35648                                  
 35649 00003480 0E                      	push	cs
 35650 00003481 1F                      	pop	ds
 35651                                  
 35652 00003482 31DB                    	xor	bx,bx
 35653 00003484 8A1E[3649]              	mov	bl,[drive]
 35654                                  	; 18/12/2022
 35655 00003488 43                      	inc	bx
 35656                                  	;inc	bl			; get it correct for ioctl call
 35657                                  					; (1=a,2=b...)
 35658 00003489 BA[0E48]                	mov	dx,deviceparameters

 35665                                  	; 04/07/2023

 35667 00003492 CD21                    	int	21h
 35668                                  
 35669                                  ; 27/07/2023 - Retro DOS v4.2 IO.SYS (optimization)
 35670 00003494 8A26[3749]              	mov	ah,[switches]
 35671                                  	;mov	al,[deviceparameters+20]
 35672 00003498 A0[2248]                	mov	al,[deviceparameters+A_DEVICEPARAMETERS.DP_BPB+A_BPB.BPB_SECTORSPERTRACK]
 35673 0000349B 8A0E[3649]              	mov	cl,[drive]
 35674                                  ;
 35675                                  ;; 01/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT compatibility)
 35676                                  ;	;;mov	ax,Bios_Data		; get Bios_Data segment
 35677                                  ;	;mov	ax,KERNEL_SEGMENT ; 70h
 35678                                  ;	; 21/10/2022
 35679                                  ;	;mov	ax,DOSBIODATASEG ; 0070h	
 35680                                  ;	;mov	ds,ax			; set Bios_Data segment
 35681                                  ;
 35682                                  ;	; 27/07/2023
 35683                                  ;	;;test	word [cs:switches],flagec35 ; 4
 35684                                  ;	;test	byte [cs:switches],flagec35
 35685                                  ;	;jz	short not_ec35
 35686                                  ;
 35687                                  ;	; 27/07/2023
 35688                                  ;	; 01/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT compatibility)
 35689                                  ;	;;test	word [switches],flagec35 ; 4
 35690                                  ;	; 12/12/2022
 35691                                  ;	;test	byte [switches],flagec35 ; 4
 35692                                  ;	;jz	short eot_ok
 35693                                  ;	
 35694                                  	;mov	cl,[cs:drive]		; which drive was this for?
 35695                                  	; 02/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT compatibility)
 35696                                  	;mov	cl,[drive]
 35697                                  	; 27/07/2023
 35698                                  	;mov	ax,DOSBIODATASEG ; 0070h	
 35699                                  	;mov	ds,ax
 35700

 35705 000034A7 7408                    	jz	short not_ec35

 35708                                  	;shl	al,cl			; set proper bit depending on drive
 35709                                  	;;or	[531h],al ; (MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS Offset SYINIT:3EACh)
 35710                                  	;or	[ec35_flag],al		; set the bit in the permanent flags
 35711                                  	; 27/07/2023
 35712 000034A9 B401                    	mov	ah,1
 35713 000034AB D2E4                    	shl	ah,cl
 35714 000034AD 0826[2005]              	or	[ec35_flag],ah
 35715                                  
 35716                                  ; 07/07/2023 - Retro DOS v4.2 IO.SYS (optimization)
 35717                                  ;	MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS - SYINIT:3EB0h	
 35718                                  ; 01/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT compatibility)
 35719                                  not_ec35:

 35721                                  ;	sectors per track than any old ones.
 35722                                  
 35723                                  	; 27/07/2023
 35724                                  	;;mov	al,[cs:deviceparameters+20]

 35726

 35728 000034B1 3A06[2C01]              	cmp	al,[eot]
 35729 000034B5 7603                    	jbe	short eot_ok
 35730 000034B7 A2[2C01]                	mov	[eot],al
 35731                                  eot_ok:

 35733 000034BB 59                      	pop	cx
 35734 000034BC 5B                      	pop	bx
 35735 000034BD 58                      	pop	ax
 35736 000034BE 1F                      	pop	ds ; 13/05/2019
 35737 000034BF C3                      	retn

 35740                                  ;
 35741                                  ; procedure : diddleback
 35742                                  ;

 35769                                  ; procedure : parseline
 35770                                  ;
 35771                                  ; entry point is parseline. al contains the first character in command line.
 35772                                  ;
 35773                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 35774                                  
 35775                                  	; 03/01/2023 - Retrodos v4.2 (Modified MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS)
 35776                                  	; (SYSINIT:3EDFh)
 35777                                  
 35778                                  	; 01/11/2022 - Retrodos v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)
 35779                                  	; (SYSINIT:30ACh)
 35780                                  parseline:
 35781                                  	; 03/01/2023
 35782                                  	; ds = cs ; *
 35783                                  
 35784                                  	;push	ds ; *
 35785                                  
 35786                                  	;push	cs ; *
 35787                                  	;pop	ds ; *
 35788                                  
 35789                                  nextswtch:
 35790                                  	cmp	al,cr			; carriage return?
 35791                                  	je	short done_line
 35792                                  	cmp	al,lf			; linefeed?
 35793                                  	je	short put_back		; put it back and done
 35794                                  
 35795                                  ; anything less or equal to a space is ignored.
 35796                                  
 35797                                  	cmp	al,' '                  ; space?
 35798                                  	jbe	short getnext		; skip over space
 35799                                  	cmp	al,'/'
 35800                                  	je	short getparm

 35802                                  	;jmp	short exitpl
 35803                                  	; 03/01/2023
 35804                                  swterr:
 35805                                  	retn
 35806                                  
 35807                                  getparm:

 35809                                  	mov	[switches],bx		; save switches read so far
 35810                                  	jc	short swterr
 35811                                  getnext:
 35812                                  	call	getchr
 35813                                  	;jc	short done_line
 35814                                  	;jmp	short nextswtch
 35815                                  	; 03/01/2023

 35817                                  ;swterr:
 35818                                  	;jmp	short exitpl		; exit if error
 35819

 35823                                  	;test	word [switches],flagdrive ; 8 ; see if drive specified

 35825                                  	stc				; mark error no-drive-specified
 35826                                  	;jmp	short exitpl
 35827                                  	; 03/01/2023
 35828                                  	retn
 35829

 35835                                  	;clc			    ; everything is fine
 35836                                  	; 01/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT compatibility)
 35837                                  	; 12/12/2022
 35838                                  	; cf=0
 35839                                  	;clc

 35843                                  ;exitpl:

 35846                                  	;pop	ds ; *
 35847                                  	retn

 35857                                  ; procedure : check_switch
 35858                                  ;
 35859                                  ; processes a switch in the input. it ensures that the switch is valid, and
 35860                                  ; gets the number, if any required, following the switch. the switch and the
 35861                                  ; number *must* be separated by a colon. carry is set if there is any kind of
 35862                                  ; error.

 35866                                  ; 09/09/2023

 36132                                  ;
 36133                                  ; procedure : setdeviceparameters
 36134                                  ;
 36135                                  ; setdeviceparameters sets up the recommended bpb in each bds in the
 36136                                  ; system based on the form factor. it is assumed that the bpbs for the
 36137                                  ; various form factors are present in the bpbtable. for hard files,
 36138                                  ; the recommended bpb is the same as the bpb on the drive.
 36139                                  ; no attempt is made to preserve registers since we are going to jump to
 36140                                  ; sysinit straight after this routine.
 36141                                  ;
 36142                                  ;	if we return carry, the DRIVPARM will be aborted, but presently
 36143                                  ;	  we always return no carry
 36144                                  ;
 36145                                  ;	note:  there is a routine by the same name in msdioctl.asm
 36146                                  ;
 36147                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 36148                                  
 36149                                  ; 15/04/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 36150                                  
 36151                                  	; 02/11/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)
 36152                                  
 36153                                  	; 03/01/2023 - Retro DOS v4.2 (Modified MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS)
 36154                                  	; (SYSINIT:3FC4h)
 36155                                  
 36156                                  	; 09/09/2023 - Retro DOS v4.2 IO.SYS (Optimization)
 36157                                  	; (PCDOS 7.1 IBMBIO.COM - SYSINIT:4236h)
 36158                                  
 36159                                  setdeviceparameters:
 36160                                  	; 03/01/2023
 36161                                  	; ds = cs
 36162                                  
 36163 0000359F 06                      	push	es
 36164                                  
 36165 000035A0 0E                      	push	cs
 36166 000035A1 07                      	pop	es
 36167                                  
 36168 000035A2 31DB                    	xor	bx,bx
 36169 000035A4 8A1E[0F48]              	mov	bl,[deviceparameters+A_DEVICEPARAMETERS.DP_DEVICETYPE]
 36170 000035A8 80FB00                  	cmp	bl,DEV_5INCH ; 0
 36171 000035AB 7506                    	jne	short got_80
 36172                                  
 36173 000035AD C706[1248]2800          	mov	word [deviceparameters+A_DEVICEPARAMETERS.DP_CYLINDERS],40
 36174                                  							; 48 tpi=40 cyl
 36175                                  got_80:
 36176 000035B3 D1E3                    	shl	bx,1			; get index into bpb table
 36177 000035B5 8BB7[B649]              	mov	si,[bpbtable+bx]	; get address of bpb
 36178                                  
 36179                                  	;mov	di,deviceparameters+7	
 36180                                  	; 02/11/2022
 36181 000035B9 BF[1548]                	mov	di,deviceparameters+A_DEVICEPARAMETERS.DP_BPB ; es:di -> bpb
