 36208                                  	;mov	[deviceparameters+22],ax	
 36209 000035DA A3[2448]                	mov	[deviceparameters+A_DEVICEPARAMETERS.DP_BPB+A_BPB.BPB_HEADS],ax
 36210                                  
 36211                                  heads_not_altered:
 36212                                  
 36213                                  ; set up correct media descriptor byte and sectors/cluster
 36214                                  ;   sectors/cluster is always 2 except for any one sided disk or 1.44M
 36215                                  
 36216                                  	;mov	byte [deviceparameters+9],2
 36217                                  	; 02/11/2022
 36218                                  	;mov	byte [deviceparameters+A_DEVICEPARAMETERS.DP_BPB+A_BPB.BPB_SECTORSPERCLUSTER],2
 36219                                  	; 03/01/2023
 36220 000035DD B80200                  	mov	ax,2	
 36221 000035E0 A2[1748]                	mov	[deviceparameters+A_DEVICEPARAMETERS.DP_BPB+A_BPB.BPB_SECTORSPERCLUSTER],al ; 2
 36222                                  
 36223 000035E3 B3F0                    	mov	bl,0F0h			; get default mediabyte
 36224                                  
 36225                                  ;	preload the mediadescriptor from the bpb into bh for convenient access
 36226                                  
 36227                                  	;mov	bh,[deviceparameters+17]
 36228                                  	; 02/11/2022
 36229 000035E5 8A3E[1F48]              	mov	bh,[deviceparameters+A_DEVICEPARAMETERS.DP_BPB+A_BPB.BPB_MEDIADESCRIPTOR]
 36230                                  	
 36231                                  	; 03/01/2023
 36232                                  	; ax = 2
 36233 000035E9 3906[2448]              	cmp	[deviceparameters+A_DEVICEPARAMETERS.DP_BPB+A_BPB.BPB_HEADS],ax ; >2 heads?
 36234                                  	;cmp	word [deviceparameters+A_DEVICEPARAMETERS.DP_BPB+A_BPB.BPB_HEADS],2 ; >2 heads?
 36235 000035ED 773C                    	ja	short got_correct_mediad ; just use default if heads>2
 36236                                  
 36237 000035EF 7524                    	jne	short only_one_head	; one head, do one head stuff
 36238                                  
 36239                                  ;	two head drives will use the mediadescriptor from the bpb
 36240                                  
 36241 000035F1 88FB                    	mov	bl,bh			; get mediadescriptor from bpb
 36242                                  
 36243                                  ;	two sided drives have two special cases to look for. One is
 36244                                  ;	   a 320K diskette (40 tracks, 8 secs per track). It uses
 36245                                  ;	   a mediaid of 0fch. The other is 1.44M, which uses only
 36246                                  ;	   one sector/cluster.
 36247                                  
 36248                                  ;	any drive with 18secs/trk, 2 heads, 80 tracks, will be assumed
 36249                                  ;	   to be a 1.44M and use only 1 sector per cluster. Any other
 36250                                  ;	   type of 2 headed drive is all set.
 36251

 36706 00003797 A2[5303]                	mov	[cmmt2],al
 36707 0000379A FE06[5103]              	inc	byte [cmmt]
 36708                                  
 36709                                  get_cmt_end:
 36710 0000379E E88C00                  	call	get2
 36711 000037A1 3C0A                    	cmp	al,lf
 36712 000037A3 75F9                    	jne	short get_cmt_end	; skip it.
 36713                                  end_commd_line_brdg: 
 36714 000037A5 E997FE                  	jmp	end_commd_line		; else jmp to end_commd_line
 36715                                  
 36716                                  org_put_zero:				; make the filename in front of
 36717 000037A8 26C60500                	mov	byte [es:di],0		;  the comment string to be an asciiz.
 36718 000037AC 47                      	inc	di
 36719 000037AD E98FFE                  	jmp	end_commd_line		;  (maybe null if device=/*)
 36720                                  
 36721                                  end_file_slash: 			; al = "/" option char.
 36722 000037B0 26C60500                	mov	byte [es:di],0		; make a filename an asciiz
 36723 000037B4 47                      	inc	di			; and
 36724 000037B5 AA                      	stosb				; store "/" after that.
 36725 000037B6 EB1A                    	jmp	short org5		; continue with the rest of the line
 36726                                  
 36727                                  end_copy_file:
 36728 000037B8 26C645FF00              	mov	byte [es:di-1],0	; make it an asciiz and handle the next char.
 36729 000037BD 3C0A                    	cmp	al,lf
 36730 000037BF 74E4                    	je	short end_commd_line_brdg
 36731 000037C1 EB0F                    	jmp	short org5
 36732                                  
 36733                                  org4:					; org4 skips all delimiters after the command name except for '/'
 36734 000037C3 E88100                  	call	skip_comment
 36735 000037C6 74DD                    	jz	short end_commd_line_brdg
 36736                                  
 36737 000037C8 E86200                  	call	get2
 36738 000037CB E81C0A                  	call	org_delim		; skip delimiters except '/' (mrw 4/88)
 36739 000037CE 74F3                    	jz	short org4
 36740 000037D0 EB08                    	jmp	short org51
 36741                                  
 36742                                  org5:					; rest of the line
 36743 000037D2 E87200                  	call	skip_comment		; comment?
 36744 000037D5 74CE                    	jz	short end_commd_line_brdg
 36745 000037D7 E85300                  	call	get2			; not a comment.
 36746                                  
 36747                                  org51:
 36748 000037DA AA                      	stosb				; copy the character
 36749 000037DB 3C22                    	cmp	al,'"' 	; 22h		; a quote ?
 36750 000037DD 743A                    	je	short at_quote
 36751 000037DF 3C20                    	cmp	al,' '  ; 20h
 36752 000037E1 77EF                    	ja	short org5
 36753                                  
 36754                                  	; 09/09/2023
 36755                                  	; (Note: PCDOS 7.1 IBMBIO.COM does not contain M051 modification)
 36756                                  
 36757                                  					; M051 - Start
 36758                                  	; 03/01/2023
 36759                                  	; ds = cs
 36760 000037E3 803E[5403]55                    cmp	byte [cmd_indicator],CONFIG_DEVICEHIGH
 36761                                  	;cmp	byte [cs:cmd_indicator],CONFIG_DEVICEHIGH ; Q: is this devicehigh
 36762 000037E8 7514                    	jne	short not_dh		; N: 
 36763 000037EA 3C0A                    	cmp	al,lf			; Q: is this line feed
 36764 000037EC 7416                    	je	short org_dhlf		; Y: stuff a blank before the lf
 36765 000037EE 3C0D                    	cmp	al,cr			; Q: is this a cr
 36766 000037F0 75E0                    	jne	short org5		; N: 
 36767 000037F2 26C645FF20              	mov	byte [es:di-1],' '	; overwrite cr with blank
 36768 000037F7 AA                      	stosb				; put cr after blank
 36769 000037F8 FE06[7A34]              	inc	byte [insert_blank]
 36770                                  	;inc	byte [cs:insert_blank]	; indicate that blank has been 
 36771                                  					; inserted
 36772 000037FC EBD4                    	jmp	short org5
 36773                                  not_dh:					; M051 - End
 36774                                  
 36775 000037FE 3C0A                    	cmp	al,lf			; line feed?
 36776 00003800 740F                    	je	short org1_brdg		; handles the next command line.
 36777 00003802 EBCE                    	jmp	short org5		; handles next char in this line.
 36778                                  
 36779                                  org_dhlf:				; M051 - Start
 36780                                  	; 03/01/2023
 36781                                  	; ds = cs
 36782 00003804 803E[7A34]01            	cmp	byte [insert_blank],1
 36783                                  	;cmp	byte [cs:insert_blank],1 ; Q:has a blank already been inserted
 36784 00003809 7406                    	je	short org1_brdg		; Y:
 36785 0000380B 26C645FF20              	mov	byte [es:di-1],' '	; overwrite lf with blank
 36786 00003810 AA                      	stosb				; put lf after blank
 36787                                  					; M051 - End
 36788                                  org1_brdg:

 36791                                  					; M051: devicehigh
 36792 00003816 E93CFE                  	jmp	org1
 36793                                  
 36794                                  at_quote:

 36796                                  	;cmp	byte [cs:com_level],0

 36809                                  ; procedure : get2

 36811                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 36812                                  
 36813                                  	; 02/11/2022 - Retrodos v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)
 36814                                  	; (SYSINIT:33FAh)
 36815

 36820                                  	;
 36821                                  	; 02/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT compatibility)
 36822                                  	;;lods	byte ptr es:[si]
 36823                                  	; 12/12/2022
 36824 0000382F 26                      	es	
 36825 00003830 AC                      	lodsb
 36826                                  	;mov	al, [es:si]
 36827                                  	;inc	si
 36828                                  	;
 36829 00003831 49                      	dec	cx
 36830 00003832 C3                      	retn
 36831                                  noget:
 36832 00003833 59                      	pop	cx
 36833                                  	; 03/01/2023
 36834                                  	; ds = cs
 36835                                  	;mov	[cs:count],di ; 13/05/2019
 36836                                  	;mov	[cs:org_count],di
 36837 00003834 893E[5603]              	mov	[count],di
 36838 00003838 893E[5803]              	mov	[org_count],di
 36839 0000383C 31F6                    	xor	si,si
 36840                                  	;mov	[cs:chrptr],si
 36841 0000383E 8936[5A03]              	mov	[chrptr],si
 36842                                  
 36843                                  	; 02/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT compatibility)
 36844                                  
 36845                                  ; 03/01/2023 - Retrodos v4.2 (Modified MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS)
 36846                                  
 36847                                  ;ifndef MULTI_CONFIG
 36848                                  ;	retn
 36849                                  ;else
 36850                                  
 36851                                  ;   This was the rather kludgy way out of procedure "organize", but instead
 36852                                  ;   of returning to doconf, we now want to check config.sys BEGIN/END blocks
 36853                                  ;   and the new boot menu stuff...
 36854                                  
 36855 00003842 89F9                    	mov     cx,di
 36856 00003844 E9E300                  	jmp     menu_check
 36857                                  
 36858                                  ;endif

 36863                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 36864                                  ;
 36865                                  ; procedure : skip_comment
 36866                                  ;
 36867                                  ;skip the commented string until lf, if current es:si-> a comment string.
 36868                                  ;in) es:si-> string
 36869                                  ;	 cx -> length.
 36870                                  ;out) zero flag not set if not found a comment string.
 36871                                  ;	  zero flag set if found a comment string and skipped it. al will contain
 36872                                  ;	  the line feed character at this moment when return.
 36873                                  ;	  ax register destroyed.
 36874                                  ;	  if found, si, cx register adjusted accordingly.
 36875                                  ;
 36876                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 36877                                  
 36878                                  	; 03/01/2023 - Retrodos v4.2 (Modified MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS)
 36879                                  	; (SYSINIT:428Dh)
 36880                                  
 36881                                  skip_comment:
 36882 00003847 E3EA                    	jcxz	noget		; get out of the organize routine.
 36883                                  
 36884                                  	; 03/01/2023
 36885                                  	; ds = cs	
 36886                                  
 36887 00003849 803E[5003]00            	cmp	byte [com_level],0
 36888                                  	;cmp	byte [cs:com_level],0 ; only check it if parameter level is 0.
 36889 0000384E 752C                    	jne	short no_commt	 ; (not inside quotations)
 36890                                  
 36891 00003850 803E[5103]01            	cmp	byte [cmmt],1
 36892                                  	;cmp	byte [cs:cmmt],1
 36893 00003855 7225                    	jb	short no_commt
 36894                                  
 36895 00003857 268A04                  	mov	al,[es:si]
 36896                                  	
 36897 0000385A 3806[5203]              	cmp	[cmmt1],al
 36898                                  	;cmp	[cs:cmmt1],al
 36899 0000385E 751C                    	jne	short no_commt
 36900                                  
 36901 00003860 803E[5103]02            	cmp	byte [cmmt],2
 36902                                  	;cmp	byte [cs:cmmt],2
 36903 00003865 750A                    	jne	short skip_cmmt
 36904                                  
 36905 00003867 268A4401                	mov	al,[es:si+1]
 36906                                  	
 36907 0000386B 3806[5303]              	cmp	[cmmt2],al
 36908                                  	;cmp	[cs:cmmt2],al
 36909 0000386F 750B                    	jne	short no_commt
 36910                                  skip_cmmt:
 36911 00003871 E3C0                    	jcxz	noget		; get out of organize routine.
 36912 00003873 268A04                  	mov	al,[es:si]
 36913 00003876 46                      	inc	si
 36914 00003877 49                      	dec	cx
 36915 00003878 3C0A                    	cmp	al,lf		; line feed?
 36916 0000387A 75F5                    	jne	short skip_cmmt
 36917                                  no_commt:
 36918 0000387C C3                      	retn

 36928                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 36929                                  ;
 36930                                  ;   kbd_read: wait for keystroke
 36931                                  ;
 36932                                  ;   INPUT
 36933                                  ;       DS == CS == sysinitseg
 36934                                  ;
 36935                                  ;   OUTPUT
 36936                                  ;       Carry SET to clean boot, CLEAR otherwise
 36937                                  ;
 36938                                  ;   OTHER REGS USED
 36939                                  ;       All
 36940                                  ;
 36941                                  ;   HISTORY
 36942                                  ;       Created 16-Nov-1992 by JeffPar
 36943                                  ;
 36944                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 36945                                  
 36946                                  kbd_read:
 36947 0000387D F606[DA46]02                    test    byte [bDisableUI],2
 36948 00003882 7520                            jnz     short kbd_nodelay
 36949                                  
 36950 00003884 1E                              push    ds              ; the bios timer tick count is incremented
 36951 00003885 29C0                            sub     ax,ax           ; 18.2 times per second;
 36952 00003887 8ED8                            mov     ds,ax           ; watch the timer tick count for 37 transitions
 36953                                  	;mov	dx,[046Ch]	; get initial value
 36954                                  kbd_loop:
 36955 00003889 B401                            mov     ah,1            ;
 36956 0000388B CD16                            int     16h             ; peek the keyboard
 36957 0000388D 7514                            jnz	short kbd_loopdone ; something's there, get out
 36958 0000388F B402                            mov     ah,2            ; peek the shift states
 36959 00003891 CD16                            int     16h             ;
 36960 00003893 A803                            test    al,03h          ; either right or left shift key bits set?
 36961 00003895 750C                            jnz	short kbd_loopdone ; yes
 36962 00003897 A16C04                          mov     ax,[046Ch]	;
 36963                                  	;sub	ax,dx           ; get difference
 36964                                  	; 15/04/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 36965 0000389A 2E2B06[8603]            	sub	ax,[cs:_timer_lw_] ; MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS - SYSINIT:42E5h        
 36966                                  
 36967 0000389F 3C25                    	cmp     al,37           ; reached limit?  ; (2 seconds)
 36968 000038A1 72E6                            jb	short kbd_loop	; not yet
 36969                                  kbd_loopdone:
 36970 000038A3 1F                              pop     ds              ; delay complete!
 36971                                  kbd_nodelay:
 36972 000038A4 29DB                            sub     bx,bx           ; assume clean boot
 36973 000038A6 B402                            mov     ah,2            ; peek the shift states
 36974 000038A8 CD16                            int     16h             ;
 36975 000038AA A803                            test    al,03h          ; either right or left shift key bits set?
 36976 000038AC 7407                            jz      short kbd_notshift ; no
 36977 000038AE 43                              inc     bx              ; yes
 36978 000038AF 43                              inc     bx
 36979                                  	; MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS - SYSINIT:4301h
 36980 000038B0 800E[DE46]04            	or	byte [bQueryOpt],4
 36981                                  kbd_notshift:                   ;
 36982 000038B5 B401                            mov     ah,1            ; peek the keyboard
 36983 000038B7 CD16                            int     16h             ;
 36984 000038B9 743E                            jz	short kbd_test	; no key present
 36985 000038BB 08C0                            or      al,al           ; is it a function key?
 36986 000038BD 753A                            jnz	short kbd_test	; no
 36987                                  
 36988                                  	; MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS - SYSINIT:430Bh
 36989 000038BF 80FC62                          cmp     ah,62h          ; CTRL F5
 36990 000038C2 7405                            je	short kbd_cfg_bypass
 36991                                  	
 36992 000038C4 80FC3F                          cmp     ah,3Fh          ; F5 function key?
 36993 000038C7 750D                            jne	short kbd_notf5	; no
 36994                                  kbd_cfg_bypass:
 36995 000038C9 BA[714B]                        mov     dx,_$CleanMsg
 36996 000038CC E8DD0B                          call    print
 36997                                  	; MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS - SYSINIT:431Bh
 36998 000038CF 800E[DE46]04            	or	byte [bQueryOpt],4 
 36999 000038D4 EB16                            jmp     short kbd_eat   ; yes, clean boot selected
 37000                                  kbd_notf5:
 37001                                  	; MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS - SYSINIT:4322h
 37002 000038D6 80FC65                          cmp     ah,65h          ; CTRL F8
 37003 000038D9 7405                            je	short kbd_cfg_confirm
 37004                                  
 37005 000038DB 80FC42                          cmp     ah,42h          ; F8 function key?
 37006 000038DE 7523                            jne	short kbd_exit	; no
 37007                                  kbd_cfg_confirm:
 37008 000038E0 BA[AF4B]                        mov     dx,_$InterMsg
 37009 000038E3 E8C60B                          call    print           ;
 37010 000038E6 B301                            mov     bl,1            ; yes, interactive-boot option enabled
 37011 000038E8 881E[DE46]                      mov     [bQueryOpt],bl  ; change default setting
 37012                                  kbd_eat:                        ;
 37013 000038EC B400                            mov     ah,0            ;
 37014 000038EE CD16                            int     16h             ; eat the key we assumed was a signal
 37015 000038F0 C606[E446]FF                    mov	byte [secElapsed],-1
 37016 000038F5 09DB                            or      bx,bx           ;
 37017 000038F7 7405                            jz	short kbd_clean	;
 37018                                  kbd_test:                       ;
 37019 000038F9 80FB02                          cmp     bl,2            ;
 37020 000038FC 7205                            jb	short kbd_exit	;
 37021                                  kbd_clean:                      ;
 37022 000038FE E86E08                          call    disable_autoexec; yes, tell COMMAND to skip autoexec.bat
 37023 00003901 F9                              stc                     ; set carry to indicate abort
 37024 00003902 C3                              retn			;
 37025                                  kbd_exit:                       ;
 37026 00003903 F8                              clc                     ; clear carry to indicate success
 37027 00003904 C3                              retn			;
 37028                                  
 37029                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 37030                                  ;
 37031                                  ;   set_numlock: set numlock LED
 37032                                  ;
 37033                                  ;   INPUT
 37034                                  ;       ES:SI -> numlock setting (ie, "ON" or "OFF")
 37035                                  ;
 37036                                  ;   OUTPUT
 37037                                  ;       None
 37038                                  ;
 37039                                  ;   OTHER REGS USED
 37040                                  ;       None
 37041                                  ;
 37042                                  ;   HISTORY
 37043                                  ;       Created 16-Nov-1992 by JeffPar
 37044                                  ;
 37045                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 37046                                  
 37047                                  	; 04/01/2023 - Retro DOS v4.2
 37048                                  
 37049                                  set_numlock:
 37050                                          ; 04/01/2023
 37051                                  	;push	ax
 37052 00003905 1E                              push    ds
 37053 00003906 29C0                            sub     ax,ax
 37054 00003908 8ED8                            mov     ds,ax
 37055 0000390A 268B04                          mov     ax,[es:si]      ; get 1st 2 bytes of value (ON or OF)
 37056 0000390D 2E3B06[4C4B]                    cmp     ax,[cs:OnOff+2]	; should we turn it off?
 37057 00003912 7507                            jne	short not_off	; no
 37058 00003914 80261704DF                      and     byte [0417h],~20h ; 0DFh
 37059 00003919 EB0D                            jmp     short set_done
 37060                                  not_off:
 37061 0000391B 2E3B06[4A4B]                    cmp     ax,[cs:OnOff]	; should we turn it on?
 37062 00003920 F9                              stc
 37063 00003921 7505                            jne	short set_done	; no
 37064 00003923 800E170420                      or      byte [0417h],20h
 37065                                  set_done:
 37066 00003928 1F                              pop     ds
 37067                                  	; 04/01/2023
 37068                                  	;pop	ax
 37069 00003929 C3                              retn

 37071                                  ; 16/04/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 37072                                  
 37073                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 37074                                  ;
 37075                                  ;   menu_check:  check for presence of menu (and other) configuration blocks
 37076                                  ;
 37077                                  ;   INPUT
 37078                                  ;       CX == "organized" config.sys memory image length
 37079                                  ;    ES:SI -> "organized" config.sys memory image
 37080                                  ;       DS == CS == sysinitseg
 37081                                  ;
 37082                                  ;   OUTPUT
 37083                                  ;       Same as above; the idea is that menu_check simply transforms
 37084                                  ;       a block-structured config.sys image into a conventional image,
 37085                                  ;       based on the user's block selection and any other boot-time options
 37086                                  ;       the user may have employed...
 37087                                  ;
 37088                                  ;   OTHER REGS USED
 37089                                  ;       All
 37090                                  ;
 37091                                  ;   NOTES
 37092                                  ;       [count] and [org_count] are set to the new config.sys image length
 37093                                  ;
 37094                                  ;   HISTORY
 37095                                  ;       Created 16-Mar-1992 by JeffPar
 37096                                  ;
 37097                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 37098                                  
 37099                                  	; 04/01/2023 - Retrodos v4.2 (Modified MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS)
 37100                                  	; (SYSINIT:4378h)
 37101                                  
 37102                                  menu_check:
 37103                                  
 37104                                  ;   Search for SWITCHES, determine if /N or /F are present; if so, then
 37105                                  ;   disable clean/interactive boot options
 37106                                  
 37107 0000392A 51                              push    cx              ;
 37108 0000392B 56                              push    si              ;
 37109 0000392C 29DB                            sub     bx,bx           ; remains ZERO until first block
 37110                                  swchk_loop:                     ;
 37111 0000392E E83507                          call    get_char        ; get first char of current line
 37112 00003931 724C                            jc	short swchk_end	; hit eof
 37113 00003933 3C5B                            cmp     al,CONFIG_BEGIN ; '['
 37114 00003935 7503                            jne	short swchk_next1 ;
 37115 00003937 43                              inc     bx              ; remember that we've seen a block
 37116 00003938 EB40                            jmp     short swchk_nextline
 37117                                  swchk_next1:                    ;
 37118 0000393A 3C4E                            cmp     al,CONFIG_NUMLOCK
 37119 0000393C 750E                            jne	short swchk_next2 ;
 37120 0000393E 09DB                            or      bx,bx           ; only do NUMLOCK commands that exist
 37121 00003940 7538                            jnz	short swchk_nextline ; before the first block
 37122 00003942 E8C0FF                          call    set_numlock     ; REM it out so we don't act on it later, too
 37123 00003945 26C644FF30                      mov     byte [es:si-1],CONFIG_REM
 37124 0000394A EB2E                            jmp     short swchk_nextline
 37125                                  swchk_next2:                    ;
 37126 0000394C 3C31                            cmp     al,CONFIG_SWITCHES
 37127 0000394E 752A                            jne	short swchk_nextline ; this line ain't it
 37128                                  swchk_scan:                     ;
 37129 00003950 E81307                          call    get_char        ; look for /N or /F
 37130                                  swchk_scan1:                    ;
 37131 00003953 3C0A                            cmp     al,LF           ; end of line?
 37132 00003955 7423                            je	short swchk_nextline ; yes
 37133 00003957 3C2F                            cmp     al,'/'          ; switch-char?
 37134 00003959 75F5                            jne	short swchk_scan ; no
 37135 0000395B E80807                          call    get_char        ;
 37136 0000395E 24DF                            and     al,~20h ; 0DFh	; convert to upper case
 37137 00003960 3A06[961E]                      cmp     al,[swit_n+1]	; 'N'
 37138 00003964 7507                            jne	short swchk_scan2 ; no
 37139 00003966 800E[DA46]01                    or      byte [bDisableUI],1
 37140 0000396B EBE3                            jmp	short swchk_scan ; continue looking for switches of interest
 37141                                  swchk_scan2:                    ;
 37142 0000396D 3A06[A21E]                      cmp     al,[swit_f+1]	; 'F'
 37143 00003971 75E0                            jne	short swchk_scan1 ; no
 37144 00003973 800E[DA46]02                    or      byte [bDisableUI],2
 37145 00003978 EBD6                            jmp     short swchk_scan ; continue looking for switches of interest
 37146                                  swchk_nextline:                 ;
 37147 0000397A E8C306                          call    skip_opt_line   ;
 37148 0000397D EBAF                            jmp     short swchk_loop ;
 37149                                  swchk_end:                      ;
 37150 0000397F 5E                              pop     si              ;
 37151 00003980 59                              pop     cx              ;
 37152                                  
 37153                                  ;   Do the keyboard tests for clean/interactive boot now, but only if
 37154                                  ;   the DisableUI flag is still clear
 37155                                  
 37156 00003981 F606[DA46]01                    test    byte [bDisableUI],1
 37157 00003986 7508                            jnz	short menu_search
 37158                                  ;
 37159                                  ;   Wait for 2 seconds first, UNLESS the /F bit was set in bDisableUI, or
 37160                                  ;   there is anything at all in the keyboard buffer
 37161                                  ;
 37162 00003988 E8F2FE                          call    kbd_read
 37163 0000398B 7303                            jnc	short menu_search
 37164 0000398D E9EE01                          jmp	menu_abort
 37165                                  
 37166                                  ;   Search for MENU block; it is allowed to be anywhere in config.sys
 37167                                  
 37168                                  menu_search:
 37169 00003990 29DB                            sub     bx,bx           ; if no MENU, default to zero for no_selection
 37170 00003992 BF[1F47]                        mov     di,szMenu	;
 37171 00003995 E80304                          call    find_block      ; find the MENU block
 37172 00003998 7337                            jnc	short menu_found ;
 37173 0000399A C606[1747]00                    mov     byte [szBoot],0

 37176                                  ;   Process the requested menu color(s)

 37178                                  menu_color:

 37180 000039A3 52                      	push	dx              ;

 37182                                  	; 10/09/2023

 37184 000039A4 E89E06                  	call	get_number	; get first number

 37186 000039AA 88DD                    	mov	ch,bl           ; save it in CH

 37189                                  	;and	dl,0F0h	; !*!	; (low nibble of dl would be zero)

 37224 000039E6 E85706                          call    skip_opt_line   ; skip to next line

 37280                                  ;   Verify that this is a valid menu item by searching for the named block

 37292

 37335                                  menu_chkdefault:
 37336 00003A98 53                              push    bx              ;
 37337 00003A99 01DB                            add     bx,bx           ;
 37338 00003A9B 8BB7[EF46]                      mov     si,[aoffBlockName+bx]
 37339 00003A9F B98000                          mov     cx,128          ; arbitrary maximum length of a name
 37340 00003AA2 1E                              push    ds              ;

 37342 00003AA4 1F                              pop     ds              ;

 37352                                  menu_setdefault:
 37353 00003AB5 881E[DF46]                      mov     [bDefBlock],bl  ; yes, this will be the initial current block
 37354                                  
 37355                                  ;   If the timeout was explicitly set to 0 (or technically, anything that
 37356                                  ;   failed to resolve to a number, like "NONE" or "EAT POTATOES"), then we're
 37357                                  ;   supposed to skip menu display and run with the specified default block;
 37358                                  ;   however, if the user hit Enter prior to boot, thereby requesting fully
 37359                                  ;   INTERACTIVE boot, then we shall display the menu block anyway (though still
 37360                                  ;   with no timeout)
 37361

 37415                                  
 37416                                  menu_nostatus:

 37418                                  menu_disploop:

 37420 00003B41 43                              inc     bx              ; why "inc bx"? because it's a 1-byte opcode
 37421 00003B42 3A1E[E046]                      cmp     bl,[bMaxBlock]  ; all done?
 37422 00003B46 76F6                            jbe	short menu_disploop ; not yet
 37423

 37425

 37429 00003B4F 8A3E[D646]                      mov     bh,[bMenuPage]  ;

 37441 00003B72 8F06[DA46]                      pop     word [bDisableUI]
 37442

 37444

 37460                                  not_topmenu:
 37461 00003B91 80BF[E546]4F                    cmp     byte [abBlockType+bx],CONFIG_SUBMENU
 37462 00003B96 7510                            jne	short not_submenu
 37463 00003B98 01DB                            add     bx,bx           ;
 37464 00003B9A 8BBF[EF46]                      mov     di,[aoffBlockName+bx]
 37465 00003B9E E8E101                          call    srch_block      ; THIS CANNOT FAIL!

 37467 00003BA3 89D9                            mov     cx,bx           ; ES:SI and CX are ready for another round
 37468 00003BA5 E929FE                          jmp     menu_found
 37469                                  
 37470                                  not_submenu:
 37471 00003BA8 01DB                            add     bx,bx           ; get BX -> name of selected block

 37473                                  
 37474                                  ;   BX should now either be ZERO (meaning no block has been selected) or
 37475                                  ;   the offset relative to ES of the block name to be processed (along with
 37476                                  ;   all the "common" lines of course)
