 37482 00003BB8 1E                              push    ds              ;
 37483 00003BB9 8E1E[9714]                      mov     ds,[config_wrkseg]; this is where we'll store new config.sys image
 37484 00003BBD 29FF                            sub     di,di           ;
 37485                                  
 37486                                  ;   ES:SI-> config.sys, DS:DI -> new config.sys workspace
 37487                                  ;
 37488                                  ;   Work our way through the config.sys image again, this time copying
 37489                                  ;   all lines that are (A) "common" lines outside any block or (B) lines
 37490                                  ;   within the requested block. Lines inside INCLUDEd blocks are transparently
 37491                                  ;   copied by copy_block in a recursive fashion; the amount of recursion is
 37492                                  ;   limited by the fact INCLUDE statements are REMed by copy_block as they are
 37493                                  ;   processed and by the number of unique INCLUDE stmts in config.sys...
 37494                                  ;
 37495                                  ;   BUGBUG 20-Mar-1992 JeffPar: If we can figure out the lower bound of the
 37496                                  ;   stack we're running on, then we should check it inside copy_block
 37497                                  
 37498                                  copyblock_loop:
 37499 00003BBF 53                              push    bx              ; save selected block name
 37500 00003BC0 E82F01                          call    copy_block      ; process (named or common) block
 37501 00003BC3 5B                              pop     bx              ;
 37502 00003BC4 7232                            jc	short move_config ; hit eof
 37503                                  
 37504                                  ;   copy_block can only return for two reasons: it hit eof or a new block
 37505                                  
 37506                                  copyblock_begin:
 37507                                  
 37508                                  ; 10/09/2023
 37509                                  %if 0
 37510                                          push    ax              ;
 37511                                          push    cx              ;
 37512                                          push    si              ;
 37513                                          push    di              ; always do "common" blocks
 37514                                          mov     di,szCommon
 37515                                          push    ds              ;
 37516                                          push    cs              ;
 37517                                          pop     ds              ;
 37518                                          call    comp_names      ;
 37519                                          pop     ds              ;
 37520                                          pop     di              ;
 37521                                          pop     si              ;
 37522                                          pop     cx              ;
 37523                                          pop     ax              ;
 37524                                          je	short copyblock_check
 37525                                  %endif
 37526                                  	; 10/09/2023
 37527 00003BC6 57                      	push	di
 37528 00003BC7 BF[2447]                	mov	di,szCommon	; always do "common" blocks
 37529 00003BCA E81602                  	call	comp_names_x	; (comp_names_safe)
 37530 00003BCD 5F                      	pop	di
 37531 00003BCE 740F                    	je	short copyblock_check
 37532                                  
 37533 00003BD0 09DB                            or      bx,bx           ; is there a block name to check?
 37534 00003BD2 7414                            jz	short copyblock_skip ; no
 37535 00003BD4 57                              push    di              ;
 37536 00003BD5 89DF                            mov     di,bx           ; check block against given block name
 37537 00003BD7 1E                              push    ds              ;
 37538 00003BD8 06                              push    es              ;
 37539 00003BD9 1F                              pop     ds              ;
 37540 00003BDA E8E501                          call    comp_names      ; is this the block we really want to do?
 37541 00003BDD 1F                              pop     ds              ;
 37542 00003BDE 5F                              pop     di              ;
 37543                                  copyblock_check:
 37544 00003BDF 7217                            jc	short move_config ; hit eof
 37545 00003BE1 7505                            jne	short copyblock_skip ;
 37546 00003BE3 E85A04                          call    skip_opt_line   ;
 37547 00003BE6 EBD7                            jmp	short copyblock_loop
 37548                                  
 37549                                  copyblock_skip:                 ;
 37550 00003BE8 E85504                          call    skip_opt_line   ; this ain't the block we wanted, so skip it
 37551 00003BEB E87804                          call    get_char        ;
 37552 00003BEE 7208                            jc	short move_config ; hit eof
 37553 00003BF0 247F                            and     al,~CONFIG_OPTION_QUERY ; 7Fh
 37554 00003BF2 3C5B                            cmp     al,CONFIG_BEGIN ;
 37555 00003BF4 74D0                            je	short copyblock_begin
 37556 00003BF6 EBF0                            jmp     short copyblock_skip ; anything else is just skipped
 37557                                  ;
 37558                                  ;   To create as little risk to the rest of SysInit as little as possible,
 37559                                  ;   and to free the workspace at "config_wrkseg" for creating an environment,
 37560                                  ;   copy the new config.sys image to "confbot"
 37561                                  ;
 37562                                  move_config:
 37563 00003BF8 89F9                            mov     cx,di           ; now copy workspace at DS:DI to "confbot"
 37564 00003BFA 51                              push    cx              ;
 37565                                  ;
 37566                                  ;   But first, copy the CONFIG=<configuration><0> string to the workspace,
 37567                                  ;   since the configuration name only currently exists in the "confbot" area
 37568                                  ;
 37569                                   	;mov	cx,7
 37570 00003BFB B90700                  	mov     cx,szMenu-szBoot-1
 37571 00003BFE BE[1747]                        mov     si,szBoot	; first copy the CONFIG= part
 37572 00003C01 47                              inc     di              ; skip a byte, in case absolutely nothing
 37573                                                                  ; was copied to the workspace, because we always
 37574                                                                  ; zero the first byte of the workspace (below)
 37575                                  copy_boot: 
 37576                                  	;lods    byte ptr cs:[si];
 37577 00003C02 2E                              cs
 37578 00003C03 AC                      	lodsb
 37579 00003C04 8805                    	mov     [di],al         ;
 37580 00003C06 47                              inc     di              ;
 37581 00003C07 E2F9                            loop    copy_boot       ;
 37582                                  
 37583 00003C09 06                              push    es              ; then copy the configuration name
 37584                                          ;mov	cx,128-7	; put an upper limit on the name, to be safe
 37585                                  	; 04/01/2023
 37586 00003C0A B179                    	mov	cl,128-7
 37587 00003C0C 2E8B36[E146]            	mov     si,[cs:offDefBlock]; ES:SI -> default block name
 37588 00003C11 09F6                            or      si,si           ; valid?
 37589 00003C13 7505                            jnz	short l1	; yes
 37590 00003C15 0E                              push    cs              ;
 37591 00003C16 07                              pop     es              ;
 37592 00003C17 BE[2447]                        mov     si,szCommon
 37593 00003C1A 268A04                  l1:     mov     al,[es:si]      ;
 37594 00003C1D E8B205                          call    any_delim       ;
 37595 00003C20 7406                            je	short l2	;
 37596 00003C22 8805                            mov     [di],al         ;
 37597 00003C24 46                              inc     si              ;
 37598 00003C25 47                              inc     di              ;
 37599 00003C26 E2F2                            loop    l1              ;
 37600 00003C28 C6050A                  l2:     mov     byte [di],lf	; terminate the configuration string
 37601 00003C2B 07                              pop     es              ;
 37602                                  
 37603                                  ;   Now we can copy "config_wrkseg" (DS) to "confbot" (ES)
 37604                                  
 37605 00003C2C 29FF                            sub     di,di           ;
 37606 00003C2E 2E893E[9514]                    mov     [cs:config_envlen],di
 37607 00003C33 29F6                            sub     si,si           ;
 37608 00003C35 59                              pop     cx              ; recover the size of "config_wrkseg"
 37609                                  
 37610 00003C36 51                              push    cx              ;
 37611 00003C37 F3A4                            rep     movsb           ; moved!
 37612 00003C39 59                              pop     cx              ;
 37613 00003C3A 8CD8                            mov     ax,ds           ;
 37614 00003C3C 1F                              pop     ds              ;
 37615                                  
 37616                                  ;   Now that the config_wrkseg is available once again, we shall
 37617                                  ;   use it to create an environment. The first thing to go in will be
 37618                                  ;   the "CONFIG=configuration" thing. It is also important to zero
 37619                                  ;   the first byte of the workspace, so that copy_envvar knows the buffer
 37620                                  ;   is empty.
 37621                                  
 37622 00003C3D 06                              push    es              ;
 37623 00003C3E 8EC0                            mov     es,ax           ;
 37624 00003C40 46                              inc     si              ; ES:SI -> "CONFIG=configuration"
 37625 00003C41 26C606000000                    mov     byte [es:0],0	;empty the environment block
 37626 00003C47 E82600                          call    copy_envvar     ; copy envvar at ES:SI to "config_wrkseg"
 37627 00003C4A 07                              pop     es
 37628                                  
 37629                                  ;   Before returning, restore the default video page setting but do NOT
 37630                                  ;   do it using INT 10h's Set Active Page function, because if the menu was
 37631                                  ;   displayed on a different page, then it's because we don't want to see
 37632                                  ;   all the device driver/TSR goop (which goes to the default page)
 37633                                  
 37634                                  menu_done:
 37635 00003C4B 803E[D646]00                    cmp     byte [bMenuPage],0
 37636 00003C50 7415                            je	short menu_exit	;
 37637 00003C52 06                              push    es              ;
 37638 00003C53 B84000                          mov     ax,40h          ;
 37639 00003C56 8EC0                            mov     es,ax           ;
 37640 00003C58 A1[DC46]                        mov     ax,[wCRTStart]  ;
 37641 00003C5B 26A34E00                        mov     [es:004Eh],ax   ;
 37642 00003C5F A0[DB46]                        mov     al,[bCRTPage]   ;
 37643 00003C62 26A26200                        mov     [es:0062h],al   ;
 37644 00003C66 07                              pop     es              ;
 37645                                  menu_exit:
 37646 00003C67 890E[5603]                      mov     [count],cx      ; set new counts
 37647 00003C6B 890E[5803]                      mov     [org_count],cx  ;
 37648                                          ; 10/09/2023 (*) - Erdogan Tan
 37649                                  	; MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS - SYSINIT:46D3h
 37650                                  	; PCDOS 7.1 IBMBIO.COM - SYSINIT:491Ah
 37651                                  	;sub	si,si           ; always return ES:SI pointing to config.sys
 37652 00003C6F C3                      	retn
 37653                                  
 37654                                  ; (*) NOTE: MSDOS 6.0 source code (SYSINIT2.ASM) contains 'sub si,si' at this
 37655                                  ;	position (then 'retn' just after it)
 37656                                  ;	but MSDOS 6.21 and PCDOS 7.1 SYSINITs contain only 'retn' here.
 37657                                  
 37658                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 37659                                  ;
 37660                                  ;   copy_envvar:  copy the envvar at ES:SI to "config_wrkseg"
 37661                                  ;
 37662                                  ;   INPUT
 37663                                  ;    ES:SI -> environment variable (in the form "var=string<cr/lf>")
 37664                                  ;
 37665                                  ;   OUTPUT
 37666                                  ;       config_envlen (ie, where to put next envvar) updated appropriately
 37667                                  ;       carry set if error (eg, missing =); clear otherwise
 37668                                  ;
 37669                                  ;   OTHER REGS USED
 37670                                  ;       None
 37671                                  ;
 37672                                  ;   NOTES
 37673                                  ;       None
 37674                                  ;
 37675                                  ;   HISTORY
 37676                                  ;       Created 29-Mar-1992 by JeffPar
 37677                                  ;
 37678                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 37679                                  
 37680                                  	; 04/01/2023 - Retrodos v4.2 (Modified MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS)
 37681                                  	; (SYSINIT:46D4h)
 37682                                  
 37683                                  copy_envvar:
 37684 00003C70 51                              push    cx              ;
 37685 00003C71 56                              push    si              ;
 37686 00003C72 1E                              push    ds              ;
 37687 00003C73 06                              push    es              ;
 37688 00003C74 06                              push    es              ;
 37689 00003C75 8E06[9714]                      mov     es,[config_wrkseg] ; ES:DI to point to next available byte
 37690 00003C79 1F                              pop     ds                 ; DS:SI to point to envvar
 37691                                  
 37692                                  ;   Have to calculate the length of the variable name (and if we hit
 37693                                  ;   the end of the line before we hit '=', then it's curtains for this
 37694                                  ;   config.sys line)
 37695                                  ;
 37696                                  ;   The check for NULL is important because copy_envvar is also used to copy
 37697                                  ;   the initial CONFIG= setting, which will have been zapped by a NULL if no
 37698                                  ;   menu block existed (in order to prevent the creation of an environment)
 37699                                  
 37700 00003C7A 29C9                            sub     cx,cx           ;
 37701                                  copy_varlen:                    ;
 37702 00003C7C AC                              lodsb                   ;
 37703 00003C7D 08C0                            or      al,al           ; NULL?
 37704                                          ;stc	; 10/09/2023 (x)
 37705 00003C7F 746B                            jz	short copy_envexit ; yes, abort
 37706 00003C81 3C0D                            cmp     al,cr           ;
 37707                                          ;stc	; 10/09/2023 (x)
 37708 00003C83 7467                            je	short copy_envexit
 37709 00003C85 3C0A                            cmp     al,lf           ;
 37710                                          ;stc	; 10/09/2023 (x)
 37711 00003C87 7463                            je	short copy_envexit
 37712 00003C89 41                              inc     cx              ;
 37713 00003C8A 3C3D                            cmp     al,'='          ;
 37714 00003C8C 75EE                            jne	short copy_varlen
 37715 00003C8E B000                            mov     al,0            ;
 37716 00003C90 8A24                            mov     ah,[si]         ; save char after '='
 37717 00003C92 29CE                            sub     si,cx           ; back up to given varname
 37718 00003C94 49                              dec     cx              ; CX == # of bytes in varname
 37719 00003C95 29FF                            sub     di,di           ; start looking for DS:SI at ES:0
 37720                                  copy_varsrch:
 37721 00003C97 263805                          cmp     byte [es:di],al
 37722 00003C9A 7425                            je	short copy_envprep ; search failed, just copy var
 37723 00003C9C 89FB                            mov     bx,di           ; ES:BX -> start of this varname
 37724 00003C9E 51                              push    cx              ;
 37725 00003C9F 56                              push    si              ;
 37726 00003CA0 F3A6                            repe    cmpsb           ;
 37727 00003CA2 5E                              pop     si              ;
 37728 00003CA3 59                              pop     cx              ;
 37729 00003CA4 7531                            jne	short copy_varnext ; no match, skip to next varname
 37730 00003CA6 26803D3D                        cmp     byte [es:di],'='
 37731 00003CAA 752B                            jne     short copy_varnext ; no match, there's more characters
 37732                                  
 37733                                  ;   Previous occurrence of variable has been found; determine the
 37734                                  ;   entire length and then destroy it
 37735                                  
 37736 00003CAC B9FFFF                          mov     cx,-1           ;
 37737 00003CAF F2AE                            repne   scasb           ; guaranteed to get null (since we put it there)
 37738 00003CB1 56                              push    si              ;
 37739 00003CB2 89FE                            mov     si,di           ;
 37740 00003CB4 89DF                            mov     di,bx           ;
 37741 00003CB6 2E8B0E[9514]                    mov     cx,[cs:config_envlen]
 37742 00003CBB 29F1                            sub     cx,si           ; destroy variable now
 37743                                  	;rep movs byte ptr es:[di],byte ptr es:[si]
 37744                                  	;;db 0F3h,26h,0A4h ; MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS - SYSINIT:4724h
 37745                                  
 37746 00003CBD F3                      	rep	; 0F3h
 37747 00003CBE 26                      	es	; 26h
 37748 00003CBF A4                      	movsb	; 0A4h
 37749                                  
 37750 00003CC0 5E                      	pop     si
 37751                                  copy_envprep:
 37752 00003CC1 80FC0D                          cmp     ah,cr          ; if there is nothing after the '='
 37753 00003CC4 741D                            je	short copy_envdel ; then just exit with variable deleted
 37754 00003CC6 80FC0A                          cmp     ah,lf           ;
 37755 00003CC9 7418                            je	short copy_envdel
 37756                                          ;jmp	short copy_envloop
 37757                                  	; 04/01/2023
 37758                                  copy_envloop:                  ;
 37759 00003CCB AC                      	lodsb                   ;
 37760 00003CCC 3C0D                    	cmp	al,cr           ;
 37761 00003CCE 7410                    	je	short copy_envdone
 37762 00003CD0 3C0A                    	cmp	al,lf           ;
 37763 00003CD2 740C                    	je	short copy_envdone
 37764 00003CD4 AA                      	stosb                   ;
 37765 00003CD5 EBF4                    	jmp	short copy_envloop
 37766                                  
 37767                                  copy_varnext:                   ;
 37768 00003CD7 51                              push    cx              ;
 37769 00003CD8 B9FFFF                          mov     cx,-1           ;
 37770 00003CDB F2AE                            repne   scasb           ;
 37771 00003CDD 59                              pop     cx              ;
 37772 00003CDE EBB7                            jmp	short copy_varsrch
 37773                                  
 37774                                  	; 04/01/2023
 37775                                  ;copy_envloop:                  ;
 37776                                  ;	lodsb                   ;
 37777                                  ;	cmp	al,cr           ;
 37778                                  ;	je	short copy_envdone
 37779                                  ;	cmp	al,lf           ;
 37780                                  ;	je	short copy_envdone
 37781                                  ;	stosb                   ;
 37782                                  ;	jmp	short copy_envloop
 37783                                  
 37784                                  copy_envdone:                   ;
 37785 00003CE0 28C0                            sub     al,al           ; do SUB to clear carry as well
 37786 00003CE2 AA                              stosb                   ; always null-terminate these puppies
 37787                                  copy_envdel:                    ;
 37788 00003CE3 268805                          mov     [es:di],al      ; and stick another null to terminate the env.
 37789 00003CE6 2E893E[9514]                    mov     [cs:config_envlen],di
 37790                                  	; 10/09/2023 (x) - Erdogan Tan
 37791 00003CEB F9                      	stc ; in order to clear carry flag via cmc (compact code trick!)
 37792                                  copy_envexit:                   ;
 37793 00003CEC F5                      	cmc ; (x) ; reverse carry flag status (je -> cf=1)
 37794 00003CED 07                              pop     es              ;
 37795 00003CEE 1F                              pop     ds              ;
 37796 00003CEF 5E                              pop     si              ;
 37797 00003CF0 59                              pop     cx              ;
 37798                                  
 37799                                  copy_done:	; 18/12/2022
 37800 00003CF1 C3                              retn
 37801                                  
 37802                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 37803                                  ;
 37804                                  ;   copy_block:  copy the current block to the new config.sys workspace
 37805                                  ;
 37806                                  ;   INPUT
 37807                                  ;       CX == remaining bytes in "organized" config.sys memory image
 37808                                  ;    ES:SI -> remaining bytes in "organized" config.sys memory image
 37809                                  ;    DS:DI -> new config.sys workspace (equal in size to the original
 37810                                  ;             config.sys image) where the current block is to be copied
 37811                                  ;
 37812                                  ;   OUTPUT
 37813                                  ;       Same as above
 37814                                  ;       AL also equals the last character read from the organized image
 37815                                  ;
 37816                                  ;   OTHER REGS USED
 37817                                  ;       All
 37818                                  ;
 37819                                  ;   NOTES
 37820                                  ;       None
 37821                                  ;
 37822                                  ;   HISTORY
 37823                                  ;       Created 16-Mar-1992 by JeffPar
 37824                                  ;
 37825                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 37826                                  
 37827                                  	; 04/01/2023 - Retrodos v4.2 (Modified MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS)
 37828                                  	; (SYSINIT:4759h)
 37829                                  
 37830                                  copy_block:
 37831 00003CF2 E87103                          call    get_char        ; check for include
 37832 00003CF5 72FA                            jc	short copy_done	;
 37833 00003CF7 247F                    	and     al,~CONFIG_OPTION_QUERY ; 7Fh
 37834 00003CF9 3C5B                    	cmp     al,CONFIG_BEGIN ; another BEGIN implies END as well
 37835 00003CFB 74F4                            je	short copy_done ;
 37836                                  
 37837 00003CFD 3C4A                            cmp     al,CONFIG_INCLUDE ; 'J'
 37838 00003CFF 88E0                            mov     al,ah           ; AL == the original line code
 37839 00003D01 753A                            jne	short copy_line	; not an "include" line
 37840                                  
 37841                                  ;   We have hit an "INCLUDE" line; first, REM out the line so that we
 37842                                  ;   never try to include the block again (no infinite include loops please),
 37843                                  ;   then search for the named block and call copy_block again.
 37844                                  
 37845 00003D03 26C644FF30                      mov     byte [es:si-1],CONFIG_REM ; '0'
 37846 00003D08 57                              push    di              ;
 37847                                  
 37848 00003D09 BF[1F47]                        mov     di,szMenu
 37849 00003D0C E8D400                          call    comp_names_safe ; don't allow INCLUDE MENU
 37850 00003D0F 7426                            je	short copy_skip	;
 37851                                  
 37852 00003D11 BF[2447]                        mov     di,szCommon
 37853 00003D14 E8CC00                          call    comp_names_safe ; don't allow INCLUDE COMMON
 37854 00003D17 741E                            je	short copy_skip	;
 37855                                  
 37856 00003D19 89F7                            mov     di,si           ; try to find the block
 37857 00003D1B E86400                          call    srch_block      ;
 37858 00003D1E 89FA                            mov     dx,di           ;
 37859                                  	; 10/09/2023
 37860                                  	;pop    di              ;
 37861 00003D20 7514                            jne	short copy_error ; no such block
 37862 00003D22 5F                      	pop	di  ; 10/09/2023
 37863 00003D23 51                              push    cx              ;
 37864 00003D24 89D9                            mov     cx,bx           ;
 37865 00003D26 56                              push    si              ;
 37866 00003D27 4A                              dec     dx              ;
 37867 00003D28 89D6                            mov     si,dx           ;
 37868 00003D2A E80E03                          call    skip_line       ; skip the rest of the "block name" line
 37869 00003D2D E8C2FF                          call    copy_block      ; and copy in the rest of that block
 37870 00003D30 5E                              pop     si              ;
 37871 00003D31 59                              pop     cx              ;
 37872 00003D32 28C0                            sub     al,al           ; force skip_opt_line to skip...
 37873 00003D34 EB2B                            jmp     short copy_nextline
 37874                                  
 37875                                  copy_error:
 37876                                  	; 10/09/2023
 37877 00003D36 F8                      	clc
 37878                                  copy_skip:
 37879 00003D37 5F                              pop     di
 37880                                  ;copy_error:
 37881                                  	; 10/09/2023 (cf=0)
 37882                                  	;clc                    ;
 37883 00003D38 E80004                          call    print_error     ; note that carry is clear, no pause
 37884 00003D3B EB24                            jmp     short copy_nextline
 37885                                  
 37886                                  ;   Copy the line at ES:SI to the current location at DS:DI
 37887                                  
 37888                                  copy_line:
 37889 00003D3D 8805                            mov     [di],al         ;
 37890 00003D3F 47                              inc     di              ;
 37891 00003D40 3C20                            cmp     al,' '          ; is this is a "real" line with a "real" code?
 37892 00003D42 721D                            jb	short copy_nextline ; no
 37893 00003D44 2E803E[9A14]00                  cmp     byte [cs:config_multi],0
 37894 00003D4A 7409                            je	short copy_loop	; not a multi-config config.sys, don't embed #s
 37895 00003D4C E81700                          call    get_linenum	; BX == line # of line @ES:SI
 37896 00003D4F 891D                            mov     [di],bx         ; stash it immediately following the line code
 37897 00003D51 47                              inc     di              ;
 37898 00003D52 47                              inc     di              ;
 37899 00003D53 EB08                            jmp     short copy_next ;
 37900                                  copy_loop:                      ;
 37901 00003D55 E80E03                          call    get_char        ;
 37902 00003D58 7297                            jc	short copy_done ; end of file
 37903 00003D5A 8805                            mov     [di],al         ;
 37904 00003D5C 47                              inc     di              ;
 37905                                  copy_next:
 37906 00003D5D 3C0A                            cmp     al,lf ; 0Ah	; done with line?
 37907 00003D5F 75F4                            jne	short copy_loop	; nope
 37908                                  
 37909                                  copy_nextline:
 37910 00003D61 E8DC02                          call    skip_opt_line   ;
 37911 00003D64 EB8C                            jmp     short copy_block
 37912                                  
 37913                                  	; 18/12/2022
 37914                                  ;copy_done:
 37915                                          ;retn
 37916                                  
 37917                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 37918                                  ;
 37919                                  ;   get_linenum:  return line # (in BX) of current line (@ES:SI)
 37920                                  ;
 37921                                  ;   INPUT
 37922                                  ;    ES:SI -> some line in the config.sys memory image
 37923                                  ;
 37924                                  ;   OUTPUT
 37925                                  ;       BX == line # (relative to 1)
 37926                                  ;
 37927                                  ;   OTHER REGS USED
 37928                                  ;       DX
 37929                                  ;
 37930                                  ;   NOTES
 37931                                  ;       None
 37932                                  ;
 37933                                  ;   HISTORY
 37934                                  ;       Created 16-Mar-1992 by JeffPar
 37935                                  ;
 37936                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 37937                                  
 37938                                  get_linenum:
 37939 00003D66 50                              push    ax              ;
 37940 00003D67 29DB                            sub     bx,bx           ; BX == line # (to be returned)
 37941 00003D69 51                              push    cx              ;
 37942 00003D6A 89F2                            mov     dx,si           ; DX == the offset we're looking for
 37943 00003D6C 56                              push    si              ;
 37944 00003D6D 2E8B0E[5603]                    mov     cx,[cs:count]   ;
 37945 00003D72 29F6                            sub     si,si           ; prepare to scan entire file
 37946                                  get_linenum_loop:               ;
 37947 00003D74 E8C402                          call    skip_line       ;
 37948 00003D77 7205                            jc	short get_linenum_done
 37949 00003D79 43                              inc     bx              ;
 37950 00003D7A 39D6                            cmp     si,dx           ; have we exceeded the desired offset yet?
 37951 00003D7C 72F6                            jb	short get_linenum_loop ; no
 37952                                  get_linenum_done:               ;
 37953 00003D7E 5E                              pop     si              ;
 37954 00003D7F 59                              pop     cx              ;
 37955 00003D80 58                              pop     ax              ;
 37956 00003D81 C3                              retn
 37957                                  
 37958                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 37959                                  ;
 37960                                  ;   srch_block:  searches entire config.sys for block name @ES:DI
 37961                                  ;
 37962                                  ;   INPUT
 37963                                  ;       ES -> config.sys image
 37964                                  ;    ES:DI -> block name to find
 37965                                  ;
 37966                                  ;   OUTPUT
 37967                                  ;       ZF flag set, if found
 37968                                  ;    ES:DI -> just past the name in the block heading, if found
 37969                                  ;       BX == # bytes remaining from that point, if found
 37970                                  ;
 37971                                  ;   OTHER REGS USED
 37972                                  ;       None
 37973                                  ;
 37974                                  ;   NOTES
 37975                                  ;       This differs from "find_block" in that it searches the ENTIRE
 37976                                  ;       config.sys image, not merely the remaining portion, and that it
 37977                                  ;       takes a pointer to block name that is *elsewhere* in the image
 37978                                  ;       (ie, ES) as opposed to some string constant in our own segment (DS).
 37979                                  ;
 37980                                  ;   HISTORY
 37981                                  ;       Created 16-Mar-1992 by JeffPar
 37982                                  ;
 37983                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 37984                                  
 37985                                  srch_block:	          ; returns BX -> named block in CONFIG.SYS
 37986 00003D82 50                              push    ax              ;
 37987 00003D83 51                              push    cx              ;
 37988 00003D84 2E8B0E[5603]                    mov     cx,[cs:count]   ;
 37989 00003D89 56                              push    si              ;
 37990 00003D8A 29F6                            sub     si,si           ;
 37991 00003D8C 1E                              push    ds              ;
 37992 00003D8D 06                              push    es              ;
 37993 00003D8E 1F                              pop     ds              ;
 37994 00003D8F E80900                          call    find_block      ;
 37995 00003D92 89F7                            mov     di,si           ;
 37996 00003D94 89CB                            mov     bx,cx           ;
 37997 00003D96 1F                              pop     ds              ;
 37998 00003D97 5E                              pop     si              ;
 37999 00003D98 59                              pop     cx              ;
 38000 00003D99 58                              pop     ax              ;
 38001                                  find_exit: ; 16/04/2019
 38002 00003D9A C3                              retn			;
 38003                                  
 38004                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 38005                                  ;
 38006                                  ;   find_block:  searches rest of config.sys for block name @DS:DI
 38007                                  ;
 38008                                  ;   INPUT
 38009                                  ;    DS:DI -> block name to find
 38010                                  ;    ES:SI -> remainder of config.sys image
 38011                                  ;       CX == remaining size of config.sys image
 38012                                  ;
 38013                                  ;   OUTPUT
 38014                                  ;       ZF flag set, if found (also, CF set if EOF)
 38015                                  ;    ES:SI -> where the search stopped (at end of block name or EOF)
 38016                                  ;       CX == # bytes remaining from that point
 38017                                  ;
 38018                                  ;   OTHER REGS USED
 38019                                  ;       AX
 38020                                  ;
 38021                                  ;   NOTES
 38022                                  ;       This differs from "srch_block" in that it searches only the
 38023                                  ;       remaining portion of the config.sys image and leaves SI and CX
 38024                                  ;       pointing to where the search left off, and that it takes a pointer
 38025                                  ;       to search string in our own segment (DS:DI instead of ES:DI).
 38026                                  ;
 38027                                  ;   HISTORY
 38028                                  ;       Created 16-Mar-1992 by JeffPar
 38029                                  ;
 38030                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 38031                                  
 38032                                  find_block:
 38033 00003D9B E8C802                          call    get_char        ; get line code
 38034 00003D9E 72FA                            jc	short find_exit	; end of file
 38035 00003DA0 247F                            and     al,~CONFIG_OPTION_QUERY
 38036 00003DA2 3C5B                            cmp     al,CONFIG_BEGIN ; beginning of a block?
 38037 00003DA4 740C                            je	short check_line ; no
 38038 00003DA6 3C4A                            cmp     al,CONFIG_INCLUDE
 38039 00003DA8 7513                            jne	short next_line	;
 38040 00003DAA 2E800E[9A14]01                  or	byte [cs:config_multi],1
 38041 00003DB0 EB0B                            jmp     short next_line ;
 38042                                  check_line:
 38043 00003DB2 2E800E[9A14]01                  or      byte [cs:config_multi],1
 38044 00003DB8 E80700                          call    comp_names      ; compare block names
 38045 00003DBB 76DD                            jbe	short find_exit	; end of file, or names matched
 38046                                  next_line:
 38047 00003DBD E88002                          call    skip_opt_line   ; no, so skip to next line
 38048 00003DC0 EBD9                            jmp	short find_block  ;
 38049                                  ;find_exit:
 38050                                  ;	retn
 38051                                  
 38052                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 38053                                  ;
 38054                                  ;   comp_names:  compares keyword @DS:DI to position in config.sys @ES:SI
 38055                                  ;
 38056                                  ;   INPUT
 38057                                  ;    DS:DI -> keyword to compare
 38058                                  ;    ES:SI -> position in config.sys
 38059                                  ;       CX == remaining bytes in config.sys
 38060                                  ;
 38061                                  ;   OUTPUT
 38062                                  ;       ZF flag set, if match (also, CF set if EOF)
 38063                                  ;    ES:SI -> where the comparison stopped (at end of block name or EOF)
 38064                                  ;       CX == # bytes remaining from that point
 38065                                  ;
 38066                                  ;   OTHER REGS USED
 38067                                  ;       AX
 38068                                  ;
 38069                                  ;   NOTES
 38070                                  ;       None
 38071                                  ;
 38072                                  ;   HISTORY
 38073                                  ;       Created 16-Mar-1992 by JeffPar
 38074                                  ;
 38075                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 38076                                  
 38077                                  comp_names:
 38078 00003DC2 57                              push    di              ;
 38079                                  comp_loop:                      ;
 38080 00003DC3 E8A002                          call    get_char        ;
 38081 00003DC6 7210                            jc	short comp_exit	;
 38082 00003DC8 E80704                          call    any_delim       ; is next character a delimiter?
 38083 00003DCB 8A25                            mov     ah,[di]         ; (get next character we're supposed to match)
 38084 00003DCD 740B                            je	short comp_almost ; yes, it *could* be a match
 38085 00003DCF 47                              inc     di              ;
 38086 00003DD0 25DFDF                          and     ax,~2020h ; 0DFDFh 
 38087                                  				; BUGBUG -- assumes both names are alphanumeric -JTP
 38088 00003DD3 38E0                            cmp     al,ah           ; match?
 38089 00003DD5 74EC                            je	short comp_loop ; yes, keep looking at the characters
 38090 00003DD7 F8                              clc                     ; prevent erroneous eof indication: clear carry
 38091                                  comp_exit:                      ;
 38092 00003DD8 5F                              pop     di              ;
 38093 00003DD9 C3                              retn			;
 38094                                  comp_almost:                    ;
 38095 00003DDA 86C4                            xchg    al,ah           ; we don't know for sure if it's a match
 38096 00003DDC E8F303                          call    any_delim       ; until we verify that the second string has
 38097 00003DDF 86C4                            xchg    al,ah           ; been exhausted also...
 38098 00003DE1 EBF5                            jmp     short comp_exit ; if we are, this call to any_delim will tell...
 38099                                  
 38100                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 38101                                  
 38102                                  	; 10/09/2023 - Retrodos v4.2 IO.SYS (Optimization)
 38103                                  comp_names_x:
 38104                                  	;
 38105                                  comp_names_safe:
 38106 00003DE3 50                              push    ax
 38107 00003DE4 51                              push    cx
 38108 00003DE5 56                              push	si
 38109 00003DE6 1E                              push    ds
 38110 00003DE7 0E                              push    cs
 38111 00003DE8 1F                              pop     ds
 38112 00003DE9 E8D6FF                          call    comp_names
 38113 00003DEC 1F                              pop     ds
 38114 00003DED 5E                      	pop	si
 38115 00003DEE 59                              pop     cx
 38116 00003DEF 58                              pop     ax
 38117 00003DF0 C3                              retn
 38118                                  
 38119                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 38120                                  ;
 38121                                  ;   print_item:  display menu item #BL
 38122                                  ;
 38123                                  ;   INPUT
 38124                                  ;       BL == menu item # to display
 38125                                  ;
 38126                                  ;   OUTPUT
 38127                                  ;       Menu item displayed, with appropriate highlighting if BL == bDefBlock
 38128                                  ;
 38129                                  ;   OTHER REGS USED
 38130                                  ;       None
 38131                                  ;
 38132                                  ;   NOTES
 38133                                  ;       This function saves/restores the current cursor position, so you
 38134                                  ;       needn't worry about it.
 38135                                  ;
 38136                                  ;   HISTORY
 38137                                  ;       Created 16-Mar-1992 by JeffPar
 38138                                  ;
 38139                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 38140                                  
 38141                                  	; 04/01/2023 - Retro DOS v4.2 (Modified MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS)
 38142                                  	; (SYSINIT:485Ah)
 38143                                  
 38144                                  print_item:		; prints menu item #BL (1 to N)
 38145 00003DF1 50                              push    ax              ;
 38146 00003DF2 53                              push    bx              ;
 38147 00003DF3 51                              push    cx              ;
 38148 00003DF4 52                              push    dx              ;
 38149 00003DF5 56                              push    si              ;
 38150 00003DF6 B403                            mov     ah,03h          ; get cursor position
 38151 00003DF8 8A3E[D646]                      mov     bh,[bMenuPage]  ; always page zero
 38152 00003DFC CD10                            int     10h             ; DH/DL = row/column
 38153 00003DFE 52                              push    dx              ; save it
 38154 00003DFF B402                            mov     ah,02h          ; set cursor position
 38155 00003E01 88DE                            mov     dh,bl           ;
 38156 00003E03 80C603                          add     dh,3            ;
 38157 00003E06 B205                            mov     dl,5            ;
 38158 00003E08 CD10                            int     10h             ; set cursor position for correct row/col
 38159 00003E0A 88D8                            mov     al,bl           ;
 38160 00003E0C 0430                            add     al,'0'          ; convert menu item # to ASCII digit
 38161 00003E0E 8A26[D546]                      mov     ah,[bMenuColor] ; normal attribute
 38162 00003E12 3A1E[DF46]                      cmp     bl,[bDefBlock]  ; are we printing the current block?
 38163 00003E16 7510                            jne	short print_other ; no
 38164 00003E18 80CC70                          or      ah,70h          ; yes, set bgnd color to white
 38165 00003E1B 88E5                            mov     ch,ah           ;
 38166 00003E1D B104                            mov     cl,4            ;
 38167 00003E1F D2C5                            rol     ch,cl           ;
 38168 00003E21 38E5                            cmp     ch,ah           ; are fgnd/bgnd the same?
 38169 00003E23 7503                            jne	short print_other ; no
 38170 00003E25 80F408                          xor     ah,08h          ; yes, so modify the fgnd intensity
 38171                                  print_other:                    ;
 38172 00003E28 B700                            mov     bh,0            ;
 38173 00003E2A 01DB                            add     bx,bx           ;
 38174 00003E2C 8BBF[0347]                      mov     di,[aoffBlockDesc+bx]
 38175 00003E30 88E3                            mov     bl,ah           ; put the attribute in the correct register now
 38176 00003E32 8A3E[D646]                      mov     bh,[bMenuPage]  ; get correct video page #
 38177 00003E36 B409                            mov     ah,09h          ; write char/attr
 38178 00003E38 B90100                          mov     cx,1            ;
 38179 00003E3B CD10                            int     10h             ;
 38180 00003E3D FEC2                            inc     dl              ; increment column
 38181 00003E3F B402                            mov     ah,02h          ;
 38182 00003E41 CD10                            int     10h             ;
 38183                                          ;mov	ax,0900h+'.'    ;
 38184 00003E43 B82E09                          mov	ax,092Eh
 38185 00003E46 CD10                    	int     10h             ; display '.'
 38186 00003E48 FEC2                            inc     dl              ; increment column
 38187 00003E4A B402                            mov     ah,02h          ;
 38188 00003E4C CD10                            int     10h             ;
 38189                                          ;mov	ax,0900h+' '    ;
 38190 00003E4E B82009                          mov	ax,0920h
 38191 00003E51 CD10                    	int     10h             ; display ' '
 38192 00003E53 FEC2                            inc     dl              ; increment column
 38193 00003E55 B402                            mov     ah,02h          ;
 38194 00003E57 CD10                            int     10h             ;
 38195 00003E59 06                              push    es              ;
 38196                                  print_loop:                     ;
 38197 00003E5A 268A05                          mov     al,[es:di]	; get a character of the description
 38198 00003E5D 47                              inc     di              ;
 38199 00003E5E 3C09                            cmp     al,TAB ; 9	; substitute spaces for tabs
 38200 00003E60 7502                            jne	short print_nontab ;
 38201 00003E62 B020                            mov     al,' '          ;
 38202                                  print_nontab:                   ;
 38203 00003E64 3C20                            cmp     al,' '          ;
 38204 00003E66 7215                            jb	short print_done ; stop at the 1st character < space
 38205 00003E68 3C24                            cmp     al,'$'          ;
 38206 00003E6A 7411                            je	short print_done ; also stop on $
 38207 00003E6C B409                            mov     ah,09h          ; display function #
 38208 00003E6E CD10                            int     10h             ;
 38209 00003E70 FEC2                            inc     dl              ; increment column
 38210 00003E72 80FA4E                          cmp     dl,78           ; far enough?
 38211 00003E75 7306                            jae	short print_done ; yes
 38212 00003E77 B402                            mov     ah,02h          ;
 38213 00003E79 CD10                            int     10h             ;
 38214 00003E7B EBDD                            jmp	short  print_loop
 38215                                  print_done:                     ;
 38216 00003E7D 07                              pop     es              ;
 38217 00003E7E 5A                              pop     dx              ;
 38218 00003E7F B402                            mov     ah,02h          ;
 38219 00003E81 CD10                            int     10h             ; restore previous row/col
 38220 00003E83 5E                              pop     si              ;
 38221 00003E84 5A                              pop     dx              ;
 38222 00003E85 59                              pop     cx              ;
 38223 00003E86 5B                              pop     bx              ;
 38224 00003E87 58                              pop     ax              ;
 38225 00003E88 C3                              retn			;
 38226                                  
 38227                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 38228                                  ;
 38229                                  ;   select_item:  wait for user to select menu item, with time-out
 38230                                  ;
 38231                                  ;   INPUT
 38232                                  ;       None
 38233                                  ;
 38234                                  ;   OUTPUT
 38235                                  ;       BX == menu item # (1-N), or -1 for clean boot
 38236                                  ;       Selected menu item highlighted
 38237                                  ;       Cursor positioned beneath menu, ready for tty-style output now
 38238                                  ;
 38239                                  ;   OTHER REGS USED
 38240                                  ;       None
 38241                                  ;
 38242                                  ;   NOTES
 38243                                  ;       None
 38244                                  ;
 38245                                  ;   HISTORY
 38246                                  ;       Created 16-Mar-1992 by JeffPar
 38247                                  ;
 38248                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 38249                                  
 38250                                  select_item:		; returns digit value in BX (trashes AX/CX/DX)
 38251 00003E89 8A1E[DF46]                      mov     bl,[bDefBlock]  ; BL will be the default block #
 38252 00003E8D 88D8                            mov     al,bl           ;
 38253 00003E8F E83701                          call    disp_num        ;
 38254 00003E92 E84401                          call    show_status     ; display current interactive status
 38255 00003E95 803E[E346]FF                    cmp     byte [secTimeOut],-1
 38256 00003E9A 7452                            je	short input_key	; no time-out, just go to input
 38257 00003E9C B42C                            mov     ah,GET_TIME ; 2Ch
 38258 00003E9E CD21                            int     21h             ;
 38259 00003EA0 88F7                            mov     bh,dh           ; BH = initial # of seconds
 38260                                  check_time:
 38261 00003EA2 A0[E346]                        mov     al,[secTimeOut] ;
 38262 00003EA5 2A06[E446]                      sub     al,[secElapsed] ;
 38263 00003EA9 730D                            jae	short show_time	;
 38264 00003EAB 800E[DE46]02                    or      byte [bQueryOpt],2  ; disable all further prompting
 38265 00003EB0 C606[E446]00                    mov     byte [secElapsed],0
 38266 00003EB5 E9F600                          jmp	select_done	; time's up!
 38267                                  show_time:
 38268 00003EB8 53                              push    bx              ;
 38269 00003EB9 88C3                            mov     bl,al           ; save # in BL
 38270 00003EBB 8A3E[D646]                      mov     bh,[bMenuPage]  ;
 38271 00003EBF B403                            mov     ah,03h          ; get cursor position
 38272 00003EC1 CD10                            int     10h             ;
 38273 00003EC3 52                              push    dx              ;
 38274 00003EC4 80C208                  	add	dl,8		; move cursor to the right
 38275 00003EC7 B402                            mov     ah,02h          ; set cursor position
 38276 00003EC9 CD10                            int     10h             ;
 38277 00003ECB BA[9A4C]                        mov     dx,_$TimeOut
 38278 00003ECE E8DB05                          call    print           ; print the "Time remaining: " prompt
 38279 00003ED1 88D8                            mov     al,bl           ; recover # from BL
 38280 00003ED3 98                              cbw                     ; this works because AL is always <= 90
 38281 00003ED4 B10A                            mov     cl,10           ;
 38282 00003ED6 F6F1                            div     cl              ; AL = tens digit, AH = ones digit
 38283 00003ED8 88E1                            mov     cl,ah           ;
 38284 00003EDA 0430                            add     al,'0'          ;
 38285 00003EDC B40E                            mov     ah,0Eh          ;
 38286 00003EDE CD10                            int     10h             ; write TTY tens digit
 38287 00003EE0 88C8                            mov     al,cl           ;
 38288 00003EE2 0430                            add     al,'0'          ;
 38289 00003EE4 B40E                            mov     ah,0Eh          ;
 38290 00003EE6 CD10                            int     10h             ; write TTY ones digit
 38291 00003EE8 5A                              pop     dx
 38292 00003EE9 B402                            mov     ah,02h          ; set cursor position back to where it was
 38293 00003EEB CD10                            int     10h             ;
 38294 00003EED 5B                              pop     bx              ;
 38295                                  input_key:
 38296 00003EEE B406                            mov     ah,RAW_CON_IO ; 6
 38297 00003EF0 B2FF                            mov     dl,0FFh         ; input request
 38298 00003EF2 CD21                            int     21h             ;
 38299 00003EF4 751F                            jnz	short got_key	;
 38300 00003EF6 803E[E346]FF                    cmp     byte [secTimeOut],-1; is there a time-out?
 38301 00003EFB 74F1                            je	short input_key	; no, just go back to input
 38302 00003EFD B42C                            mov     ah,GET_TIME     ;
 38303 00003EFF CD21                            int     21h             ; DH = seconds
 38304 00003F01 88F4                            mov     ah,dh           ;
 38305 00003F03 28FE                            sub     dh,bh           ; should generally be zero or one
 38306 00003F05 88E7                            mov     bh,ah           ;
 38307 00003F07 7302                            jnc	short got_time	;
 38308 00003F09 B601                            mov     dh,1            ; it wrapped back to zero, so assume one
 38309                                  got_time:
 38310 00003F0B 08F6                            or      dh,dh           ; any change?
 38311 00003F0D 74DF                            jz	short input_key	; no
 38312 00003F0F 0036[E446]                      add     [secElapsed],dh ;
 38313 00003F13 EB8D                            jmp	short check_time ;
 38314                                  got_key:
 38315 00003F15 50                              push    ax              ;
 38316 00003F16 B8FFFF                          mov     ax,-1           ; zap both secTimeOut and secElapsed
 38317 00003F19 8706[E346]                      xchg    [secTimeOut],ax
 38318 00003F1D 3CFF                            cmp     al,-1           ; was time-out already disabled?
 38319 00003F1F 740E                            je	short timeout_disabled ; yes
 38320 00003F21 53                              push    bx              ; let's disable # seconds display
 38321 00003F22 B8200A                          mov     ax,0A20h        ; write multiple spaces
 38322 00003F25 8B1E[D546]                      mov     bx,[bMenuColor]
 38323 00003F29 B95000                          mov     cx,80           ; 80 of them, to be safe
 38324 00003F2C CD10                            int     10h             ; to completely obliterate # seconds display
 38325 00003F2E 5B                              pop     bx   		;
 38326                                  
 38327                                  timeout_disabled:
 38328 00003F2F 58                              pop     ax              ;
 38329 00003F30 08C0                            or      al,al           ; extended key pressed?
 38330 00003F32 755A                            jnz	short normal_key ; no
 38331 00003F34 CD21                            int     21h             ; get the next part of the key then
 38332 00003F36 74B6                            jz	short input_key	; hmmm, what happened to the second part?
 38333                                  
 38334 00003F38 3C48                            cmp     al,48h          ; up arrow?
 38335 00003F3A 7510                            jne	short not_up	; no
 38336 00003F3C 80FB01                          cmp     bl,1            ; are we as up as up can get?
 38337 00003F3F 76AD                            jbe	short input_key	; yes, ignore it
 38338 00003F41 FE0E[DF46]                      dec     byte [bDefBlock] ;
 38339 00003F45 E8A9FE                          call    print_item      ; re-print the current item
 38340 00003F48 FECB                            dec     bl              ; and then print the new current item
 38341 00003F4A EB12                            jmp     short print1
 38342                                  not_up:
 38343 00003F4C 3C50                            cmp     al,50h          ; down arrow?
 38344 00003F4E 7518                            jne	short not_down	; no
 38345 00003F50 3A1E[E046]                      cmp     bl,[bMaxBlock]  ; are we as down as down can get?
 38346 00003F54 7310                            jae	short to_input_key ; yes, ignore it
 38347 00003F56 FE06[DF46]                      inc     byte [bDefBlock] ;
 38348 00003F5A E894FE                          call    print_item      ; re-print the current item
 38349 00003F5D 43                              inc     bx              ; and then print the new current item
 38350                                  print1: 
 38351 00003F5E 88D8                    	mov     al,bl           ;
 38352                                  print2: 
 38353 00003F60 E88EFE                  	call    print_item      ;
 38354 00003F63 E86300                          call    disp_num        ;
 38355                                  to_input_key:
 38356 00003F66 EB86                            jmp	short input_key ; 10/09/2023
 38357                                  not_down:
 38358 00003F68 F606[DA46]01                    test    byte [bDisableUI],1
 38359 00003F6D 75F7                            jnz	short to_input_key ; don't allow F8 or F5
 38360 00003F6F 3C42                            cmp     al,42h          ; F8 function key?
 38361 00003F71 750B                            jne	short not_f8	; no
 38362 00003F73 8036[DE46]01                    xor     byte [bQueryOpt],1
 38363 00003F78 E85E00                          call    show_status     ;
 38364 00003F7B E970FF                          jmp     input_key	;
 38365                                  not_f8:
 38366 00003F7E 3C3F                            cmp     al,3Fh          ; F5 function key?
 38367 00003F80 75E4                            jne	short to_input_key ; no
 38368                                  	; 02/08/2023 - Retro DOS v4.2 IO.SYS (optimization)
 38369                                  	; MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS - SYSINIT:49EBh
 38370                                  	; (PCDOS 7.1 IBMBIO.COM - SYSINIT:4C32h)
 38371 00003F82 800E[DE46]04            	or	byte [bQueryOpt],4 ; no more queries
 38372 00003F87 BBFFFF                          mov     bx,-1           ; special return code (-1) indicating clean boot
 38373 00003F8A B020                            mov     al,' '          ; don't want to display anything really;
 38374 00003F8C EB26                            jmp     short disp_input ; just want to display the cr/lf sequence...
 38375                                  
 38376                                  normal_key:
 38377 00003F8E 3C0D                            cmp     al,0Dh          ; Enter?
 38378 00003F90 741C                            je	short select_done ; yes
 38379 00003F92 3C08                            cmp     al,08h          ; backspace?
 38380 00003F94 7504                            jne	short not_backspace ; no
 38381 00003F96 BBFEFF                          mov     bx,-2 ; 0FFFEh	; yes, special return code
 38382 00003F99 C3                              retn			;
 38383                                  not_backspace:
 38384 00003F9A 2C30                            sub     al,'0'          ; is greater than '0'?
 38385 00003F9C 76C8                            jbe	short to_input_key ; no
 38386 00003F9E 3A06[E046]                      cmp     al,[bMaxBlock]  ; is less than or equal to the maximum digit?
 38387 00003FA2 77C2                            ja	short to_input_key ; no
 38388 00003FA4 A2[DF46]                        mov	[bDefBlock],al  ;
 38389 00003FA7 E847FE                          call    print_item      ; redisplay the current selection
 38390 00003FAA 88C3                            mov     bl,al           ; set new selection
 38391 00003FAC EBB2                            jmp	short print2
 38392                                  
 38393                                  select_done:
 38394 00003FAE B700                            mov     bh,0            ; return a full 16-bit value (for indexing)
 38395 00003FB0 88D8                            mov     al,bl           ;
 38396 00003FB2 0430                            add     al,'0'          ; convert it into a digit, then display it
 38397                                  
 38398                                  	; fall into disp_input
 38399                                  
 38400                                  ; 16/04/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 38401                                  
 38402                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 38403                                  ;
 38404                                  ;   disp_input:  display a single character + cr/lf
 38405                                  ;
 38406                                  ;   INPUT
 38407                                  ;       AL == character to display
 38408                                  ;
 38409                                  ;   OUTPUT
 38410                                  ;       None
 38411                                  ;
 38412                                  ;   OTHER REGS USED
 38413                                  ;       None
 38414                                  ;
 38415                                  ;   NOTES
 38416                                  ;       This function is used not only for the menu input selection but
 38417                                  ;       also for the interactive line prompting (the y/n/a thing).
 38418                                  ;
 38419                                  ;   HISTORY
 38420                                  ;       Created 16-Mar-1992 by JeffPar
 38421                                  ;
 38422                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 38423                                  
 38424                                  
 38425                                  disp_input:
 38426 00003FB4 50                      	push	ax
 38427                                  	;cmp	al,' '
 38428                                  	;jae	short disp_ok
 38429                                  	;mov	al,' '
 38430                                  	; 10/09/2023 - Retro DOS v4.2 IO:SYS (Optimization)
 38431 00003FB5 B220                    	mov	dl,' ' ; 20h
 38432 00003FB7 38D0                    	cmp	al,dl
 38433 00003FB9 7602                    	jna	short disp_input_ok
 38434                                  disp_ok:
 38435 00003FBB 88C2                    	mov	dl,al
 38436                                  disp_input_ok:
 38437 00003FBD B402                    	mov	ah,STD_CON_OUTPUT ; 2
 38438 00003FBF CD21                    	int	21h
 38439 00003FC1 BA[F849]                	mov	dx,crlfm
 38440 00003FC4 E8E504                  	call	print
 38441 00003FC7 58                      	pop	ax
 38442 00003FC8 C3                      	retn
 38443                                  
 38444                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 38445                                  
 38446                                  disp_num:
 38447 00003FC9 53                              push    bx
 38448 00003FCA 0430                            add     al,'0'
 38449 00003FCC B40A                            mov     ah,0Ah
 38450 00003FCE 8B1E[D546]                      mov     bx,[bMenuColor]
 38451 00003FD2 B90100                          mov     cx,1
 38452 00003FD5 CD10                            int     10h
 38453 00003FD7 5B                              pop     bx
 38454 00003FD8 C3                              retn
 38455                                  
 38456                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 38457                                  ;
 38458                                  ;   show_status:  display current interactive mode setting (on/off/none)
 38459                                  ;
 38460                                  ;   INPUT
 38461                                  ;       None
 38462                                  ;
 38463                                  ;   OUTPUT
 38464                                  ;       None
 38465                                  ;
 38466                                  ;   OTHER REGS USED
 38467                                  ;       None
 38468                                  ;
 38469                                  ;   NOTES
 38470                                  ;       None
 38471                                  ;
 38472                                  ;   HISTORY
 38473                                  ;       Created 16-Mar-1992 by JeffPar
 38474                                  ;
 38475                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 38476                                  
 38477                                  show_status:
 38478 00003FD9 53                              push    bx              ; BL = video page #
 38479 00003FDA 8B1E[D546]                      mov     bx,[bMenuColor]
 38480 00003FDE B403                            mov     ah,03h          ; get cursor position
 38481 00003FE0 CD10                            int     10h             ;
 38482 00003FE2 52                              push    dx              ; save it
 38483 00003FE3 B402                            mov     ah,02h          ; set cursor position
 38484 00003FE5 8B16[D846]                      mov     dx,[bLastCol]   ; set correct row/col
 38485 00003FE9 F606[DA46]01                    test    byte [bDisableUI],1
 38486 00003FEE 740C                            jz	short show_onoff ; just show on/off
 38487 00003FF0 B200                            mov     dl,0            ;
 38488 00003FF2 CD10                            int     10h             ;
 38489 00003FF4 B8200A                          mov     ax,0A20h        ; write multiple spaces
 38490 00003FF7 B95000                          mov     cx,80           ; 80 of them, to be exact
 38491                                  	; 10/09/2023
 38492                                  	;int	10h             ; to obliterate the status line
 38493 00003FFA EB11                            jmp     short show_done ;
 38494                                  show_onoff: 
 38495 00003FFC CD10                            int     10h
 38496                                  		; - VIDEO - WRITE CHARACTERS ONLY AT CURSOR POSITION
 38497                                  		; AL = character, BH = display page - alpha mode
 38498                                  		; BL = color of character (graphics mode, PCjr only)
 38499                                  		; CX = number of times to write character
 38500                                  
 38501 00003FFE A0[964C]                        mov     al,[_$NO]	; assume OFF
 38502 00004001 803E[DE46]01                    cmp     byte [bQueryOpt],1 ; is interactive mode on?
 38503 00004006 7503                            jne	short show_noton ; no
 38504 00004008 A0[924C]                        mov     al,[_$YES]	; yes
 38505                                  show_noton:                     ;

 38507                                  show_done:	; 10/09/2023
