 38518                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 38519                                  ;
 38520                                  ;   skip_token: advances ES:SI/CX past the current token
 38521                                  ;
 38522                                  ;   INPUT
 38523                                  ;    ES:SI -> position in config.sys
 38524                                  ;       CX == remaining bytes in config.sys
 38525                                  ;
 38526                                  ;   OUTPUT
 38527                                  ;       CF set if EOL/EOF hit
 38528                                  ;       AL == 1st char of delimiter
 38529                                  ;    ES:SI -> just past the delimiter
 38530                                  ;       CX == # bytes remaining from that point
 38531                                  ;
 38532                                  ;   OTHER REGS USED
 38533                                  ;       AX
 38534                                  ;
 38535                                  ;   NOTES
 38536                                  ;       None
 38537                                  ;
 38538                                  ;   HISTORY
 38539                                  ;       Created 16-Mar-1992 by JeffPar
 38540                                  ;
 38541                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 38542                                  
 38543                                  skip_token:
 38544 00004016 E84D00                          call    get_char
 38545 00004019 7210                            jc	short skip_token_done
 38546 0000401B E8B401                          call    any_delim
 38547 0000401E 75F6                            jne	short skip_token
 38548                                  skip_check_eol:
 38549 00004020 3C0D                            cmp     al,cr ; 0Dh
 38550 00004022 7406                            je	short skip_token_eol
 38551 00004024 3C0A                            cmp     al,lf ; 0Ah
 38552 00004026 7402                            je	short skip_token_eol
 38553 00004028 F8                              clc
 38554                                          ;jmp	short skip_token_done
 38555 00004029 C3                      	retn
 38556                                  skip_token_eol:
 38557 0000402A F9                              stc
 38558                                  skip_token_done:
 38559 0000402B C3                              retn
 38560                                  
 38561                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 38562                                  ;
 38563                                  ;   skip_delim: advances ES:SI/CX past the current delimiter
 38564                                  ;
 38565                                  ;   INPUT
 38566                                  ;    ES:SI -> position in config.sys
 38567                                  ;       CX == remaining bytes in config.sys
 38568                                  ;
 38569                                  ;   OUTPUT
 38570                                  ;       CF set if EOF hit
 38571                                  ;       AL == 1st char of token
 38572                                  ;    ES:SI -> just past the token
 38573                                  ;       CX == # bytes remaining from that point
 38574                                  ;    ES:BX -> new token (since ES:SI is already pointing 1 byte past token)
 38575                                  ;
 38576                                  ;   OTHER REGS USED
 38577                                  ;       AX
 38578                                  ;
 38579                                  ;   NOTES
 38580                                  ;       None
 38581                                  ;
 38582                                  ;   HISTORY
 38583                                  ;       Created 16-Mar-1992 by JeffPar
 38584                                  ;
 38585                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 38586                                  
 38587                                  skip_delim:	; returns carry set if eol/eof
 38588 0000402C E83700                          call    get_char        ;
 38589 0000402F 8D5CFF                          lea     bx,[si-1]       ; also returns BX -> next token
 38590 00004032 72F7                            jc	short skip_token_done ;
 38591 00004034 E8AB01                          call    delim           ;
 38592 00004037 74F3                            je	short skip_delim ;
 38593 00004039 EBE5                            jmp	short skip_check_eol  ; 13/05/2019
 38594                                  
 38595                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 38596                                  ;
 38597                                  ;   skip_opt_line: same as skip_line provided AL != LF
 38598                                  ;
 38599                                  ;   INPUT
 38600                                  ;       AL == last character read
 38601                                  ;    ES:SI -> position in config.sys
 38602                                  ;       CX == remaining bytes in config.sys
 38603                                  ;
 38604                                  ;   OUTPUT
 38605                                  ;       CF set if EOF hit
 38606                                  ;       AL == 1st char of new line
 38607                                  ;    ES:SI -> just past 1st char of new line
 38608                                  ;       CX == # bytes remaining from that point
 38609                                  ;
 38610                                  ;   OTHER REGS USED
 38611                                  ;       AX
 38612                                  ;
 38613                                  ;   NOTES
 38614                                  ;       In other words, the purpose here is to skip to the next line,
 38615                                  ;       unless ES:SI is already sitting at the front of the next line (which
 38616                                  ;       it would be if the last character fetched -- AL -- was a linefeed)
 38617                                  ;
 38618                                  ;   HISTORY
 38619                                  ;       Created 16-Mar-1992 by JeffPar
 38620                                  ;
 38621                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 38622                                  
 38623                                  ; 03/08/2023 - Retro DOS v4.2 IO.SYS (optimization)
 38624                                  ;skip_opt_line:
 38625                                  ;	cmp     al,lf ; 0Ah
 38626                                  ;	je	short skip_line_done
 38627                                       
 38628                                  	; fall into skip_line
 38629                                  
 38630                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 38631                                  ;
 38632                                  ;   skip_line: skip to the next line
 38633                                  ;
 38634                                  ;   INPUT
 38635                                  ;    ES:SI -> position in config.sys
 38636                                  ;       CX == remaining bytes in config.sys
 38637                                  ;
 38638                                  ;   OUTPUT
 38639                                  ;       CF set if EOF hit
 38640                                  ;    ES:SI -> just past 1st char of new line
 38641                                  ;       CX == # bytes remaining from that point
 38642                                  ;
 38643                                  ;   OTHER REGS USED
 38644                                  ;       AX
 38645                                  ;
 38646                                  ;   NOTES
 38647                                  ;       None
 38648                                  ;
 38649                                  ;   HISTORY
 38650                                  ;       Created 16-Mar-1992 by JeffPar
 38651                                  ;
 38652                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 38653                                  
 38654                                  skip_line:
 38655 0000403B E82800                          call    get_char
 38656 0000403E 7204                            jc	short skip_line_done
 38657                                  skip_opt_line:	; 03/08/2023 - Retro DOS v4.2 IO.SYS (optimization)
 38658 00004040 3C0A                            cmp     al,lf ; 0Ah
 38659 00004042 75F7                            jne	short skip_line
 38660                                  skip_line_done:
 38661                                  num_done:	; 18/12/2022
 38662 00004044 C3                              retn

 38664                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 38665                                  ;
 38666                                  ;   get_number: return binary equivalent of numeric string
 38667                                  ;
 38668                                  ;   INPUT
 38669                                  ;    ES:SI -> position in config.sys
 38670                                  ;       CX == remaining bytes in config.sys
 38671                                  ;
 38672                                  ;   OUTPUT
 38673                                  ;       AL == non-digit encountered
 38674                                  ;       BX == binary #
 38675                                  ;    ES:SI -> just past 1st non-digit
 38676                                  ;       CX == # bytes remaining from that point
 38677                                  ;
 38678                                  ;   OTHER REGS USED
 38679                                  ;       AX
 38680                                  ;
 38681                                  ;   NOTES
 38682                                  ;       None
 38683                                  ;
 38684                                  ;   HISTORY
 38685                                  ;       Created 16-Mar-1992 by JeffPar
 38686                                  ;
 38687                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 38688                                  
 38689                                  ; 13/05/2019
 38690                                  
 38691                                  get_number:
 38692 00004045 29DB                            sub     bx,bx           ; BX = result
 38693                                  num_loop:
 38694 00004047 E81C00                          call    get_char        ;
 38695 0000404A 72F8                            jc	short num_done	;
 38696 0000404C 3C30                            cmp     al,'0'          ; convert to value
 38697 0000404E 72F4                            jb	short num_done	; no more number
 38698 00004050 3C39                            cmp     al,'9'          ;
 38699 00004052 77F0                            ja	short num_done	;
 38700 00004054 50                              push    ax              ;
 38701 00004055 B80A00                          mov     ax,10           ;
 38702 00004058 52                              push    dx              ;
 38703 00004059 F7E3                            mul     bx              ;
 38704 0000405B 5A                              pop     dx              ;
 38705 0000405C 89C3                            mov     bx,ax           ;
 38706 0000405E 58                              pop     ax              ;
 38707 0000405F 2C30                            sub     al,'0'          ;
 38708 00004061 98                              cbw                     ;
 38709 00004062 01C3                            add     bx,ax           ;
 38710 00004064 EBE1                            jmp	short num_loop	;
 38711                                  
 38712                                  	; 18/12/2022
 38713                                  ;num_done:
 38714                                          ;retn

 38716                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 38717                                  ;
 38718                                  ;   get_char:  return next character, advance ES:SI, and decrement CX
 38719                                  ;
 38720                                  ;   INPUT
 38721                                  ;    ES:SI -> position in config.sys
 38722                                  ;       CX == remaining bytes in config.sys
 38723                                  ;
 38724                                  ;   OUTPUT
 38725                                  ;       AL == next character
 38726                                  ;    ES:SI -> just past next character
 38727                                  ;       CX == # bytes remaining from that point
 38728                                  ;
 38729                                  ;   OTHER REGS USED
 38730                                  ;       AX
 38731                                  ;
 38732                                  ;   NOTES
 38733                                  ;       None
 38734                                  ;
 38735                                  ;   HISTORY
 38736                                  ;       Created 16-Mar-1992 by JeffPar
 38737                                  ;
 38738                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 38739                                  
 38740                                  get_char:
 38741 00004066 83E901                          sub     cx,1            ; use SUB to set carry,zero
 38742 00004069 7205                            jb	short get_fail	; out of data
 38743                                          ;lods	byte ptr es:[si] ;
 38744 0000406B 26                      	es	
 38745 0000406C AC                      	lodsb
 38746 0000406D 88C4                            mov     ah,al           ;
 38747 0000406F C3                              retn			;
 38748                                  get_fail:                       ; restore CX to zero
 38749 00004070 B90000                          mov     cx,0            ; leave carry set, zero not set
 38750                                  nearby_ret:
 38751 00004073 C3                              retn

 38753                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 38754                                  ;
 38755                                  ;   query_user: ask user whether to execute current config.sys command
 38756                                  ;
 38757                                  ;   INPUT
 38758                                  ;       AL == current command code
 38759                                  ;    ES:SI -> current command line in config.sys
 38760                                  ;    config_cmd == current command code, but with QUERY bit intact
 38761                                  ;                  (00h used to generate "Process AUTOEXEC.BAT" prompt)
 38762                                  ;
 38763                                  ;   OUTPUT
 38764                                  ;       CF set if command should be ignored (it is also REM'ed out)
 38765                                  ;
 38766                                  ;   OTHER REGS USED
 38767                                  ;       BX, CX, DX, DI
 38768                                  ;
 38769                                  ;   NOTES
 38770                                  ;       None
 38771                                  ;
 38772                                  ;   HISTORY
 38773                                  ;       Created 16-Mar-1992 by JeffPar
 38774                                  ;
 38775                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 38776                                  
 38777                                  	; 31/12/2022 - Retro UNIX 386 v4.2 (Modified MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS)
 38778                                  	; (SYSINIT:4AE5h)
 38779                                  
 38780                                  	; 12/12/2022
 38781                                  query_user:
 38782 00004074 F606[DE46]04                    test    byte [bQueryOpt],4	; answer no to everything?
 38783                                  	; 01/01/2023
 38784 00004079 7403                    	jz	short qu_1		;
 38785 0000407B E9B900                  	jmp	skip_all
 38786                                  	; 12/12/2022
 38787                                  	;;jmp	short skip_all		;
 38788                                  	;jnz	short skip_all
 38789                                  qu_1:
 38790 0000407E F606[DE46]02            	test    byte [bQueryOpt],2	; answer yes to everything?
 38791 00004083 75EE                            jnz	short nearby_ret	; yes (and return carry clear!)
 38792 00004085 50                              push    ax                      ;
 38793 00004086 A0[9914]                        mov     al,[config_cmd]         ;
 38794 00004089 F606[DE46]01                    test    byte [bQueryOpt],1	; query every command?
 38795 0000408E 7506                            jnz	short query_all		; yes
 38796 00004090 A880                            test    al,CONFIG_OPTION_QUERY  ;
 38797                                  	; 01/01/2023
 38798 00004092 7502                    	jnz	short query_all		;
 38799                                  	; 12/12/2022
 38800                                  	;;jmp	short do_cmd		;
 38801                                  	;jz	short do_cmd ; cf=0
 38802                                  
 38803                                  	; 01/01/2023
 38804 00004094 58                      	pop	ax
 38805 00004095 C3                      	retn

 38807                                  query_all:
 38808                                  
 38809                                  ;   Search for the command code (AL) in "comtab", and then print
 38810                                  ;   out the corresponding keyword, followed by the rest of the actual
 38811                                  ;   line pointed to by ES:SI
 38812                                  
 38813 00004096 56                              push    si                      ; save pointer to rest of CONFIG.SYS line
 38814 00004097 BA[EC4C]                        mov     dx,_$AutoPrmpt    	;
 38815 0000409A 247F                            and     al,~CONFIG_OPTION_QUERY ; 7Fh
 38816 0000409C 7450                            jz	short generic_prompt	; config_cmd must have been 0
 38817                                  
 38818 0000409E 88C6                            mov     dh,al                   ; save config_cmd in DH
 38819 000040A0 29DB                            sub     bx,bx                   ;
 38820 000040A2 BF[2B47]                        mov     di,comtab		;
 38821                                  find_match:                             ;
 38822 000040A5 8A1D                            mov     bl,[di]                 ; get size of current keyword
 38823 000040A7 08DB                            or      bl,bl                   ;
 38824 000040A9 7425                            jz	short line_print	; end of table
 38825 000040AB 47                              inc     di                      ;
 38826 000040AC 3A01                            cmp     al,[di+bx]              ; match?
 38827 000040AE 7405                            je	short cmd_match		; yes
 38828 000040B0 8D7901                          lea     di,[di+bx+1]            ; otherwise, skip this command code
 38829                                  	; 13/05/2019	
 38830 000040B3 EBF0                            jmp	short find_match	; loop
 38831                                  cmd_match:                              ;
 38832 000040B5 8A4DFF                          mov     cl,[di-1]               ;
 38833 000040B8 B500                            mov	ch,0                    ;
 38834 000040BA B402                            mov     ah,STD_CON_OUTPUT ; 2
 38835                                  cmd_print:                              ;
 38836 000040BC 8A05                            mov     al,[di]                 ;
 38837 000040BE 47                              inc     di                      ;
 38838 000040BF 88C2                            mov     dl,al                   ;
 38839 000040C1 CD21                            int     21h                     ;
 38840 000040C3 E2F7                            loop    cmd_print               ;
 38841 000040C5 B23D                            mov     dl,'='                  ;
 38842 000040C7 80FE56                          cmp     dh,CONFIG_SET  ; 'V'    ; for SET commands, don't display a '='
 38843 000040CA 7502                            jne	short cmd_notset	;
 38844 000040CC B220                            mov     dl,' '                  ;
 38845                                  cmd_notset:
 38846 000040CE CD21                            int     21h                     ; '=' looks funny on SET commands
 38847                                  line_print:                             ;
 38848                                  	;lods	byte ptr es:[si]        ;
 38849 000040D0 26                              es
 38850 000040D1 AC                      	lodsb
 38851 000040D2 08C0                    	or      al,al                   ;
 38852 000040D4 7502                            jnz	short non_null		;
 38853 000040D6 B020                            mov     al,' '                  ;
 38854                                  non_null:                               ;
 38855 000040D8 3C20                            cmp     al,' '                  ; control code?
 38856 000040DA 720F                            jb	short prompt_user	; yes, assume end of line
 38857 000040DC 7505                            jne	short non_space		;
 38858                                          ; 10/09/2023
 38859 000040DE 263804                  	cmp	[es:si],al ; 20h
 38860                                  	;cmp	byte [es:si],' '	;
 38861 000040E1 7208                            jb	short prompt_user	;
 38862                                  non_space:                              ;
 38863 000040E3 88C2                            mov     dl,al                   ;
 38864 000040E5 B402                            mov     ah,STD_CON_OUTPUT ; 2	;
 38865 000040E7 CD21                            int     21h                     ;
 38866 000040E9 EBE5                            jmp	short line_print	;
 38867                                  
 38868                                  prompt_user:                            ;
 38869 000040EB BA[8A4C]                        mov     dx,_$InterPrmpt		;
 38870                                  
 38871                                  generic_prompt:
 38872 000040EE E8BB03                          call    print                   ;
 38873                                  input_loop:                             ;
 38874 000040F1 B400                            mov     ah,0                    ; read a key
 38875 000040F3 CD16                            int     16h                     ;
 38876 000040F5 08C0                            or      al,al                   ; is it a function key?
 38877 000040F7 750F                            jnz	short not_func		; no
 38878 000040F9 80FC3F                          cmp     ah,3Fh                  ; F5 function key?
 38879 000040FC 75F3                            jne	short input_loop	; no
 38880 000040FE A0[964C]                        mov     al,[_$NO]                  ;
 38881 00004101 800E[DE46]04                    or      byte [bQueryOpt],4	; no more queries
 38882 00004106 EB21                            jmp     short legal_char        ;
 38883                                  not_func:
 38884 00004108 24DF                            and     al,~20h ; 0DFh		; converting to upper case
 38885 0000410A 3A06[964C]                      cmp     al,[_$NO]		; verify character is legal
 38886 0000410E 7419                            je	short legal_char	;
 38887 00004110 3A06[924C]                      cmp     al,[_$YES]		;
 38888 00004114 7413                            je	short legal_char	;
 38889 00004116 803E[9914]00                    cmp     byte [config_cmd],0	;
 38890 0000411B 74D4                            je	short input_loop	; don't allow Esc on this query
 38891 0000411D 3C1B                            cmp     al,1Bh                  ; Esc?
 38892 0000411F 75D0                            jne	short input_loop	;
 38893 00004121 800E[DE46]02                    or      byte [bQueryOpt],2	; no more interactive boot prompts
 38894 00004126 A0[924C]                        mov     al,[_$YES]
 38895                                  legal_char:                             ;
 38896 00004129 E888FE                          call    disp_input              ;
 38897 0000412C 5E                              pop     si                      ; restore pointer to rest of CONFIG.SYS line
 38898                                  
 38899 0000412D 3A06[964C]                      cmp     al,[_$NO]		; process line?
 38900 00004131 7403                            je	short skip_cmd		; no
 38901                                  	; 12/12/2022
 38902 00004133 F8                      	clc
 38903                                  do_cmd:
 38904 00004134 58                      	pop     ax			;
 38905                                  	; 12/12/2022
 38906                                  	; cf=0
 38907                                  	;clc				; just do the command
 38908 00004135 C3                      	retn
 38909                                  
 38910                                  skip_cmd:
 38911 00004136 58                      	pop     ax			;
 38912                                  skip_all:
 38913 00004137 B430                    	mov     ah,CONFIG_REM ; '0'	; fake out the rest of sysinit's processing
 38914 00004139 F9                      	stc
 38915 0000413A C3                      	retn

 38972                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 38973                                  
 38974                                  ;   This function is very simple: it merely prepends a "/D" to the
 38975                                  ;   command-line for the shell; this (undocumented) switch disables
 38976                                  ;   AUTOEXEC.BAT processing and the date/time prompt that is usually
 38977                                  ;   displayed when there's no AUTOEXEC.BAT.
 38978                                  
 38979                                  disable_autoexec:
 38980                                  	; MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS -  SYSINIT:4BE2h
 38981                                  	; 17/04/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 38982                                  
 38983 0000416F F606[DE46]04            	test	byte [bQueryOpt],4
 38984 00004174 7443                    	jz	short disable_exit
 38985 00004176 F606[D446]01            	test	byte [dae_flag],1
 38986 0000417B 753C                    	jnz	short disable_exit
 38987 0000417D 800E[D446]01            	or	byte [dae_flag],1
 38988                                          ;or	byte [bQueryOpt],2 ; MSDOS 6.0 
 38989 00004182 810E[DE46]0201          	or      word [bQueryOpt],102h	; [bDefBlock] = 1
 38990 00004188 BA4420                  	mov     dx,'D ' ; 2044h
 38991                                  dae_1:
 38992                                  	; 03/08/2023 - Retro DOS v4.2 IO.SYS (optimization)
 38993 0000418B A0[1346]                        mov	al,[def_swchr]
 38994                                  	;mov	al,[command_line-1]     ; get default switchchar
 38995 0000418E 08C0                            or      al,al                   ; anything there?
 38996 00004190 7427                            jz	short disable_exit	; no, disable_autoexec already called
 38997 00004192 8A1E[1446]                      mov     bl,[command_line]       ;
 38998 00004196 B700                            mov     bh,0                    ; BX == command-line length
 38999 00004198 89D9                            mov     cx,bx                   ;
 39000 0000419A 80C303                          add     bl,3                    ;
 39001 0000419D 80FB7E                          cmp     bl,126                  ;
 39002 000041A0 7717                            ja	short disable_exit	;
 39003 000041A2 881E[1446]                      mov     [command_line],bl       ; update length
 39004 000041A6 81C3[1546]                      add     bx,command_line+1	; make sure we move the NULL too
 39005 000041AA 41                              inc     cx                      ; (just for consistency sake)
 39006                                  disable_loop:                           ;
 39007 000041AB 8A67FD                          mov     ah,[bx-3]               ;
 39008 000041AE 8827                            mov     [bx],ah                 ;
 39009 000041B0 4B                              dec     bx                      ;
 39010 000041B1 E2F8                            loop    disable_loop            ;
 39011 000041B3 8847FE                          mov     [bx-2],al               ;
 39012                                  	;mov	word [bx-1],'D ' ; 2044h ; /D is stuffed into place now
 39013 000041B6 8957FF                  	mov	[bx-1],dx  ; MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS - SYSINIT:4C29h		
 39014                                          ;mov	byte [command_line-1],0 ;
 39015                                  disable_exit:                           ;
 39016 000041B9 C3                              retn
 39017                                  
 39018                                  CheckQueryOpt:	; MSDOS 6.21 IO.YSYS - SYSINIT:4C2Dh
 39019 000041BA 803E[DE46]01            	cmp     byte [bQueryOpt],1

 39022 000041C6 75F1                    	jnz     short disable_exit

 39156                                  ; 
 39157                                  ; procedure : mapcase
 39158                                  ;
 39159                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 39160                                  
 39161                                  	; 02/11/2022 - Retro DOS 4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)
 39162                                  
 39163                                  	; 04/01/2023 - Retro DOS 4.2 (Modified MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS)
 39164                                  	; (SYSINIT:4C7Eh)
 39165                                  mapcase:
 39166 0000421E 51                      	push	cx
 39167 0000421F 56                      	push	si
 39168 00004220 1E                      	push	ds
 39169                                  
 39170 00004221 06                      	push	es
 39171 00004222 1F                      	pop	ds
 39172                                  
 39173                                  	; 02/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT compatibility)
 39174                                  
 39175                                  ; 04/01/2023 - Retro DOS 4.2
 39176                                  
 39177                                  ;ifdef	MULTI_CONFIG
 39178 00004223 88C3                    	mov	bl,al			; same cmd code this line
 39179                                  ;else
 39180                                  ;	xor	si,si
 39181                                  ;endif
 39182                                  	; 02/11/2022
 39183                                  	; 04/01/2023 - Retro DOS 4.2
 39184                                  	;xor	si, si
 39185                                  
 39186                                  convloop:
 39187 00004225 AC                      	lodsb
 39188 00004226 3C61                    	cmp	al,'a'
 39189 00004228 7209                    	jb	short noconv
 39190 0000422A 3C7A                    	cmp	al,'z'
 39191 0000422C 7705                    	ja	short noconv
 39192 0000422E 2C20                    	sub	al,20h
 39193 00004230 8844FF                  	mov	[si-1],al
 39194                                  noconv:
 39195                                  
 39196                                  	; 02/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT compatibility)
 39197                                  
 39198                                  ; 04/01/2023 - Retro DOS 4.2
 39199                                  ;ifdef	MULTI_CONFIG
 39200                                  
 39201                                  ;   When MULTI_CONFIG enabled, "mapcase" is used to map everything to
 39202                                  ;   upper-case a line at a time, after we've been able to figure out whether
 39203                                  ;   the line is a SET command or not (since we don't want to upper-case
 39204                                  ;   anything after the "=" in a SET)
 39205                                  ;
 39206 00004233 80FB56                  	cmp	bl,CONFIG_SET  ; 'V'	; preserve case for part of the line?
 39207 00004236 7504                    	jne	short check_eol		; no, just check for end-of-line
 39208 00004238 3C3D                    	cmp	al,'='                  ; separator between SET var and value?
 39209 0000423A 740A                    	je	short convdone		; yes
 39210                                  check_eol:
 39211 0000423C 3C0D                    	cmp	al,cr
 39212 0000423E 7406                    	je	short convdone
 39213 00004240 3C0A                    	cmp	al,lf
 39214 00004242 7402                    	je	short convdone
 39215                                  ;endif
 39216                                  	; 02/11/2022
 39217 00004244 E2DF                    	loop	convloop
 39218                                  convdone:
 39219 00004246 1F                      	pop	ds
 39220 00004247 5E                      	pop	si
 39221 00004248 59                      	pop	cx
 39222 00004249 C3                      	retn

 39340                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 39341                                  ;
 39342                                  ; procedure : getnum
 39343                                  ;
 39344                                  ; getnum parses a decimal number.
 39345                                  ; returns it in ax, sets zero flag if ax = 0 (may be considered an
 39346                                  ; error), if number is bad carry is set, zero is set, ax=0.
 39347                                  ;
 39348                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 39349                                  
 39350                                  getnum:
 39351 000042BD 53                      	push	bx
 39352 000042BE 31DB                    	xor	bx,bx			; running count is zero
 39353                                  b2:
 39354 000042C0 E8F2FF                  	call	todigit 		; do we have a digit ?
 39355 000042C3 7247                    	jc	short badnum		; no, bomb
 39356                                  
 39357 000042C5 93                      	xchg	ax,bx			; put total in ax
 39358 000042C6 53                      	push	bx			; save digit (0 to 9)
 39359                                  	;mov	bx,10			; base of arithmetic
 39360                                  	; 12/12/2022
 39361 000042C7 B30A                    	mov	bl,10
 39362 000042C9 F7E3                    	mul	bx			; shift by one decimal digit
 39363 000042CB 5B                      	pop	bx			; get back digit (0 to 9)
 39364 000042CC 00D8                    	add	al,bl			; get total
 39365 000042CE 80D400                  	adc	ah,0			; make that 16 bits
 39366 000042D1 7239                    	jc	short badnum		; too big a number
 39367                                  
 39368 000042D3 93                      	xchg	ax,bx			; stash total
 39369                                  
 39370 000042D4 E830FF                  	call	getchr			;get next digit
 39371 000042D7 722D                    	jc	short b1		; no more characters
 39372 000042D9 3C20                    	cmp	al,' ' 			; space?
 39373 000042DB 741F                    	je	short b15		; then end of digits
 39374 000042DD 3C2C                    	cmp	al,',' 			; ',' is a seperator!!!
 39375 000042DF 741B                    	je	short b15		; then end of digits.
 39376 000042E1 3C09                    	cmp	al, tab ; 9		; tab
 39377 000042E3 7417                    	je	short b15
 39378 000042E5 2E3A06[AE02]            	cmp	al,[cs:sepchr]		; allow 0 or special separators
 39379 000042EA 7410                    	je	short b15
 39380 000042EC 3C2F                    	cmp	al,'/'			; see if another switch follows
 39381                                  	; 12/12/2022
 39382                                  	; 02/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT compatibility)
 39383                                  	;nop				; cas - remnant of old bad code
 39384                                  	;nop
 39385 000042EE 740C                    	je	short b15
 39386 000042F0 3C0A                    	cmp	al,lf			; line-feed?
 39387 000042F2 7408                    	je	short b15
 39388 000042F4 3C0D                    	cmp	al,cr			; carriage return?
 39389 000042F6 7404                    	je	short b15
 39390 000042F8 08C0                    	or	al,al			; end of line separator?
 39391 000042FA 75C4                    	jnz	short b2		; no, try as a valid char...
 39392                                  b15:
 39393 000042FC 2EFF06[5603]            	inc	word [cs:count]		; one more character to s...
 39394 00004301 2EFF0E[5A03]            	dec	word [cs:chrptr]	; back up over separator
 39395                                  b1:
 39396 00004306 89D8                    	mov	ax,bx			; get proper count
 39397 00004308 09C0                    	or	ax,ax			; clears carry, sets zero accordingly
 39398 0000430A 5B                      	pop	bx
 39399 0000430B C3                      	retn
 39400                                  badnum:
 39401                                  	; 02/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT compatibility)
 39402                                  	;mov	byte [cs:sepchr],0
 39403 0000430C 31C0                    	xor	ax,ax			; set zero flag, and ax = 0
 39404                                  	; 12 /12/2022
 39405 0000430E 2EA2[AE02]              	mov	[cs:sepchr],al ; 0
 39406 00004312 5B                      	pop	bx
 39407 00004313 F9                      	stc				; and carry set
 39408 00004314 C3                      	retn
 39409                                  
 39410                                  ;****************************************************************************
 39411                                  
 39412                                  setdoscountryinfo:
 39413                                  
 39414                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 39415                                  ;input: es:di -> pointer to dos_country_cdpg_info
 39416                                  ;	ds:0  -> buffer.
 39417                                  ;	si = 0
 39418                                  ;	ax = country id
 39419                                  ;	dx = code page id. (if 0, then use ccsyscodepage as a default.)
 39420                                  ;	bx = file handle
 39421                                  ;	this routine can handle maximum 438 country_data entries.
 39422                                  ;
 39423                                  ;output: dos_country_cdpg_info set.
 39424                                  ;	 carry set if any file read failure or wrong information in the file.
 39425                                  ;	 carry set and cx = -1 if cannot find the matching country_id, 
 39426                                  ;	 codepage_id in the file.
 39427                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 39428                                  
 39429                                  	; 04/01/2023 - Retrodos v4.2 (Modified MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS)
 39430                                  	; (SYSINIT:4D83h)
 39431                                  
 39432                                  	; 10/09/2023 - Retrodos v4.2 IO.SYS (Optimization)
 39433                                  	; (PCDOS 7.1 IBMBIO.COM - SYSINIT:4FCAh)	
 39434                                  
 39435 00004315 57                      	push	di
 39436 00004316 50                      	push	ax
 39437 00004317 52                      	push	dx
 39438                                  
 39439 00004318 31C9                    	xor	cx,cx
 39440 0000431A 31D2                    	xor	dx,dx
 39441 0000431C B80002                  	mov	ax,512			;read 512 bytes
 39442 0000431F E84301                  	call	readincontrolbuffer	;read the file header
 39443 00004322 724A                    	jc	short setdosdata_fail
 39444                                  
 39445 00004324 06                      	push	es
 39446 00004325 56                      	push	si
 39447                                  
 39448 00004326 0E                      	push	cs
 39449 00004327 07                      	pop	es
 39450                                  
 39451 00004328 BF[7945]                	mov	di,country_file_signature ; db 0FFh,'COUNTRY'
 39452 0000432B B90800                  	mov	cx,8			;length of the signature
 39453 0000432E F3A6                    	repz	cmpsb
 39454                                  
 39455 00004330 5E                      	pop	si
 39456 00004331 07                      	pop	es
 39457 00004332 753A                    	jnz	short setdosdata_fail 	;signature mismatch
 39458                                  
 39459 00004334 83C612                  	add	si,18			;si -> county info type
 39460 00004337 803C01                  	cmp	byte [si],1		;only accept type 1 (currently only 1 header type)
 39461 0000433A 7532                    	jne	short setdosdata_fail 	;cannot proceed. error return
 39462                                  
 39463 0000433C 46                      	inc	si			;si -> file offset
 39464 0000433D 8B14                    	mov	dx,[si]			;get the info file offset.
 39465 0000433F 8B4C02                  	mov	cx,[si+2]
 39466 00004342 B80018                  	mov	ax,6144			;read 6144 bytes.
 39467 00004345 E81D01                  	call	readincontrolbuffer	;read info
 39468 00004348 7224                    	jc	short setdosdata_fail
 39469                                  
 39470 0000434A 8B0C                    	mov	cx,[si]			;get the # of country, codepage combination entries
 39471 0000434C 81F9B601                	cmp	cx,438			;cannot handle more than 438 entries.
 39472 00004350 771C                    	ja	short setdosdata_fail
 39473                                  
 39474 00004352 46                      	inc	si
 39475 00004353 46                      	inc	si			;si -> entry information packet
 39476 00004354 5A                      	pop	dx			;restore code page id
 39477 00004355 58                      	pop	ax			;restore country id
 39478 00004356 5F                      	pop	di
 39479                                  
 39480                                  setdoscntry_find:			;search for desired country_id,codepage_id.
 39481 00004357 3B4402                  	cmp	ax,[si+2]		;compare country_id
 39482 0000435A 7509                    	jne	short setdoscntry_next
 39483                                  
 39484                                  	;cmp	dx,0			;no user specified code page ?
 39485                                  	;je	short setdoscntry_any_codepage ;then no need to match code page id.
 39486                                  	; 10/09/2023
 39487 0000435C 09D2                    	or	dx,dx ; cmp dx,0
 39488 0000435E 7413                    	jz	short setdoscntry_any_codepage
 39489 00004360 3B5404                  	cmp	dx,[si+4]		;compare code page id
 39490 00004363 7411                    	je	short setdoscntry_got_it
 39491                                  
 39492                                  setdoscntry_next:
 39493 00004365 0334                    	add	si,[si]			;next entry
 39494 00004367 46                      	inc	si
 39495 00004368 46                      	inc	si			;take a word for size of entry itself
 39496 00004369 E2EC                    	loop	setdoscntry_find
 39497                                  
 39498                                  	;mov	cx,-1			;signals that bad country id entered.
 39499                                  	; 10/09/2023
 39500 0000436B 49                      	dec	cx ; 0 -> -1
 39501                                  setdoscntry_fail:
 39502 0000436C F9                      	stc
 39503 0000436D C3                      	retn
 39504                                  
 39505                                  setdosdata_fail:
 39506 0000436E 5E                      	pop	si
 39507 0000436F 59                      	pop	cx
 39508 00004370 5F                      	pop	di
 39509 00004371 EBF9                    	jmp	short setdoscntry_fail
 39510                                  
 39511                                  setdoscntry_any_codepage:		;use the code_page_id of the country_id found.
 39512 00004373 8B5404                  	mov	dx,[si+4]
 39513                                  
 39514                                  setdoscntry_got_it:			;found the matching entry
 39515 00004376 2E8916[8145]            	mov	[cs:cntrycodepage_id],dx ;save code page id for this country.
 39516 0000437B 8B540A                  	mov	dx,[si+10]		;get the file offset of country data
 39517 0000437E 8B4C0C                  	mov	cx,[si+12]
 39518 00004381 B80002                  	mov	ax,512 			;read 512 bytes
 39519 00004384 E8DE00                  	call	readincontrolbuffer
 39520 00004387 72E3                    	jc	short setdoscntry_fail
 39521                                  
 39522 00004389 8B0C                    	mov	cx,[si]			;get the number of entries to handle.
 39523 0000438B 46                      	inc	si
 39524 0000438C 46                      	inc	si			;si -> first entry
 39525                                  
 39526                                  setdoscntry_data:
 39527 0000438D 57                      	push	di			;es:di -> dos_country_cdpg_info
 39528 0000438E 51                      	push	cx			;save # of entry left
 39529 0000438F 56                      	push	si			;si -> current entry in control buffer
 39530                                  
 39531 00004390 8A4402                  	mov	al,[si+2]		;get data entry id
 39532 00004393 E8A400                  	call	getcountrydestination	;get the address of destination in es:di
 39533 00004396 727C                    	jc	short setdoscntry_data_next ;no matching data entry id in dos
 39534                                  
 39535 00004398 8B5404                  	mov	dx,[si+4]		;get offset of data
 39536 0000439B 8B4C06                  	mov	cx,[si+6]
 39537 0000439E B80042                  	mov	ax,4200h

 39675                                  getcountrydestination:
 39676                                  
 39677                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 39678                                  ;get the destination address in the dos country info table.
 39679                                  ;
 39680                                  ;input: al - data id
 39681                                  ;	es:di -> dos_country_cdpg_info
 39682                                  ;on return:
 39683                                  ;	es:di -> destination address of the matching data id
 39684                                  ;	carry set if no matching data id found in dos.
 39685                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 39686                                  
 39687                                  	; 04/01/2023 - Retrodos v4.2 (Modified MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS)
 39688                                  	; (SYSINIT:4EB2h)
 39689                                  
 39690                                  	; 10/09/2023 - Retrodos v4.2 IO.SYS (Optimization)
 39691                                  	; (PCDOS 7.1 IBMBIO.COM - SYSINIT:50F9h)
 39692                                  
 39693 0000443A 51                      	push	cx
 39694                                  	;add	di,74
 39695 0000443B 83C74A                  	add	di,country_cdpg_info.ccNumber_of_entries	
 39696                                  					;skip the reserved area, syscodepage etc.
 39697 0000443E 268B0D                  	mov	cx,[es:di]		;get the number of entries
 39698 00004441 47                      	inc	di
 39699 00004442 47                      	inc	di			;si -> the first start entry id
 39700

 39746                                  
 39747                                  readincontrolbuffer:
 39748                                  
 39749                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 39750                                  ;move file pointer to cx:dx
 39751                                  ;read ax bytes into the control buffer. (should be less than 2 kb)
 39752                                  ;si will be set to 0 hence ds:si points to the control buffer.
 39753                                  ;
 39754                                  ;entry:  cx,dx offset from the start of the file where the read/write pointer
 39755                                  ;	 be moved.
 39756                                  ;	 ax - # of bytes to read
 39757                                  ;	 bx - file handle
 39758                                  ;	 ds - buffer seg.
 39759                                  ;return: the control data information is read into ds:0 - ds:0200.
 39760                                  ;	 cx,dx value destroyed.
 39761                                  ;	 carry set if error in reading file.
 39762                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 39763                                  
 39764 00004465 50                      	push	ax			;# of bytes to read
 39765 00004466 B80042                  	mov	ax,4200h
 39766 00004469 F9                      	stc
 39767 0000446A CD21                    	int	21h			;move pointer
 39768 0000446C 59                      	pop	cx			;# of bytes to read
 39769 0000446D 7209                    	jc	short ricb_exit
 39770                                  
 39771 0000446F 31D2                    	xor	dx,dx			;ds:dx -> control buffer
 39772 00004471 31F6                    	xor	si,si
 39773 00004473 B43F                    	mov	ah,3Fh			;read into the buffer
 39774 00004475 F9                      	stc
 39775 00004476 CD21                    	int	21h			;should be less than 1024 bytes.
 39776                                  ricb_exit:
 39777 00004478 C3                      	retn

 39784                                  
 39785                                  set_country_path:
 39786                                  
 39787                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 39788                                  ;in:  ds - sysinitseg, es - confbot, si -> start of the asciiz path string
 39789                                  ;     dosinfo_ext, cntry_drv, cntry_root, cntry_path
 39790                                  ;     assumes current directory is the root directory.
 39791                                  ;out: ds:di -> full path (cntry_drv).
 39792                                  ;     set the cntry_drv string from the country=,,path command.
 39793                                  ;     ds, es, si value saved.
 39794                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 39795                                  
 39796                                  	; 04/01/2023 - Retrodos v4.2 (Modified MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS)
 39797                                  	; (SYSINIT:4EF4h)
 39798                                  
 39799                                  	; 10/09/2023 - Retrodos v4.2 IO.SYS (Optimization)
 39800                                  	; (Retrodos v5.0 Pre-Works)
 39801                                  	; (PCDOS 7.1 IBMBIO.COM - SYSINIT:513Bh)
 39802                                  
 39803                                  	push	si
 39804                                  
 39805                                  	push	ds			;switch ds, es
 39806                                  	push	es
 39807                                  	pop	ds
 39808                                  	pop	es			;now ds -> confbot, es -> sysinitseg
 39809                                  
 39810                                  	call	chk_drive_letter	;current ds:[si] is a drive letter?
 39811                                  	jc	short scp_default_drv 	;no, use current default drive.
 39812                                  
 39813                                  	mov	al,[si]
 39814                                  	inc	si
 39815                                  	inc	si			;si -> next char after ":"
 39816                                  	jmp	short scp_setdrv
 39817                                  
 39818                                  scp_default_drv:
 39819                                  	mov	ah,19h
 39820                                  	int	21h
 39821                                  	add	al,"A"			;convert it to a character.
 39822                                  
 39823                                  scp_setdrv:
 39824                                  	mov	[cs:cntry_drv],al	;set the drive letter.
 39825                                  	mov	di,cntry_path
 39826                                  	mov	al,[si]
 39827                                  	cmp	al, "\"
 39828                                  	je	short scp_root_dir
 39829                                  
 39830                                  	cmp	al,"/"			;let's accept "/" as an directory delim
 39831                                  	;je	short scp_root_dir
 39832                                  	;jmp	short scp_path
 39833                                  	; 04/01/2023
 39834                                  	jne	short scp_path
 39835                                  
 39836                                  scp_root_dir:
 39837                                  	dec	di			;di -> cntry_root
 39838                                  scp_path:
 39839                                  	call	move_asciiz		;copy it
 39840                                  
 39841                                  	mov	di,cntry_drv
 39842                                  scpath_exit:
 39843                                  
 39844                                  	push	ds			;switch ds, es
 39845                                  	push	es
 39846                                  	pop	ds
 39847                                  	pop	es			;ds, es value restored
 39848                                  
 39849                                  	pop	si
 39850                                  	retn
 39851                                  
 39852                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 39853                                  
 39854                                  chk_drive_letter:
 39855                                  
 39856                                  ;check if ds:[si] is a drive letter followed by ":".
 39857                                  ;assume that every alpha character is already converted to upper case.
 39858                                  ;carry set if not.
 39859                                  
 39860                                  	; 04/01/2023 - Retrodos v4.2
 39861                                  
 39862                                  	push	ax
 39863                                  	cmp	byte [si],"A"
 39864                                  	;jb	short cdletter_no
 39865                                  	jb	short cdletter_exit
 39866                                  	cmp	byte [si],"Z"
 39867                                  	ja	short cdletter_no
 39868                                  	cmp	byte [si+1],":"
 39869                                  	;jne	short cdletter_no
 39870                                  	;jmp	short cdletter_exit
 39871                                  	; 04/01/2023
 39872                                  	je	short cdletter_exit
 39873                                  
 39874                                  cdletter_no:
 39875                                  	stc
 39876                                  cdletter_exit:
 39877                                  	pop	ax
 39878                                  	retn
 39879                                  
 39880                                  %endif
